context: E 308 noa iho ngā piro i tukuna e te parenga Panthers, e ono ana i te rōpū, i a ia e ārahi ana i te NFL i roto i ngā pōhēhētanga me te 24, ā, e whā ngā tīpakonga Pro Bowl. I ārahi te tīma i roto i ngā pēke me te 11, i a ia e whakahau ana kia toru ngā fumbles me te whakaora i te rua. I tāpiritia e te hoa rārangi o Mario Addison e 61/2 pēke. I whakaaturia hoki e te raina Panthers te mutunga o te tauwhāinga tōkeke o Jared Allen, he kaiepa pro 5 wā, ko ia te kaiārahi pēke mahi hohe o te NFL me te 136, tae atu ki te mutunga o te tauwhāinga o Kony Ealy, e 5 ōna pēke i roto i te 9 tīmatanga noa iho. I muri i a rātou, tokorua o ngā kaitākaro tīmata e toru o ngā Panthers i tīpakohia hoki ki te tākaro i te Pro Bowl: ko Thomas Davis rāua ko Luke Kuechly. I whakahiatotia e Davis e 51/2 ngā pēke, e whā ngā pārekareka, e whā ngā pōhēhētanga, i te wā i ārahi a Kuechly i te tīma i roto i ngā rutu (118) i whakahaua e rua ngā fumbles, a, e whā ana ake hipanga i haukotia. Ko te tuarua o Carolina i whakaatu i te haumarutanga o Pro Bowl, o Kurt Coleman, nāna i ārahi te tīma me ngā pōhēhētanga e whitu o te mahi, i a ia e whitu ana ngā rutu me te kokonga o Pro Bowl, a Josh Norman, nāna i tipu hei kokonga whakaweto i te wā o te tau, ā, e whā ngā pōhēhētanga, e rua o ēnei i whakahokia mō ngā touchdowns.
question: E hia ngā piro i tukua e te parenga o Panthers?

I whakaaturia hoki e te raina Panthers te mutunga o te tauwhāinga tōkeke o Jared Allen, he kaiepa pro 5 wā, ko ia te kaiārahi pēke mahi hohe o te NFL me te 136, tae atu ki te mutunga o te tauwhāinga o Kony Ealy, e 5 ōna pēke i roto i te 9 tīmatanga noa iho. I muri i a rātou, tokorua o ngā kaitākaro tīmata e toru o ngā Panthers i tīpakohia hoki ki te tākaro i te Pro Bowl: ko Thomas Davis rāua ko Luke Kuechly. I whakahiatotia e Davis e 51/2 ngā pēke, e whā ngā pārekareka, e whā ngā pōhēhētanga, i te wā i ārahi a Kuechly i te tīma i roto i ngā rutu (118) i whakahaua e rua ngā fumbles, a, e whā ana ake hipanga i haukotia. Ko te tuarua o Carolina i whakaatu i te haumarutanga o Pro Bowl, o Kurt Coleman, nāna i ārahi te tīma me ngā pōhēhētanga e whitu o te mahi, i a ia e whitu ana ngā rutu me te kokonga o Pro Bowl, a Josh Norman, nāna i tipu hei kokonga whakaweto i te wā o te tau, ā, e whā ngā pōhēhētanga, e rua o ēnei i whakahokia mō ngā touchdowns.
question: E hia ngā pōhēhētanga i riro i a Josh Norman ngā touchdowns i te tau 2015?

context: Na te 4:51 e toe ana i roto i te ture, ka whiwhi a Carolina i te pōro i runga i tō rātou ake raina 24 whāwhā me te whai wāhi ki te whakatū i tētahi puku toa kēmu, ā, kātahi anō ka anga atu ki te 3 me te 9. I te tākaro panuku, ka tangohia e Miller te pōro i Newton, ā, i muri i te kukupa a ētahi kaitākaro mōna, ka roa te tāwhana whakamuri, ā, i whakaorangia e Ward, nāna i whakahoki kia rima ngā whāwhā ki te raina 4 whāwhā o Panthers. Ahakoa he tokomaha nga kaitākaro i ruku ki roto i te pūkei ki te ngana ki te whakaora, kāore a Newton, ā, ko tōna kore whakatoi i muri iho ka taumaha tana whakahē. I tēnei wā, i puritia te hara a Denver i waho o te rohe whakamutunga mō ngā tākaro e toru, engari na te whiu pupuri i te kokonga o Josh Norman i hoatu he huinga hou ki nga Broncos. Kātahi ka piro a Etaka i runga i tētahi oma touchdown 2-whārangi, ā, ka oti i a Manning tētahi hipanga ki a Bennie Fowler mō tētahi tahuringa piro 2, ka hoatu ki a Denver he 24–10 me te 3:08 e toe ana, ā, ko te tikanga ka waiho te kēmu. E rua anō ngā puku a Carolina, engari i rahua te whiwhi i te tuatahi ki ia puku.

Ahakoa he tokomaha nga kaitākaro i ruku ki roto i te pūkei ki te ngana ki te whakaora, kāore a Newton, ā, ko tōna kore whakatoi i muri iho ka taumaha tana whakahē. I tēnei wā, i puritia te hara a Denver i waho o te rohe whakamutunga mō ngā tākaro e toru, engari na te whiu pupuri i te kokonga o Josh Norman i hoatu he huinga hou ki nga Broncos. Kātahi ka piro a Etaka i runga i tētahi oma touchdown 2-whārangi, ā, ka oti i a Manning tētahi hipanga ki a Bennie Fowler mō tētahi tahuringa piro 2, ka hoatu ki a Denver he 24–10 me te 3:08 e toe ana, ā, ko te tikanga ka waiho te kēmu. E rua anō ngā puku a Carolina, engari i rahua te whiwhi i te tuatahi ki ia puku.

context: Puta noa i tōna nohoanga, he taone ahurea maha a Warsaw. E ai ki te tatauranga o te tau 1901, i roto i te 711,988 ngā tangata e 56.2% he Katorika, 35.7% he Hurai, 5% ngā Karaitiana Orthodox Kariki me te 2.8% Porotetani. E waru tau i muri mai, i te tau 1909, e 281,754 nga Hurai (36.9%), 18,189 Porotetani (2.4%) me te 2,818 Mariavites (0.4%). Nā tēnei i hangaia ai ngā rau o ngā wāhi karakia whakapono i ngā wāhi katoa o te taone. Ko te nuinga o rātau i whakangaromia i muri mai i te Whakatikanga o Warsaw o te tau 1944. I muri i te pakanga, ka whakapōturi nga mana ā iwi hou o Pōrana i te hanganga o te whare karakia, ā, he iti noa iho te hunga i hangaia anōtia.

context: Ko te wae taketake o te wehenga rohe i Pōrana he hapori (gmina). He hapori hoki te taone – engari me te tāke o te taone. Ko ngā tāone me ngā hapori e whakahaeretia ana e te koromatua – engari i roto i ngā hapori ko te koromatua he vogt (wójt i te reo Pōrana), engari i roto i ngā tāone – burmistrz. Ka whiwhi ētahi tāone nui ake i ngā āheinga, arā, ngā tūmahi me ngā mana, e mau ana i ngā wae o te taumata tuarua o te wehenga rohe – ngā takiwā, ngā powiat rānei. Ko tētahi tauira o taua āheinga ko te rēhitatanga motokā: kāore e taea e te gmina te rēhita motokā, he mahi tēnei a te powiat (arā, ko te tau rēhita e whakawhirinaki ana ki te powiat i rēhitatia ai tētahi motokā, ehara i te gmina). I tēnei take ka kōrero mātou mō te rohe o te taone, te powiat grodzki rānei. Hei tauira, ko aua tāone ko Lublin, Kraków, Gdańsk, Poznań. I Warsaw, kei ōna rohe anō ētahi o ngā mana o te powiat – pēnei i te rēhitatanga motokā kua whakahuatia kētia. Hei tauira, kei te takiwā o Wola ōna ake whakaaturanga me te takiwā o Ursynów – tōna ake (ā, he momo tau rēhita anō tā ngā motokā mai i Wola i ēnei mai i Ursynów). Engari hei tauira, kāore he mana o ngā rohe i Kraków, nā reira he ōrite te momo o ngā tau rēhitatanga i Kraków mō ngā takiwā katoa.
question: He aha te wae taketake o te wehenga rohe i Pōrana?

context: I whakatūria te whakawhitinga hea tuatahi o Warsaw i te tau 1817, ā, ka haere tonu te hokohoko tae noa ki te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao. I whakatūria anōtia i Aperira 1991, i muri i te mutunga o te mana ā iwi o te whenua i muri i te pakanga me te whakaurunga anō o tētahi mākete mākete wātea. I tēnei rā, ko te Warsaw Stock Exchange (WSE), e ai ki ngā tohu maha, ko te mākete nui rawa o te rohe, me ngā kamupene e 374 kua whakarārangitia me te pūmatuatanga katoa o te 162 584 mln EUR i te 31 o Aotearoa 2009. Mai i te tau 1991 tae noa ki te tau 2000, ko te whakawhitinga hea, he mea whakarihariha, i roto i te whare i whakamahia i mua hei tari matua o te Rōpū Kaimahi o Pōrana (PZPR).
question: Āhea i whakatūria ai te whakawhitinga hea tuatahi o Warsaw?

context: I whakatūria te whakawhitinga hea tuatahi o Warsaw i te tau 1817, ā, ka haere tonu te hokohoko tae noa ki te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao. I whakatūria anōtia i Aperira 1991, i muri i te mutunga o te mana ā iwi o te whenua i muri i te pakanga me te whakaurunga anō o tētahi mākete mākete wātea. I tēnei rā, ko te Warsaw Stock Exchange (WSE), e ai ki ngā tohu maha, ko te mākete nui rawa o te rohe, me ngā kamupene e 374 kua whakarārangitia me te pūmatuatanga katoa o te 162 584 mln EUR i te 31 o Aotearoa 2009. Mai i te tau 1991 tae noa ki te tau 2000, ko te whakawhitinga hea, he mea whakarihariha, i roto i te whare i whakamahia i mua hei tari matua o te Rōpū Kaimahi o Pōrana (PZPR).
question: I te wā i whakaorangia ai te whakawhitinga hea o Warsaw?

context: I mua i te taenga mai o Rollo, kāore ōna iwi whānui i rerekē i Picardy, i te Île-de-France rānei, i whakaarotia he "Frankish". I tīmata te taenga mai o ngā kainoho Viking i mua i ngā tau 880, engari i wehea ki ngā koroni i te rāwhiti (Roumois me Pays de Caux) huri noa i te riu o Seine pāpaku me te hauauru i te Cotentin Peninsula, ā, i wehea e ngā pagii tūturu, i reira ka noho ōrite tonu te iwi whānui, ā, kāore he tangata whenua. Ko ngā ope a Rollo i whakaeke, i te mutunga ka noho i Normandy me ētahi wāhanga o te takutai o Te Atarangi, ko Danes, Norwegians, Norse–Gaels, Orkney Vikings, tērā pea ko Swedes, me Anglo-Danes mai i te English Danelaw i raro i te mana o Norse.
question: Ko wai i te taenga mai i hoatu he tuakiri noa iho ki nga kainoho viking taketake?

context: Ko ngā whānau Norman e rua tino rongonui i tae ki te Māuirangi ko ngā uri o Tancred o Hauteville me te whānau Drengot, i whiwhi a Rainulf Drengot i te takiwā o Aversa, te toputanga tuatahi o Norman i te tonga, mai i a Duke Sergius IV o Naples i te tau 1030. I eke te whānau o Hauteville ki te tūranga rangatira mā te karanga i te rangatira o Guaimar IV o Salerno "Duke of Apulia and Calabria". I wawe tonu tana whakawhiwhinga ki to rātau kaiārahi i pōtitia, a William Iron Arm, ki te taitara kaute i tōna pūmatua o Melfi. I muri iho ka riro i te whānau Drengot te rangatiratanga o Capua, ā, i whakanuia ā-ture e te emepara a Henry III te kaiārahi o Hauteville, a Drogo, hei "dux et magister Italiae comesque Normannorum totius Apuliae et Calabriae" ("Duke and Master of Italy and Count of the Normans of all Apulia and Calabria") i te tau 1047.

context: I muri noa iho i te tīmatanga o ngā Noremana ki Itari, ka tomo rātau ki te Emepaea o Byzantine, kātahi ko Aramenia, ka whawhai ki ngā Pechenegs, ngā Bulgars, me ngā Tākihi Seljuk. I te tuatahi ka whakahauhautia ngā kaihoko o Noremana kia haere mai ki te tonga e ngā Lombards ki te mahi ki ngā Byzantine, engari kāore i roa ka whawhai rātau i roto i te mahi Byzantine i Sicily. I rongonui rātau i te taha o ngā ope Varangian me Lombard i te whakahau a Hōri Maniaces i te tau 1038–40. Tērā te taupatupatu mehemea nō Norman Itari tonu ngā Norman i roto i te ratonga Kariki, ā, ināianei he torutoru noa iho i haere mai i reira. Kāore hoki i te mōhiotia e hia o ngā "Franks", e kīia ana e ngā Byzantine, he Noremana, ehara i ētahi atu Wīwī.
question: Ko wai te hoariri matua o ngā Noremana i Itari, i te Emepaea o Byzantine me Aramenia?

context: I uru ētahi o ngā Noremana ki ngā ope tākehi ki te āwhina i te whakangaromanga o ngā kāwanatanga o Āmenia o Sassoun me Taron i Anatolia ki te rāwhiti o Anatolia. I muri iho, he tokomaha i mahi ki te kāwanatanga o Aramenia ki te tonga i Kirikia me ngā Maunga Taurus. I arahina e tētahi Noremana ko Oursel te ingoa he ope "Franks" ki te raorao o Uparati i te raki o Hiria. Mai i te tau 1073 ki te 1074, e 8,000 o ngā hōia e 20,000 o te tianara o Aramenia ko Philaretus Brachamius he Noremana—nō Oursel i mua—i arahina e Raimbaud. I tukuna hoki e rātau to rātau iwi ki te ingoa o to rātau pāra: Afranji, ko te tikanga "Franks." Ko te hokohoko e mōhiotia ana i waenganui i a Amalfi me Anatioka, i waenganui hoki i a Bari me Tarsus, tērā pea e pā ana ki te aroaro o Italo-Normans i aua tāone i te wā i raro a Amalfi rāua ko Bari i raro i te mana o Norman i Itari.

context: I rongonuitia a Tesla mō ana whakatutukitanga me ana whakaaturanga, kātahi anō ka riro i a ia he rongonui i roto i te ahurea kaingākautia hei "kaipūtaiao pōrangi". He nui te moni i riro i a ia i ana ārai, ko te nuinga o ēnei i whakamahia hei pūtea i ana ake kaupapa me ngā taumata angitu rerekē.:121,154 I noho ia i te nuinga o tōna oranga i roto i ngā hōtēra o New York, tae noa ki tōna whakatānga. I mate a Tesla i te 7 o Hānuere 1943. I muri i tōna matenga, ka taka tana mahi ki te pōuriuri, engari i te tau 1960 ka tapaina e te Hui Nui mō ngā Taumahatanga me ngā Ine te wae SI o te kōpaka autō ko te tesla hei whakahonore i a ia. Mai i nga tau kotahi rau e waru tekau mā iwa rau, kua ara ake te āronga kaingākau ki a Tesla.
question: He aha te tau i mate ai a Tesla?

context: I te tau 1900, i tukuna ki a Tesla he ārai mō tētahi "pūnaha tuku pūngao hiko" me "tētahi kaituku hiko." I te wā i hangaia e Guglielmo Marconi tana tarenga reo irirangi atahanga tuatahi i te tau 1901, ka kōrero a Tesla i mahia ki ngā ārai 17 o Tesla, ahakoa he iti noa iho te tautoko i tēnei kerēme. Ko te tīmatanga tēnei o ngā tau o ngā pakanga ārai i runga i te reo irirangi me ngā ārai a Tesla i tautokona i te tau 1903, i muri mai i tētahi whakataunga whakamuri e manakohia ana e Marconi i te tau 1904. I te tau 1943, ka whakahokia e te Kōti Matua o Te Hononga o Amerika ngā ārai o mua o Tesla, Oliver Lodge, me John Stone. I whakapuakina e te kōti kāore he pānga o ta rātau whakataunga ki te kerēme a Marconi hei tuatahi ki te whakaoti i te tarenga reo irirangi, engari i te mea he pātaitai te kerēme a Marconi ki ētahi ārai, kāore i taea e ia te tono takahi i aua ārai ōrite (tērā ngā kerēme e ngana ana te kōti tiketike ki te whakakore i tētahi kerēme o te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao ki te kāwanatanga o U.S. e te Kamupene Marconi mā te whakaora noa i te ārai o mua o Tesla).

context: Mō tētahi whakamāramatanga pū o te tikanga o te whakaoti i tētahi raruraru mā te whakamahi i te nui o te wā me te mokowā, ka whakamahia tētahi tauira rorohiko pēnei i te mīhini Turing deterministic. Ko te wā e hiahiatia ana e tētahi mīhini Turing deterministic M i te tāurunga x ko te tapeke o ngā tauwhiro āhua, ngā hipanga rānei, ka mahia e te mīhini i mua i te tūnga me te whakaputa i te whakautu ("āe", "kāo"). E kīia ana he mīhini Turing M e mahi ana i roto i te wā f(n), mēnā ko te wā e hiahiatia ana e M i ia tāurunga o te roa n ko te nuinga o te f(n). Ka taea te whakaoti i tētahi raruraru whakatau A i te wā f(n) mēnā he mīhini Turing e mahi ana i te wā f(n) e whakaoti ana i te raruraru. I te mea e hiahia ana te ariā matatini ki te whakarārangi i ngā raruraru i runga anō i tō rātou uauatanga, ka tautuhia e tētahi ngā huinga raruraru i runga anō i ētahi paearu. Hei tauira, ko te huinga o ngā raruraru ka taea te whakaoti i roto i te wā f(n) i runga i tētahi mīhini Turing deterministic ka tohua e DTIME(f(n)).
question: Ko te wā e hiahiatia ana hei whakaputa i tētahi whakautu i runga i tētahi mīhini Turing deterministic e whakapuakina ana he aha?

context: Mō tētahi whakamāramatanga pū o te tikanga o te whakaoti i tētahi raruraru mā te whakamahi i te nui o te wā me te mokowā, ka whakamahia tētahi tauira rorohiko pēnei i te mīhini Turing deterministic. E kīia ana he mīhini Turing M e mahi ana i roto i te wā f(n), mēnā ko te wā e hiahiatia ana e M i ia tāurunga o te roa n ko te nuinga o te f(n). context: I Te Hononga o Amerika, ka whakatau ia kāwanatanga i ngā whakaritenga mō te whiwhi raihana ki te whakaako i ngā kura tūmatanui. E hiahiatia ana kia whai tohu paetahi ngā kaiako o te kura tūmatanui, ā, me whakamana te nuinga e te kāwanatanga e whakaako ai rātou. He maha ngā kura tūtohinga kāore e hiahiatia kia whakamanatia ō rātou kaiako, mēnā ka tutuki i a rātou ngā paerewa kia tino mātauranga e tautuhia ana e No Child Left Behind. Tērā anō, kāore ngā whakaritenga mō ngā kaiako whakakapi/rangitahi i te tino uaua ki ērā mō ngā tohunga wā katoa. E whakaaro ana te Tari Tatauranga Mahi e 1.4 miriona ngā kaiako kura tuatahi, e 674,000 ngā kaiako kura waenganui, me ngā kaiako kura tuarua e 1 miriona e mahi ana i te U.S.

text: On the Freedom of a Christian

context: I te raumati o te tau 1521, ka whakawhānuitia e Luther tana ūnga mai i ngā karakia takitahi pēnei i ngā hākinakina me ngā hāereere ki ngā akoranga i te ngākau o ngā mahi a te Hāhi. I roto i te On the Abrogation of the Private Mass, ka whakataua e ia he karakia whakapakoko te whakaaro he patunga tapu te huihuinga, e whakapuaki ana he koha tērā, kia riro mai i runga i te whakawhetai e te whakaminenga katoa. Ko tana tuhinga On Confession, Whether the Pope has the Power to Require It rejected compulsory confession and encouraged private confession and absolution, since "every Christian is a confessor." I Whiringa-ā-rangi, i tuhituhi a Luther i te Whakawā a Mātini Luther i runga i ngā Kupu Taurangi Monastic. I whakapumautia e ia nga mokete me nga nunui ka taea e ratou te takahi i a ratou kupu taurangi me te kore hara, no te mea he ngana kore tika, he huakore hoki nga kupu taurangi ki te whiwhi i te whakaoranga.

context: I neneihia i te wa e maraa haere ana te hiahia mo nga pukapuka reo Helemani, ka riro oioi mai te iritiraa a Luther hei whakamaoritanga paipai, whai mana hoki. Nā reira, he nui te koha ki te whanaketanga o te reo me ngā tuhinga Tiamana. I whakaratohia ki ngā tuhipoka me ngā kupu whakataki a Luther, me ngā whakairo rākau a Lucas Cranach e pupuri ana i ngā whakaahua ārai papa, i whai wāhi nui ki te horahanga o te akoranga a Luther puta noa i Tiamana. Ua faaûru te Bibilia a Luther i te tahi atu mau huriraa reo reo, mai te Bibilia Beretane a William Tyndale (1525 i mua), te hoê omuaraa o te Bibilia a King James.

context: He rite tonu te whakaarahia o ngā hīmene a Luther e ētahi mahi i roto i tōna oranga me te Whakahoutanga e puta ana. I tīmata tēnei whanonga i tana mōhiotanga ki te whakamatenga o Johann Esch rāua ko Heinrich Voes, ngā tangata tuatahi i whakamatea e te Hāhi Katorika Roma mō ngā tirohanga a Lutheran, i akiaki i a Luther ki te tuhi i te himene "Ein neues Lied wir heben an" ("He waiata hou e whakaarahia ana e mātou"), e mōhiotia whānuitia ana i te reo Ingarihi e te whakamāoritanga a John C. Messenger mā te taitara me te rārangi tuatahi "Flung to the Heedless Winds" me te waiata ki te rangi i titoa e Ibstone i te tau 1875 e Maria C. Tiddeman.

context: Ko California ki te tonga he taiao taone nui rawa, ko te kāinga ki ētahi o ngā wāhi taone nui rawa o te kāwanatanga, tae atu ki ngā wāhi nui kua mahue kāore anō kia whakawhanaketia. Ko te tuatoru o ngā megalopolis tino noho i Te Hononga o Amerika, i muri i te Great Lakes Megalopolis me te megalopolis ki te raki. context: I te whakarewatanga o Sky Digital i te tau 1998 ka whakamahia e te ratonga hōu te aorangi Astra 2A i te tūnga āwhiowhio 28.5°E, kāore i rite ki te ratonga tairitenga i pāohotia mai i te 19.2°E. context: I te 8 o Hēpuari 2007, ka pānuitia e BSkyB tōna whakaaro ki te whakakapi i ōna hongere teretere mamati e toru ki ngā hongere ohaurunga e whā. I tonoa kia tukuna e ēnei hongere he awhe ihirangi mai i te kōpaki BSkyB tae atu ki te tākaro (tae atu ki te Whutupōro Ingarihi Premier League), ngā pikitia, te whakangahau me ngā rongokōrero. I puta mai te pānuitanga i te rā i muri i te whakaūnga a Setanta Sports ka whakarewa i a Mati hei ratonga ohaurunga i runga i te pūhara teretere mamati, ā, i te rā kotahi i whakaingoatia anōtia ai ngā ratonga a NTL hei Virgin Media. Heoi anō, e whakapono ana ngā pūtake umanga ka whakahaua a BSkyB ki te whata i ngā mahere hei tango i ōna hongere mai i Freeview me te whakakapi ki ngā hongere ohaurunga, nā te ngaro pea o ngā moni pānuitanga.

context: I pūrongotia e te nūpepa Mēra o ia Rā i te tau 2012 e taki ana te kōwhiringa takuhe a te kāwanatanga o UK i ngā "pire Sky TV hei whakatau mēnā kei te hē te kī a te wahine e whiwhi ana i ngā painga hei whaea takitahi" – nā te mea, e kī ana, ka tukua e te ohaurunga ki ngā hongere hākinakina te aroaro o te tangata i roto i te whare. context: Ko te Rōpū Mahi o Ahitereiria (ALP), te Rōpū Liberali o Ahitereiria, te Rōpū Ā-Motu o Ahitereiria, me te hunga taiao o Ahitereiria ko ngā rōpū tōrangapū matua o Wikitōria. Ko te tikanga, he tino kaha te Mahi i ngā wāhi mahi o Melbourne ki te uru, ki te raki, me ngā tāone ā-rohe o Ballarat, Bendigo me Geelong. Ko te tautoko matua a te Liberals e takoto ana i ngā wāhi o waho ake o te rāwhiti me waho o Melbourne, me ētahi pūtahi ā-rohe, ā-rohe hoki. He tino kaha nga Nationals i ngā rohe ā-rohe o Wikitōria ki te Raki me te Rāwhiti. Ko nga Greens, i toa i o rātau tūru tuatahi o te whare o raro i te tau 2014, he tino kaha i roto i Melbourne.

context: He kaupapa ture tuhituhi tā Wikitōria i whakaritea i te tau 1975, engari i runga anō i te kaupapa ture o te kawanatanga o te tau 1855, i tukuna e te Pāremata o Ingarangi hei Ture Ture o Wikitōria 1855, e whakatū ana i te Pāremata hei tinana hanga ture o te kāwanatanga mō ngā take e haere mai ana i raro i te kawenga o te kāwanatanga. Ka taea te whakatika i te Kaupapa Ture o Wikitōria e te Pāremata o Wikitōria, hāunga ētahi whakaritenga "tūturu" e hiahiatia ana he nuinga tūturu i roto i ngā whare e rua, he toru-rima te nuinga i roto i ngā whare e rua, te whakaaetanga rānei a te iwi o Wikitōria i roto i tētahi taupānga, i runga anō i te whakarato.

context: I muri i te whakatūnga o te koroni o New South Wales i te tau 1788, ka wehea a Ahitereiria ki tētahi haurua ki te rāwhiti ko New South Wales me tētahi haurua ki te uru ko New Holland, i raro i te whakahaeretanga o te kāwanatanga kawanatanga i Poihākena. Ko te kāinga Pākehā tuatahi i te rohe i mōhiotia i muri mai ko Wikitōria i whakatūria i Oketopa 1803 i raro i a Rutene Kāwana David Collins i Sullivan Bay i Port Phillip. E 402 ngā tāngata (e 5 ngā āpiha kāwanatanga, e 9 ngā āpiha o ngā hōia, e 2 ngā kaipahu, e 39 ngā tūmataiti, e 5 ngā wahine a ngā hōia, me tētahi tamaiti, e 307 ngā herehere, e 17 ngā wahine a ngā herehere, e 7 ngā tamariki). I tonoa rātau mai i Ingarangi i roto i te HMS Calcutta i raro i te whakahau a Kāpene Daniel Woodriff, i te nuinga o te wehi kei whakatūria e te Wīwī, e hōpara ana i taua rohe, tō rātou ake kāinga, ā, mā reira ka werohia ngā mana o Ingarangi ki te whenua.

context: Nā te whawhai whakapono hou i ngā tau 1620 i whakakorea ai ngā painga tōrangapū me ngā hōia o ngā Huguenots i muri i to rātau hinganga. I puritia e rātau ngā whakaritenga whakapono o te Edict of Nantes tae noa ki te ture a Louis XIV, nāna i whakanui haere te whakatoi i a rātou tae noa ki tana whakaputa i te Edict of Fontainebleau (1685), nāna i whakakore te āhukahuka ā-ture katoa o te Porotetani i Wīwī, me te whakahau i ngā Huguenots kia tahuri. Ahakoa tata ki te toru hauwhā i patua, i tukuna rānei, tata ki te 500,000 ngā Huguenots i rere i Wīwī i te tīmatanga o te rau tau 18.

question: E hia ngā Huguenots i rere i Wīwī i te rau tau 1700?

context: I te tau 1700 e hia rau ngā Huguenot Wīwī i heke mai i Ingarangi ki te koroni o Virginia, i reira i kī taurangi ai te Karauna Ingarihi ki a rātau he tuku whenua i Lower Norfolk County. I to rātau taenga atu, ka tukuna kētia e nga mana kawanatanga he whenua ki a rātau e 20 maero i runga ake i te hinganga o te Awa o Hemi, i te kāinga o Monacan i mahue e mōhiotia ana ko Manakin Town, ināianei kei Powhatan County. I tau ētahi tangata whenua ki Chesterfield County i tēnei rā. I te 12 o Mei 1705, ka whakamanatia e te Rūnanga Nui o Virginia tētahi ture hei whakamāori i ngā Huguenots e 148 e noho tonu ana i Manakintown. O ngā tangata tuatahi e 390 i te kāinga tūhāhā, he tokomaha i mate; ko ētahi e noho ana i waho o te taone i runga i ngā pāmu i roto i te kāhua Ingarihi; me ētahi atu i neke ki ngā wāhi rerekē. I āta mārena rāua ki o rāua hoa noho Ingarihi. I roto i ngā rau tau 18 me te 19, ka heke ngā uri o te Wīwī ki te hauauru ki Piedmont, puta noa i ngā Maunga Appalachian ki te Hauauru o Kentucky, Tennessee, Missouri, me ētahi atu kāwanatanga. I te takiwā o Manakintown, i tapaina te Arawhiti Whakamaharatanga o Huguenot puta noa i te Awa o Hemi me te Huarahi Huguenot hei whakahonore i a rātou, me te maha o ngā āhuatanga o te rohe, tae atu ki ngā kura maha, tae atu ki te Kura Tuarua o Huguenot.
question: I roto i teihea koroni Ingarihi i whakaaria mai ai e nga tangata whenua Huguenot?

question: He aha te taone i tukuna ki nga Huguenots i te taenga atu?

context: I te tau 1700 e hia rau ngā Huguenot Wīwī i heke mai i Ingarangi ki te koroni o Virginia, i reira i kī taurangi ai te Karauna Ingarihi ki a rātau he tuku whenua i Lower Norfolk County. I to rātau taenga atu, ka tukuna kētia e nga mana kawanatanga he whenua ki a rātau e 20 maero i runga ake i te hinganga o te Awa o Hemi, i te kāinga o Monacan i mahue e mōhiotia ana ko Manakin Town, ināianei kei Powhatan County. I tau ētahi tangata whenua ki Chesterfield County i tēnei rā. I te 12 o Mei 1705, ka whakamanatia e te Rūnanga Nui o Virginia tētahi ture hei whakamāori i ngā Huguenots e 148 e noho tonu ana i Manakintown. O ngā tangata tuatahi e 390 i te kāinga tūhāhā, he tokomaha i mate; ko ētahi e noho ana i waho o te taone i runga i ngā pāmu i roto i te kāhua Ingarihi; me ētahi atu i neke ki ngā wāhi rerekē. I āta mārena rāua ki o rāua hoa noho Ingarihi. I roto i ngā rau tau 18 me te 19, ka heke ngā uri o te Wīwī ki te hauauru ki Piedmont, puta noa i ngā Maunga Appalachian ki te Hauauru o Kentucky, Tennessee, Missouri, me ētahi atu kāwanatanga. I te takiwā o Manakintown, i tapaina te Arawhiti Whakamaharatanga o Huguenot puta noa i te Awa o Hemi me te Huarahi Huguenot hei whakahonore i a rātou, me te maha o ngā āhuatanga o te rohe, tae atu ki ngā kura maha, tae atu ki te Kura Tuarua o Huguenot.

context: Ko ētahi atu o mua o te hāhi Hou ko ngā Katorika Roma o Gallican, pērā i a Jacques Lefevre (c. 1455–1536). I whiwhi poto nga Karika i te rangatiratanga mo te hahi Wīwī, i runga i te tikanga e kore e taea te whakahaere i te whakapono o Wīwī e te Pīhopa o Roma, he mana kē. I te wā o te Whakahoutanga Porotetani, i whakaputaina e Lefevre, he ahorangi i te Whare Wānanga o Parihi, tana hurihanga Wīwī o te Kawenata Hou i te tau 1523, i muri mai i te Paipera katoa i roto i te reo Wīwī i te tau 1530. He ākonga a William Farel na Lefevre, ka noho hei kaiārahi o te Whakahoutanga o Huiterangi, ka whakatū i tētahi kāwanatanga Porotetani i Hiniwa. I tahuri hoki a Jean Cauvin (John Calvin), tētahi atu tauira i te Whare Wānanga o Parihi, ki te Porotetani. I muri roa a'e i te faaoreraahia te pǔpǔ faaroo e Francis I, ua imi te toea o te mau Waldensian Farani, te rahiraa i taua taime ra i te tuhaa fenua no Luberon, i te amui atu ia William Farel, Calvin e te Reformation, e ua neneihia e Olivetan te hoê Bibilia Farani na ratou. E whakaatu ana te Whākinga Wīwī o te tau 1559 i tētahi āhuatanga tūturu a Calvinistic. I waenganui i te tau 1550 me te 1580, ka mōhiotia whānuitia ngā mema o te hāhi Hou i Wīwī ko Huguenots. [torokī e hiahiatia ana]

context: Ko te nuinga o ngā whakaminenga Huguenot (ngā tangata rānei) i Amerika ki te Raki i te mutunga ka uru ki ētahi atu hāhi Porotetani me te tokomaha ake o ngā mema. I tere te urutau o nga Huguenots, ā, i te nuinga o te wā ka mārena i waho o o rātau hapori Wīwī, nāna rātau i whakauru. I roto i ngā whānau maha, ka whakamahi tonu ō rātou uri i ngā ingoa tuatahi me ngā ingoa whānau Wīwī mō ā rātou tamariki tae noa ki te rau tau tekau mā iwa. I whakaurua, he maha ngā āwhina a te Wīwī ki te oranga ohaoha o Te Hononga o Amerika, otirā hei kaihokohoko me ngā kaimahi i te mutunga o te Kawanatanga me ngā wā tōmua o te Hau. Hei tauira, i whakatūria e E.I. du Pont, he tauira o mua o Lavoisier, nga mira paura o Eleutherian.

context: I pōhiritia e Frederick William, Elector of Brandenburg, ngā Huguenots kia noho ki ōna kingitanga, ā, ka piki ake ētahi o ō rātou uri ki ngā tūnga rangatira i Pirihia. He tokomaha nga tangata hōia, ahurea, tōrangapū o Tiamana he Huguenot, tae atu ki te kaitito o Theodor Fontane, General Hermann von François, te toa o te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao o Tannenberg, Luftwaffe General me te toa toa o Adolf Galland, Luftwaffe flying ace Hans-Joachim Marseille, me te kāpene U-poti rongonui o Lothar von Arnauld de la Perière. context: Ko te tōtika o te huringa Rankine e whakawhāititia ana e te wai mahi. question: He aha te ōrautanga o te tōtika o te pūkaha pēhanga tiketike kua tutuki i te pūkaha Energiprojekt AB?

context: Ko te mīhini uaua, ko tētahi, neke atu rānei o ngā rotors (kōpae tītaka) e mau ana ki runga i te poka puku, e whakawhitiwhiti ana ki ngā rangatū o ngā kōpae pateko (kōpae pateko) e mau ana ki te pūkoro turbine. He raupapa rau pēnei i te tapa o waho o ngā rotors. E mahi ana te hau ki runga i ēnei rau, e whakaputa ana i te nekeneke hurihuri. Ko te stator he raupapa ōrite, engari he pūmau, he rangatū rau e mahi ana hei tahuri anō i te rere o te uaua ki te wāhanga rotor panuku. I te nuinga o te wā ka whakapau te mīhini steam ki roto i tētahi condenser mata e whakarato ana i te ngongo. Ko te tikanga ka whakaritea ngā wāhanga o te mīhini uaua, hei tango i te mōrahi o te mahi tūpāpaku mai i tētahi tere me te pēhanga o te uaua, e puta ake ai he rangatū o ngā wāhanga pēhanga tiketike, iti hoki. He pai anake ngā turbine mēnā ka tītaka i te tere tiketike, nō reira ka tūhono ki ngā taputapu whakaiti hei whakahaere i ngā taupānga tere iti iho, pēnei i te waka kaipuke. I te nuinga o ngā teihana whakanao hiko nui, ka tūhono hāngai ngā turbine ki ngā pūhiko kāore he whakaiti whakaiti. Ko ngā tere noa ko te 3600 hurihanga ia meneti (RPM) i Amerika me te hiko 60 Hertz, 3000 RPM i Uropi me ētahi atu whenua me ngā pūnaha hiko hiko 50 Hertz. I roto i ngā taupānga hiko karihi, ko te nuinga o te wā ka haere ngā mīhini i te haurua o ēnei tere, 1800 RPM me te 1500 RPM. Ka taea anake e te rotor turbine te whakarato hiko ina tītaka ki te ahunga kotahi. Nō reira, ko te nuinga o te wā e hiahiatia ana he wāhanga whakamuri, he pouaka pouaka rānei e hiahiatia ana he hiko ki te ahunga hangai. [torokī e hiahiatia ana]

context: I kitea takitahitia te hāora e Carl Wilhelm Scheele, i Uppsala, i te tau 1773, i mua atu rānei, me Hohepa Priestley i Wiltshire, i te tau 1774, engari i te nuinga o te wā ka hoatu te manakē ki a Priestley nā te mea i whakaputaina tana mahi i te tuatahi. I waihangatia te ingoa hāora i te tau 1777 e Antoine Lavoisier, ā, nā ōna whakamātautau ki te hāora i āwhina ki te whakawātea i te ariā phlogiston rongonui o te wera me te waikura. Ko tōna ingoa i takea mai i ngā pakiaka Kariki ὀξύς oxys, "waikawa", ko te tikanga "koi", e pā ana ki te reka kawa o ngā waikawa me ngā -γενής -genes, "kaiwhakanao", ko te tikanga "whanau", nā te mea i te wā o te whakaingoatanga, i pōhēhētia te whakaaro e hiahiatia ana e ngā waikawa katoa te hāora i roto i tō rātou hanganga. Ko ngā whakamahinga noa o te hāora ko te huringa whakanao o te tīra, ngā kirihou me ngā pueru, te kōhukihuki, te whakawhitiwhiti me te tapahi tīra me ētahi atu konganuku, te tākirirangi, i roto i te hauora hāora me ngā pūnaha tautoko ora i roto i ngā rererangi, waka ruku, waka ātea me te ruku.

context:
I te tau 1891 ka taea e te kēmihana Pākehā a James Dewar te whakaputa i te hāora wai hei ako. I hangaia takitahitia te tukanga arumoni tuatahi mō te whakaputa hāora wai i te tau 1895 e te kaipūkaha Tiamana o Carl von Linde me te kaipūkaha o Ingarangi ko William Hampson. Ka whakahekea e ngā tāngata e rua te pāmahana o te hau kia wairewa rā anō, kātahi ka whakahekea ngā korohū wae mā te kōhua takitahi me te hopu. Nō muri mai, i te tau 1901, ka whakaaturia te welding oxyacetylene mō te wā tuatahi mā te tahu i te ranunga acetylene me te kōpeke O

context: Ka inea e ngā kaimātai Paleoclimatologists te ōwehenga o te hāora-18 me te hāora-16 i roto i ngā anga me ngā anga o ngā rauropi moana hei whakatau he aha te āhua o te āhuarangi i ngā miriona tau ki mua. Ko ngā rāpoi ngota wai moana e pupuri ana i te isotope māmā ake, te hāora-16, he tere ake te whakaeto i ngā rāpoi ngota wai e pupuri ana i te hāora-18 taumaha ake; Ka nui ake tēnei rerekētanga i ngā pāmahana hahaka iho. I roto i ngā wā o te pāmahana o te ao, he nui ake te hukarere me te marangai mai i taua wai whakaeto i roto i te hāora-16, ā, ko te wai moana e mahue ana ka teitei ake i te hāora-18. Kātahi ka whakaurua e ngā rauropi moana he nui ake te hāora-18 ki roto i ō rātou anga me ngā anga i te āhuarangi mahana ake. Ka inea hāngai hoki e ngā kaimātai Paleoclimatologists tēnei ōwehenga i roto i ngā rāpoi ngota wai o ngā tauira uho hukapapa tae atu ki ngā rau mano tau te pakeke.

He uaua te inenga nā te iti o te ōwehenga tohu-ki-te-turituri me te hanganga ōkiko o te tipu; Engari kua marohitia hei tikanga aroturuki i te huringa waro mai i ngā aorangi i runga i te tauine huri noa.

context:
Ka whakamahia e te rongoā hyperbaric (pēhanga tiketike) ngā ruma hāora motuhake hei whakanui ake i te pēhanga wāhanga o O
2 huri noa i te tūroro, ā, ina hiahiatia, te kaimahi rongoā. I ētahi wā ka whakamahia te paitini waro monoxide, te korohū korohū, me te mate kōpeketanga (ngā 'piko') mā te whakamahi i ēnei pūrere. Whakanuia te O
Ka āwhina te 2 ārohitanga i roto i ngā pūkahukahu ki te whakawhiti i te waro monoxide mai i te rōpū heme o te hemoglobin. He paitini te korohū hāora ki ngā huakita anaerobic e pā ana ki te korohū korohū, nā reira ka āwhina te whakanui i tōna pēhanga wāhanga ki te whakamate i a rātou. Ka puta te mate kōpeketanga i roto i ngā kairuku e tere rawa ana te kōpeke i muri i te ruku, e hua ana i ngā mirumiru korohū kōpeke, ko te nuinga o te hauota me te helium, e hanga ana i roto i o rātau toto. Te whakanui ake i te pēhanga o te O
2 i te wā tata nei he wāhanga o te rongoā.

question: He aha ka puta i muri i te ruku e tere rawa ai te whakakōpeke a te kairuku?

context: I te 6 o Whiringahora 1973, ka whakarewaina e Hiria rāua ko Ihipa, me te tautoko a ētahi atu iwi Arapia, he whakaekenga ohorere ki a Iharaira, ki Yom Kippur. Nā tēnei whakahōutanga o ngā whakarihariha i roto i te papā o Arapia–Iharaira i tuku ai te pēhanga o te ohaoha i runga i ngā utu hinu. I taua wā, ko Irana te kawekawe hinu tuarua nui rawa o te ao, ā, he urunga tata ki a Mātau. I ngā wiki i muri iho, ka kī te Hēhara o Irana i roto i tētahi uiuinga: "Ka piki ake [te utu hinu]... E tika ana! Me pēhea... Kua whakanuia e koe [ngā iwi ki te Uru] te utu o te witi e hokona ana e koe ki a mātau mā te 300 ōrau, ā, he rite tonu mō te huka me te raima... Ka hokona e koe ta mātau hinu māori, ka hokona mai ki a mātau, he mārire hei petrochemicals, i te rau wā o te utu i utua e koe ki a mātau... He pai noa iho, mai i konei, me utu anō koe mo te hinu. Me kī atu kia tekau ngā wā anō."

context: I te tau 1973, i whakaingoatia e Nixon a William E. Simon hei Kaiwhakahaere tuatahi o te Federal Energy Office, he whakahaere mo te wā poto i hangaia hei taururuku i te urupare ki te aukati. I tohaina e Haimona te nui o te hinu kāinga mō te tau 1974 i pau i ia i te tau 1972, e mahi ana mō ngā kāwanatanga kāore i te nui haere te iwi whānui. I ētahi atu kāwanatanga, he mea noa iho ngā raina i ngā teihana penehīni. I pūrongotia e te American Automobile Association i te wiki whakamutunga o Hui tanguru 1974, 20% o ngā teihana penehīni o Amerika kāore he hinu.

context: Na te raruraru pūngao i nui ake ai te āronga ki te pūngao whakahou, te hiko karihi me ngā kora fossil o te kāinga. context: I tangi ētahi kaihoko i te iti o ngā kiato Hapanihi tuatahi, ā, i whakamōhiotia e Tōtō rāua ko Nissan (e mōhiotia ana ko Datsun) ngā motokā nui ake pēnei i te Toyota Corona Mark II, te Toyota Cressida, te Mazda 616 me Datsun 810, nāna i tāpiri te mokowā pāhihi me ngā taonga pēnei i te hauora, te urungi hiko, ngā reo irirangi AM-FM, tae atu ki ngā matapihi hiko me te maukati matua me te kore whakanui i te utu o te waka. Kotahi tekau tau i muri mai i te raruraru hinu o te tau 1973, ka whakatuwheratia e Honda, Toyota me Nissan, i pāngia e ngā herenga kaweake tūturu o te tau 1981, ka whakatuwheratia ngā tipu whakaminenga o Amerika, ā, ka whakatū i ā rātou wehenga rangatira (Acura, Lexus me Infiniti) hei wehe i a rātau i a rātau toa mākete nui.

context: Ko te whakatūnga o tētahi komiti ad-hoc e whakahaeretia ana e tana kaiāwhina hangarau motuhake o Nicholas E. Golovin i a Hōngongoi 1961, hei tūtohu i tētahi waka whakarewa hei whakamahi i roto i te papatono Apollo, e tohu ana i tētahi wāhi huri i roto i te whakataunga aratau mahi a NASA. I mōhio tēnei komiti he wāhanga nui te aratau i kōwhiria o te kōwhiringa waka whakarewa, ā, i tūtohutia kia manakohia tētahi aratau EOR-LOR hinu. Ko tōna whakaaro ki te LOR —tae atu ki te mahi mutunga kore a Houbolt— i whai wāhi nui ki te whakawhānui i te mahi o te huarahi. I te mutunga o te tau 1961 me te tīmatanga o te tau 1962, ka tīmata ngā mema o te Manned Spacecraft Center ki te tautoko i a LOR, tae atu ki te tumuaki tuarua hou o te Office of Manned Space Flight, a Joseph Shea, nāna i noho hei toa o LOR. He roa ake te wā i mōhio ai ngā kaipūkaha i te Pokapū Rererangi Mokowā o Marshall (MSFC) ki ōna painga, engari i pānuitia to rātau tahuringa e Wernher von Braun i tētahi kōrero i June 1962.

context: I muri i tētahi rererangi whakamātautau LM AS-206, ka rere tētahi kaimahi i te Paraka II CSM me te LM tuatahi i roto i tētahi mahi takirua e mōhiotia ana ko AS-207/208, AS-278 rānei (ka whakarewaina ia waka ātea ki tētahi Saturn IB motuhake.) Ko ngā tūnga kaimahi Paraka II i huaina ko Commander (CDR), Command Module Pilot (CMP) me Lunar Module Pilot (LMP). Ka tīmata nga kaiārangi ki te mau i tētahi kākahu ātea Apollo hōu, i hoahoatia hei whakanoho i ngā ngohe ā-marama (EVA). I whakakapia te potae mata tūturu ki tētahi momo "peihana ika" mārama kia nui ake ai te kitenga, ā, ka whakaurua e te hūtu EVA mata marama he kākahu raro whakamātao wai.

context: I whakatau a Grissom, White, me Chaffee ki te whakaingoa i ta rātau rerenga ko Apollo 1 hei arotahi whakahauhau ki te rerenga tuatahi o te tangata. I whakaakona, i whakahaere hoki rātau i ngā whakamātautau o ta rātau waka ātea i Amerika ki te Raki, i te ruma teitei i te Pokapū Mokowā o Kennedy. I whakaritea tētahi whakamātautau "mono-atu" mō Hānuere, e whakataruna ana i tētahi tatauranga whakarewa i LC-34 me te waka ātea e whakawhiti ana mai i te pūpato ki te hiko ā-roto. Ki te angitu, ka whaia tēnei e tētahi whakamātautau whakataruna tatauranga uaua ake e tata ana ki te whakarewatanga o te 21 o Hui tanguru, me te waka ātea me te waka whakarewa.

context: I tīmata te whakamātautau mono-atu i te ata o te 27 o Hānuere 1967, ā, i wawe tonu ka pāngia e ngā raruraru. I te tuatahi ka kite te kaimahi i tētahi haunga rerekē i roto i o rātau kākahu ātea, nāna i whakaroa te hiri o te paopao. Kātahi ka whakapōrearea ngā raruraru whakawhitiwhiti kōrero i ngā kairangirangi, ā, ka whakahaua kia puritia te tatauranga whakataruna. I te wā o tēnei pupuritanga, ka tīmata he ahi hiko i roto i te rūma, ā, ka tere te hora i roto i te pēhanga tiketike, 100% hāora hāora. Ka piki te pēhanga i te ahi ka pakaru te rūma, ā, ka hū te ahi ki te wāhi papa, ka whakararuraru i ngā ngana ki te whakaora i ngā kaimahi. I whakararurarutia nga kaiārangi i mua i te whakatuwheratanga o te paopao.
question: He aha te raruraru tuatahi i tūpono ki ngā kaiāwhina i te wā o te whakamātautau mono?

text: haunga rerekē i roto i o rātau kākahu ātea

context: I tīmata te whakamātautau mono-atu i te ata o te 27 o Hānuere 1967, ā, i wawe tonu ka pāngia e ngā raruraru. I te tuatahi ka kite te kaimahi i tētahi haunga rerekē i roto i o rātau kākahu ātea, nāna i whakaroa te hiri o te paopao. Kātahi ka whakapōrearea ngā raruraru whakawhitiwhiti kōrero i ngā kairangirangi, ā, ka whakahaua kia puritia te tatauranga whakataruna. I te wā o tēnei pupuritanga, ka tīmata he ahi hiko i roto i te rūma, ā, ka tere te hora i roto i te pēhanga tiketike, 100% hāora hāora. Ka piki te pēhanga i te ahi ka pakaru te rūma, ā, ka hū te ahi ki te wāhi papa, ka whakararuraru i ngā ngana ki te whakaora i ngā kaimahi. I whakararurarutia nga kaiārangi i mua i te whakatuwheratanga o te paopao.

question: He aha te momo hauora i āwhina ki te whakakī i te ahi puta noa i te rūma?

context: Mā te pūtea e $230,000, i whakahiatohia e Nafzger ngā raraunga pāohotanga marama taketake mai i Apollo 11, ā, i whakaritea ki Lowry Digital mō te whakaoratanga. I tukatukatia te ataata hei tango i te turituri matapōkere me te rūrū kāmera me te kore whakangaro i te tikanga hītori. Ko ngā atahanga i ahu mai i ngā rīpene i Ahitereiria, te pūranga Rongokōrero o TE Rongokōrero, me ngā hopukanga kinescope i hangaia i te Pokapū Mokowā o Hōnea. Kei roto i te ataata i whakaoratia, e noho ana ki te pango me te mā, ngā whakareitanga mamati tūturu, ā, kāore i whakaurua ngā whakapainga kounga oro.

question: I taea rānei te tāpiri tae ki ngā rīpene kua whakaoratia hei whakarei ake i te pikitia, i noho pango me te mā rānei?

context: I tīmata ngā Tiriti matua e hanga ana i te Uniana o Ūropi ki ngā ture noa iho mō te waro me te tīra, kātahi ko te pūngao karihi, engari i whakatūria ngā rōpū oti, whai tikanga hoki i whakatūria mā te Tiriti o Roma 1957 me te Tiriti o Maastrist 1992 (ināianei: TFUE). I mahia ngā menemana iti i roto i ngā tau 1960 me 1970. I hainatia ngā tiriti whakatika nui hei whakaoti i te whanaketanga o tētahi mākete kotahi, ā-roto i te Ture Ūropi Kotahi 1986, hei whakanui ake i te whanaketanga o Uropi pāpori ake i te Tiriti o Tūtukupu 1997, me te mahi i ngā menemana iti ki te mana pātahi o ngā kāwanatanga mema i ngā rōpū EU i te Tiriti o Te Pai 2001 me te Tiriti o Lisbon 2007. Mai i tōna whakatūnga, he nui ake ngā whenua mema kua hono mā ngā rangatū o ngā tiriti whakauru, mai i UK, Airangi, Tenemaka me Nōwei i te tau 1972 (ahakoa kāore a Nōwei i mutu te hono), Kariki i te tau 1979, Paniora me Potukara 1985, Ateria, Hinerangi, Nōwei me Huitene i te tau 1994 (ahakoa kāore anō a Nōwei ki te hono, nā te kore tautoko i roto i te taupānga),  te Whenua o Taikarowākia, Kaiperu, Etonia, Hakari, Rāwhia, Rituānia, Malta, Pōrana, Horokia, Horowinia i te tau 2004, Ruhiana me Poaria i te tau 2007 me Koroātia i te tau 2013. I hainatia e Kunirangi tētahi Tiriti i te tau 1985 e hoatu ana i tētahi tūnga motuhake.

question: I te wā i hangaia ai te Ture Pākehā Kotahi?

context: I tīmata ngā Tiriti matua e hanga ana i te Uniana o Ūropi ki ngā ture noa iho mō te waro me te tīra, kātahi ko te pūngao karihi, engari i whakatūria ngā rōpū oti, whai tikanga hoki i whakatūria mā te Tiriti o Roma 1957 me te Tiriti o Maastrist 1992 (ināianei: TFUE). I mahia ngā menemana iti i roto i ngā tau 1960 me 1970. I hainatia ngā tiriti whakatika nui hei whakaoti i te whanaketanga o tētahi mākete kotahi, ā-roto i te Ture Ūropi Kotahi 1986, hei whakanui ake i te whanaketanga o Uropi pāpori ake i te Tiriti o Tūtukupu 1997, me te mahi i ngā menemana iti ki te mana pātahi o ngā kāwanatanga mema i ngā rōpū EU i te Tiriti o Te Pai 2001 me te Tiriti o Lisbon 2007. Mai i tōna whakatūnga, he nui ake ngā whenua mema kua hono mā ngā rangatū o ngā tiriti whakauru, mai i UK, Airangi, Tenemaka me Nōwei i te tau 1972 (ahakoa kāore a Nōwei i mutu te hono), Kariki i te tau 1979, Paniora me Potukara 1985, Ateria, Hinerangi, Nōwei me Huitene i te tau 1994 (ahakoa kāore anō a Nōwei ki te hono, nā te kore tautoko i roto i te taupānga),  te Whenua o Taikarowākia, Kaiperu, Etonia, Hakari, Rāwhia, Rituānia, Malta, Pōrana, Horokia, Horowinia i te tau 2004, Ruhiana me Poaria i te tau 2007 me Koroātia i te tau 2013. I hainatia e Kunirangi tētahi Tiriti i te tau 1985 e hoatu ana i tētahi tūnga motuhake.

question: I te wā i hainatia ai e Kunirangi tētahi Tiriti e tuku ana i te tūnga motuhake ki a rātou?

context: Ahakoa he mana whakahaere tā te Kōmihana mo te tīmata ture, he mana whakarākeitanga me te whakahē a te Pāremata o Ūropi me te Kaunihera o te Uniana o Ūropi i te wā o te tukanga ture. E ai ki te Tiriti i runga i ngā tuhipānui o te Uniana o Ūropi 9 me te 10, ka mātakina e te EU "te tikanga o te ōritetanga o ōna iwi" ā, ko te tikanga kia whakatūria i runga i te "kāwanatanga ā iwi". I roto i te mahi, he hē te ōritetanga me te kāwanatanga ā iwi nā te mea kāore e taea e ngā māngai pōti i te Pāremata te tīmata i ngā ture ki ngā hiahia o te Kōmihana, tekau ngā wā o ngā tangata whenua iti rawa te taumahatanga pōti i te Pāremata hei tangata whenua nui rawa, ā, ko te "nuinga e tika ana", ko te whakaaetanga rānei o te Kaunihera e hiahiatia ana hei whakawa. Ko te whakatikatanga mō tēnei "tāupenga manapori" i raro i ngā Tiriti, ko te whakaotinga o te whakaurunga o te whakahaerenga o Ūropi me ngā rōpū tōrangapū e hiahiatia ana te hononga hangarau o ngā tohunga, i te wā e whakapeka ana te mōhiotanga kaingākau ki te EU i hangaia me ngā whakaaro tōpū i muri i te pakanga. I te roanga o te wā, ko te tikanga o tēnei ka nui ake te reo o te Pāremata: mai i te whakaminenga kāore i pōtitia, ki tana pōti hāngai tuatahi i te tau 1979, ki te nui ake o ngā mana i roto i te tukanga ture. Nō reira he whāiti ngā mana tangata whenua i whakaritea ki ngā āhuatanga manapori i roto i ngā whenua mema katoa o Ūropi: i raro i te tuhipānui TEU 11 ngā tangata whenua me ngā pāhonotanga e whai mana ana pēnei i te whakawhānui i ō rātou whakaaro me te tuku i tētahi mahi me whakaaro e te Kōmihana me ngā waitohu kotahi miriona. Kei roto i te tuhipānui TFUEE 227 tētahi atu mana mō ngā tangata whenua ki te inoi ki te Pāremata mō ngā take e pā ana ki a rātou. Ka tū te pōti pāremata i ia rima tau, ā, me whakarite ngā pōti mō ngā Mema Pāremata o Ūropi i ngā whenua mema mā te whakaaturanga ōrite, mā te pōti whakawhiti kotahi rānei. E 750 ngā MEP me ō rātou tau he "ōrite" e ai ki te rahi o te āhua o te mema. Ko te tikanga o tēnei - ahakoa ko te Rūnanga te tinana e tohu ana i ngā whenua mema - i roto i te Pāremata, he nui ake te reo o ngā tangata whenua o ngā whenua iti iho i ngā tangata whenua nui ake. E wehe ana ngā MEP, pērā ki a rātau i roto i ngā Pāremata ā iwi, i te taha o ngā rārangi rōpū tōrangapū: ko te Rōpū Tāngata o Ūropi te nui rawa i tēnei wā, ā, ko te Rōpū o ngā Hāpori o Ūropi e ārahi ana i te ātetetanga. Kāore ngā rōpū e whiwhi moni tūmatanui mai i te EU, i te mea i puritia e te Kōti o te Ture i roto i te Parti ecologiste "Les Verts" v Pāremata he take katoa tēnei kia whakaritea e ngā kāwanatanga mema. Kei roto i ngā mana o te Pāremata ko te karanga uiui ki te mahi kino, te whakatū rānei i tētahi Ombudsman e tārewa ana i ngā kōrero kōti. Tērā pea ka hiahiatia e te Kōmihana te urupare ki ngā pātai, ā, mā te nuinga e rua tuatoru e āhei ana ki te whakahē i te Kōmihana katoa (pērā ki te Kōmihana o Te Kōmihana i te tau 1999). I ētahi take, he mana whakaaro mārama tā te Pāremata, e tika ana kia whai tūturu te Kōmihana. Heoi anō, kei te whāiti tonu tōna whai wāhitanga i roto i te tukanga ture nā te mea kāore e taea e tētahi mema te whakaoti ture me te kore te Kōmihana me te Kaunihera, ko te tikanga kāore te mana ("kratia") i roto i ngā ringa o ngā māngai pōti hāngai o te iwi ("demos"): i te EU kāore anō kia pono "kei te ringa o te tokomaha te whakahaere, ehara i te torutoru."
question: Ko ēhea ngā tinana whakahaere e rua e whai mana whakahē ture?

Ko te whakatikatanga mō tēnei "tāupenga manapori" i raro i ngā Tiriti, ko te whakaotinga o te whakaurunga o te whakahaerenga o Ūropi me ngā rōpū tōrangapū e hiahiatia ana te hononga hangarau o ngā tohunga, i te wā e whakapeka ana te mōhiotanga kaingākau ki te EU i hangaia me ngā whakaaro tōpū i muri i te pakanga. I te roanga o te wā, ko te tikanga o tēnei ka nui ake te reo o te Pāremata: mai i te whakaminenga kāore i pōtitia, ki tana pōti hāngai tuatahi i te tau 1979, ki te nui ake o ngā mana i roto i te tukanga ture. Nō reira he whāiti ngā mana tangata whenua i whakaritea ki ngā āhuatanga manapori i roto i ngā whenua mema katoa o Ūropi: i raro i te tuhipānui TEU 11 ngā tangata whenua me ngā pāhonotanga e whai mana ana pēnei i te whakawhānui i ō rātou whakaaro me te tuku i tētahi mahi me whakaaro e te Kōmihana me ngā waitohu kotahi miriona. Kei roto i te tuhipānui TFUEE 227 tētahi atu mana mō ngā tangata whenua ki te inoi ki te Pāremata mō ngā take e pā ana ki a rātou. Ka tū te pōti pāremata i ia rima tau, ā, me whakarite ngā pōti mō ngā Mema Pāremata o Ūropi i ngā whenua mema mā te whakaaturanga ōrite, mā te pōti whakawhiti kotahi rānei. E 750 ngā MEP me ō rātou tau he "ōrite" e ai ki te rahi o te āhua o te mema. Ko te tikanga o tēnei - ahakoa ko te Rūnanga te tinana e tohu ana i ngā whenua mema - i roto i te Pāremata, he nui ake te reo o ngā tangata whenua o ngā whenua iti iho i ngā tangata whenua nui ake. E wehe ana ngā MEP, pērā ki a rātau i roto i ngā Pāremata ā iwi, i te taha o ngā rārangi rōpū tōrangapū: ko te Rōpū Tāngata o Ūropi te nui rawa i tēnei wā, ā, ko te Rōpū o ngā Hāpori o Ūropi e ārahi ana i te ātetetanga. Kāore ngā rōpū e whiwhi moni tūmatanui mai i te EU, i te mea i puritia e te Kōti o te Ture i roto i te Parti ecologiste "Les Verts" v Pāremata he take katoa tēnei kia whakaritea e ngā kāwanatanga mema. Kei roto i ngā mana o te Pāremata ko te karanga uiui ki te mahi kino, te whakatū rānei i tētahi Ombudsman e tārewa ana i ngā kōrero kōti. Tērā pea ka hiahiatia e te Kōmihana te urupare ki ngā pātai, ā, mā te nuinga e rua tuatoru e āhei ana ki te whakahē i te Kōmihana katoa (pērā ki te Kōmihana o Te Kōmihana i te tau 1999). I ētahi take, he mana whakaaro mārama tā te Pāremata, e tika ana kia whai tūturu te Kōmihana. Heoi anō, kei te whāiti tonu tōna whai wāhitanga i roto i te tukanga ture nā te mea kāore e taea e tētahi mema te whakaoti ture me te kore te Kōmihana me te Kaunihera, ko te tikanga kāore te mana ("kratia") i roto i ngā ringa o ngā māngai pōti hāngai o te iwi ("demos"): i te EU kāore anō kia pono "kei te ringa o te tokomaha te whakahaere, ehara i te torutoru."

I roto i te mahi, he hē te ōritetanga me te kāwanatanga ā iwi nā te mea kāore e taea e ngā māngai pōti i te Pāremata te tīmata i ngā ture ki ngā hiahia o te Kōmihana, tekau ngā wā o ngā tangata whenua iti rawa te taumahatanga pōti i te Pāremata hei tangata whenua nui rawa, ā, ko te "nuinga e tika ana", ko te whakaaetanga rānei o te Kaunihera e hiahiatia ana hei whakawa. Ko te whakatikatanga mō tēnei "tāupenga manapori" i raro i ngā Tiriti, ko te whakaotinga o te whakaurunga o te whakahaerenga o Ūropi me ngā rōpū tōrangapū e hiahiatia ana te hononga hangarau o ngā tohunga, i te wā e whakapeka ana te mōhiotanga kaingākau ki te EU i hangaia me ngā whakaaro tōpū i muri i te pakanga. I te roanga o te wā, ko te tikanga o tēnei ka nui ake te reo o te Pāremata: mai i te whakaminenga kāore i pōtitia, ki tana pōti hāngai tuatahi i te tau 1979, ki te nui ake o ngā mana i roto i te tukanga ture. Nō reira he whāiti ngā mana tangata whenua i whakaritea ki ngā āhuatanga manapori i roto i ngā whenua mema katoa o Ūropi: i raro i te tuhipānui TEU 11 ngā tangata whenua me ngā pāhonotanga e whai mana ana pēnei i te whakawhānui i ō rātou whakaaro me te tuku i tētahi mahi me whakaaro e te Kōmihana me ngā waitohu kotahi miriona. Kei roto i te tuhipānui TFUEE 227 tētahi atu mana mō ngā tangata whenua ki te inoi ki te Pāremata mō ngā take e pā ana ki a rātou. Ka tū te pōti pāremata i ia rima tau, ā, me whakarite ngā pōti mō ngā Mema Pāremata o Ūropi i ngā whenua mema mā te whakaaturanga ōrite, mā te pōti whakawhiti kotahi rānei. E 750 ngā MEP me ō rātou tau he "ōrite" e ai ki te rahi o te āhua o te mema. Ko te tikanga o tēnei - ahakoa ko te Rūnanga te tinana e tohu ana i ngā whenua mema - i roto i te Pāremata, he nui ake te reo o ngā tangata whenua o ngā whenua iti iho i ngā tangata whenua nui ake. E wehe ana ngā MEP, pērā ki a rātau i roto i ngā Pāremata ā iwi, i te taha o ngā rārangi rōpū tōrangapū: ko te Rōpū Tāngata o Ūropi te nui rawa i tēnei wā, ā, ko te Rōpū o ngā Hāpori o Ūropi e ārahi ana i te ātetetanga. Kāore ngā rōpū e whiwhi moni tūmatanui mai i te EU, i te mea i puritia e te Kōti o te Ture i roto i te Parti ecologiste "Les Verts" v Pāremata he take katoa tēnei kia whakaritea e ngā kāwanatanga mema. Kei roto i ngā mana o te Pāremata ko te karanga uiui ki te mahi kino, te whakatū rānei i tētahi Ombudsman e tārewa ana i ngā kōrero kōti. Tērā pea ka hiahiatia e te Kōmihana te urupare ki ngā pātai, ā, mā te nuinga e rua tuatoru e āhei ana ki te whakahē i te Kōmihana katoa (pērā ki te Kōmihana o Te Kōmihana i te tau 1999). I ētahi take, he mana whakaaro mārama tā te Pāremata, e tika ana kia whai tūturu te Kōmihana. Heoi anō, kei te whāiti tonu tōna whai wāhitanga i roto i te tukanga ture nā te mea kāore e taea e tētahi mema te whakaoti ture me te kore te Kōmihana me te Kaunihera, ko te tikanga kāore te mana ("kratia") i roto i ngā ringa o ngā māngai pōti hāngai o te iwi ("demos"): i te EU kāore anō kia pono "kei te ringa o te tokomaha te whakahaere, ehara i te torutoru."
question: Ko tēhea te rōpū nui rawa i waenganui i ngā rārangi rōpū tōrangapū i tēnei wā?

context: Mai i tōna whakatūnga, kua mahi te EU i waenganui i te nui haere o ngā pūnaha ā-ture ā-motu, huri noa hoki. Ko te tikanga o tēnei, me hanga e te Kōti o Ūropi o te Ture me ngā kōti ā iwi tiketike rawa ngā tikanga hei whakatika i ngā papā o ngā ture i waenganui i ngā pūnaha rerekē. I roto i te EU anō, ko te tirohanga a te Kōti o te Ture, mēnā e papā ana te ture EU ki tētahi whakaritenga ture ā iwi, kātahi ka whai mana te ture EU. I te kēhi nui tuatahi i te tau 1964, i te tau kotahi mano I kī a ia i papā te ture whakakotahitanga Itari ki te Tiriti o Roma, ā, i tonoa he tohutoro ki te Kōti Kawanatanga o Itari me te Kōti o te Ture i raro i te tuhipānui 267 o TFUE. I whakaaro te Kōti Kawanatanga o Itari, nā te mea nō te tau 1962 te ture whakakotahitanga, ā, i mana te tiriti mai i te tau 1958, kaore he kerēme a Costa. He taumira, i puritia e te Kōti o te Ture, i te mutunga kāore te Tiriti o Roma i ārai i te whakakotahitanga pūngao, ā, ahakoa he aha i raro i ngā whakaritenga o te Tiriti, ko te Kōmihana anake i āhei ki te kawe mai i tētahi kerēme, ehara i a Tēnā Koto. Heoi anō, i runga i te tikanga, i whai wāhi a Tēnā Koto ki te tohe e papā ana te Tiriti ki te ture ā iwi, ā, ka whai tikanga te kōti ki te whakaaro i tana tono kia tohutoro mehemea kaore he tono ki tana whakataunga. I kī te Kōti o te Ture, i te tāruatanga o tōna tirohanga i Van Gend en Loos, i ngā kāwanatanga mema "ahakoa i roto i ngā rohe whāiti, kua rāhuitia ō rātou mana ariki, ā, kua waihangatia he tinana ture e pā ana ki ō rātou iwi, ki a rātou anō hoki" i runga i te "take o te taurangi". E kore te ture EU e "takahi e ngā whakaritenga ā-ture o te kāinga, ahakoa te tāpare... me te kore e pātaitia te take ā-ture o te iwi anō." Ko te tikanga o tēnei ko tētahi "mahi kotahi whai muri" o te āhua mema e kore e hāngai. Waihoki, i roto i te Amministrazione delle Finanze v Simmenthal SpA, i kī tētahi kamupene, a Simmenthal SpA, he utu arotake hauora tūmatanui i raro i tētahi ture Itari o te tau 1970 mō te kawemai mīti kau mai i Wīwī ki Itari, e hāngai ana ki ngā Ture e rua mai i te 1964 me te 1968. "E ai ki te tikanga o te tuatahi o te ture Hapori," te kī a te Kōti o te Ture, ko ngā "tikanga hāngai tonu o ngā rōpū" (pēnei i ngā Ture i te kēhi) "ka kore e hāngai aunoa ki tētahi whakaritenga papā o te ture ā-motu o nāianei". I hiahiatia tēnei hei ārai i tētahi "whakakāhoretanga ōrite" o te Tiriti "ngā here e mahia ana e ngā āhuatanga mema", tērā pea ka "whakararuraru i ngā tūāpapa o te" EU. Engari ahakoa nga whakaaro o te Kōti o te Ture, kāore anō nga kōti ā iwi o ngā kāwanatanga mema kia whakaae ki taua tātaritanga ōrite.
question: Mēnā he papā i waenganui i te ture EU me te ture ā-motu, ko tēhea ture e tika ana?

question: He aha te take i hoatu ai e te kōti Kawanatanga o Itari i ngaro ai tana kerēme ki a ENEL?

context: Mai i tōna whakatūnga, kua mahi te EU i waenganui i te nui haere o ngā pūnaha ā-ture ā-motu, huri noa hoki. Ko te tikanga o tēnei, me hanga e te Kōti o Ūropi o te Ture me ngā kōti ā iwi tiketike rawa ngā tikanga hei whakatika i ngā papā o ngā ture i waenganui i ngā pūnaha rerekē. I roto i te EU anō, ko te tirohanga a te Kōti o te Ture, mēnā e papā ana te ture EU ki tētahi whakaritenga ture ā iwi, kātahi ka whai mana te ture EU. I te kēhi nui tuatahi i te tau 1964, i te tau kotahi mano I kī a ia i papā te ture whakakotahitanga Itari ki te Tiriti o Roma, ā, i tonoa he tohutoro ki te Kōti Kawanatanga o Itari me te Kōti o te Ture i raro i te tuhipānui 267 o TFUE. I whakaaro te Kōti Kawanatanga o Itari, nā te mea nō te tau 1962 te ture whakakotahitanga, ā, i mana te tiriti mai i te tau 1958, kaore he kerēme a Costa. He taumira, i puritia e te Kōti o te Ture, i te mutunga kāore te Tiriti o Roma i ārai i te whakakotahitanga pūngao, ā, ahakoa he aha i raro i ngā whakaritenga o te Tiriti, ko te Kōmihana anake i āhei ki te kawe mai i tētahi kerēme, ehara i a Tēnā Koto. Heoi anō, i runga i te tikanga, i whai wāhi a Tēnā Koto ki te tohe e papā ana te Tiriti ki te ture ā iwi, ā, ka whai tikanga te kōti ki te whakaaro i tana tono kia tohutoro mehemea kaore he tono ki tana whakataunga. I kī te Kōti o te Ture, i te tāruatanga o tōna tirohanga i Van Gend en Loos, i ngā kāwanatanga mema "ahakoa i roto i ngā rohe whāiti, kua rāhuitia ō rātou mana ariki, ā, kua waihangatia he tinana ture e pā ana ki ō rātou iwi, ki a rātou anō hoki" i runga i te "take o te taurangi". E kore te ture EU e "takahi e ngā whakaritenga ā-ture o te kāinga, ahakoa te tāpare... me te kore e pātaitia te take ā-ture o te iwi anō." Ko te tikanga o tēnei ko tētahi "mahi kotahi whai muri" o te āhua mema e kore e hāngai. Waihoki, i roto i te Amministrazione delle Finanze v Simmenthal SpA, i kī tētahi kamupene, a Simmenthal SpA, he utu arotake hauora tūmatanui i raro i tētahi ture Itari o te tau 1970 mō te kawemai mīti kau mai i Wīwī ki Itari, e hāngai ana ki ngā Ture e rua mai i te 1964 me te 1968. "E ai ki te tikanga o te tuatahi o te ture Hapori," te kī a te Kōti o te Ture, ko ngā "tikanga hāngai tonu o ngā rōpū" (pēnei i ngā Ture i te kēhi) "ka kore e hāngai aunoa ki tētahi whakaritenga papā o te ture ā-motu o nāianei". I hiahiatia tēnei hei ārai i tētahi "whakakāhoretanga ōrite" o te Tiriti "ngā here e mahia ana e ngā āhuatanga mema", tērā pea ka "whakararuraru i ngā tūāpapa o te" EU. Engari ahakoa nga whakaaro o te Kōti o te Ture, kāore anō nga kōti ā iwi o ngā kāwanatanga mema kia whakaae ki taua tātaritanga ōrite.
question: Ko tēhea kōti i tautohe kāore te Tiriti o Roma i ārai i te whakakotahitanga pūngao?

context: Kāore tētahi o ngā tiriti taketake e whakatū ana i te Uniana o Ūropi e whakahua ana i te parenga mō ngā mana taketake. Kāore i whakaarotia mō ngā tikanga o te Uniana o Ūropi, arā, he mahi ture, whakahaere hoki a ngā rōpū o te Uniana o Ūropi, kia herea ki ngā mana tangata. I taua wā, ko te āwangawanga anake kia āraia ngā āhuatanga mema kia kaua e tūkino i ngā mana tangata, nā reira ko te whakatūnga o te Whakaritenga o Ūropi mō ngā Motika Tangata i te tau 1950 me te whakatūnga o te Kōti Motika Tangata o Ūropi. I mōhiotia e te Kōti o Ūropi o te Ture ngā mana taketake hei mātāpono ahuwhānui o te ture o Ūropi, hei hiahia kia tino mōhio ai e hototahi ana ngā tikanga o te Uniana o Ūropi ki ngā mana tangata e whakairotia ana i roto i te kaupapa ture o ngā āhuatanga mema. I te tau 1999 ka whakatūria e te Kaunihera o Ūropi tētahi tinana e taumahi ana ki te whakatakoto i tētahi Take Motika Tangata o Ūropi, e āhei ana ki te hanga i te kaupapa ā-ture mō te Uniana o Ūropi, ā, i whakaritea tauwhāititia hei hoatu ki te Uniana o Ūropi me ōna rōpū. Ka tātuhia e te Take o ngā Mōtika Tūturu o te Uniana o Ūropi tētahi rārangi o ngā motika taketake mai i te Whakaritenga o Ūropi mō ngā Mōtika Tangata me ngā Wāteatanga Taketake, te Whakapuakitanga mō ngā Mōtika Tūturu i hangaia e te Pāremata o Ūropi i te tau 1989 me ngā Tiriti o te Uniana o Ūropi.

context: I muri i te pōtitanga o te Rōpū Mahi o UK ki te kāwanatanga i te tau 1997, ka ohauru tika te UK ki te Whakaaetanga mō te Kaupapahere Pāpori, nāna i whakaae kia whakaurua ki ngā menemana iti hei Ūpoko Pāpori o te Tiriti o Tūtukupu 1997. I muri iho ka whakaaetia e te UK te ture matua i whakaaetia i mua i raro i te Whakaaetanga mo te Kaupapahere Pāpori, te Tohutohu Kaunihera Mahi 1994, e hiahiatia ana he whakaaro kaimahi i roto i ngā umanga, me te Tohutohu Waiho Mātua o te tau 1996. I roto i ngā tau e 10 i muri mai i te Tiriti o Tūtukupu 1997 me te whakatamatamatanga o te Ūpoko Pāpori, kua mahia e te Uniana o Ūropi ngā mahi kaupapahere i ngā wāhi kaupapahere pāpori, tae atu ki ngā pānga mahi me ngā pānga mahi, te wātea ōrite, te hauora me te haumarutanga, te hauora tūmatanui, te parenga o ngā tamariki, te hunga hauā me ngā pakeke, te rawakore, ngā kaimahi kaiheke, te mātauranga, te whakangungu me te taitamariki.

text: whakaaro kaimahi i roto i ngā umanga

context: Te ngahere o Amazon (Potukara: Floresta Amazônica or Amazônia; Pāniora: Selva Amazónica, Amazonía, Amazonia rānei; Wīwī: Forêt amazonienne; Tatimana: Amazoneregenwoud), e mōhiotia ana hoki i te reo Ingarihi ko Amazonia, ko te Amazon Jungle rānei, he ngahere rau mākū e kapi ana i te nuinga o te peihana Amazon o Amerika ki te Tonga. Kei roto i tēnei peihana te 7,000,000 kiromita tapawhā (2,700,000 sq mi), e 5,500,000 kiromita tapawhā (2,100,000 sq mi) e hipokina ana e te ngaherehere. Kei roto i tēnei rohe ko te rohe o nga iwi e iwa. Ko te nuinga o te ngahere kei roto i Paratira, me te 60% o te ngaherehere, whai muri i Peru me te 13%, Colombia me te 10%, me te iti o te nuinga i Venezuela, Ecuador, Bolivia, Guyana, Suriname me French Guiana. Kei roto i ngā kāwanatanga, i ngā tari rānei i ngā iwi e whā ko "Amazonas" i roto i ō rātou ingoa. Ko Amazon e tohu ana i te haurua o ngā ngahere e toe ana o te aorangi, ā, ko te wāhi nui rawa atu o te ngahere ā-rangi i te ao, e 390 miriona ngā rākau takitahi i wehea ki te 16,000 momo.
question: Ko tēhea ingoa e whakamahia ana hoki hei whakaahua i te ngahere o Amazon i te reo Ingarihi?

question: He aha te whakatau tata mo te nui o ngā momo rākau i te ngahere marangai o amazon?

context: I waenganui i te 1991 me te 2000, ka piki te rohe katoa o te ngahere i ngaro i Amazon mai i te 415,000 ki te 587,000 kiromita tapawhā (160,000 ki te 227,000 sq mi), me te nuinga o te ngahere ngaro hei tarutaru mo te kau. E whitu tekau ōrau o ngā whenua ngahere o mua i Amazon, me te 91% o ngā whenua i whakangaheretia mai i te tau 1970, ka whakamahia hei tarutaru kararehe. I tēnei wā, ko Paratira te kaiwhakanao pīni tuarua nui rawa o te ao i muri i Te Hononga o Amerika. Heoi anō, kua whakaaturia e te rangahau hōu, i whakahaeretia e Leydimere Oliveira et al., ko te nui ake o te ngahere e rangitaki ana i Amazon, ko te iti iho o te timatanga ka tae ki te rohe, ā, ko te iti iho o te hua mō ia heketea. Nā reira, ahakoa te whakaaro kaingākautia, kāore he painga ohaoha mō Paratira mai i te rangitaki i ngā rohe ngahere me te tahuri i ēnei ki ngā mara hepara.

question: He aha te ōrau o te whenua i whakawāteatia i Amazon e whakamahia ana mō te whakatipu kararehe?

context: Kua whakamahia ngā hiahia o ngā kaiahuwhenua hei whakatika i te nuinga o ngā kaupapa waka tautohetohe e tipu ana i Amazon. I tutuki pai te whakatuwheratanga o ngā huarahi tuatahi e rua i te ngaherehere, ā, ka nui ake te nohoanga me te whakawhāititanga. Ko te toharite o te whakawhāititanga ā-tau mai i te 2000 ki te 2005 (22,392 km2, 8,646 sq mi rānei ia tau) he 18% teitei ake i ngā tau e rima ki mua (19,018 km2, 7,343 sq mi rānei ia tau). Ahakoa kua tino heke te whakawhāititanga i te Amazon o Pārihia i waenganui i te 2004 me te 2014, kua nui ake ki tēnei rā.
question: Ko ngā huarahi i hangaia i te ngahere o Amazon i hangaia nuitia mō tēhea momo kaiahuwhenua?

context: Kua whakamahia ngā hiahia o ngā kaiahuwhenua hei whakatika i te nuinga o ngā kaupapa waka tautohetohe e tipu ana i Amazon. context: E māharahara ana nga kaitiaki taiao mo te ngaromanga o te tipua tipua ka puta mai i te whakangaromanga o te ngahere, me te tukunga o te waro i roto i te tipu, e whakatere ana i te whakamahana o te ao. Tata ki te 10% o ngā hua tuatahi o te ao me te 10% o ngā pātaka waro i roto i ngā pūnaha rauropi—o te raupapa o te 1.1 × te 1011 ngahuru waro. context: I te tau 2010 ka pā ki te ngahere o Amazon tētahi atu tauraki nui, i ētahi āhuatanga tino taumaha atu i te tauraki o te tau 2005. Tata ki te 1,160,000 maire tapawhā (3,000,000 km2) o te ngahere te rohe pāngia, i whakaritea ki te 734,000 maire tapawhā (1,900,000 km2) i te tau 2005. E toru ngā pūkenga o te tauraki o te tau 2010 i mate ai te tipu, ā, i te tau 2005 i arotahi te tauraki ki te taha ki te tonga-māuru. I whakaputaina nga kitenga i roto i te tuhitaka Pūtaiao. I tētahi tau noa iho ka ngongo te Amazon i te 1.5 gigatons o te waro taikura; I te tau 2005 kē, e 5 ngā gigatons i tukua, ā, i te tau 2010 e 8 gigatons i tukua.

context: Tata ki te katoa o ngā ctenophores he kaiwhaiwhai, e mau ana i ngā pārurenga mai i ngā moroiti moroiti me ngā rotifers ki ngā pakeke o ngā crustacean iti; Ko ngā okotahi he tamariki o ngā momo e rua, e noho ana hei pirinoa i runga i ngā salps e kai ai ngā pakeke o tō rātou momo. I roto i ngā āhuatanga pai, ka taea e ngā ctenophores te kai tekau wā i tō rātou ake taumaha i te rā. E 100–150 anake ngā momo kua whakamanatia, ā, tērā pea e 25 anō kāore anō kia tino whakaahuatia, kia whakaingoatia hoki. Ko ngā tauira pukapuka ko ngā cydippids me ngā tinana āhua hēki, ā, he tēneti e rua e taea ana te kounu i te tēneti ("teneti iti") e hipokina ana ki ngā pūtau piripiri e hopu ana i te pārurenga. He whānui ngā momo tinana o te phylum, tae atu ki ngā platyctenids papatahi, moana hōhonu, i reira kāore he heru o ngā pakeke o te nuinga o ngā momo, me ngā beroids takutai, kāore he teneti me te pārurenga ki ētahi atu ctenophores mā te whakamahi i ngā waha nunui e mau ana i ngā rōpū cilia nui, mārō e mahi ana hei niho. Mā ēnei rerekētanga e āhei ai ngā momo rerekē ki te hanga i ngā iwi whānui nui i te wāhi kotahi, nā te mea he tohunga rātou ki ngā momo pārurenga rerekē, e hopukina ana e rātou mā te whānui o ngā tikanga e whakamahia ana e te pūngāwerewere.

Mā ēnei rerekētanga e āhei ai ngā momo rerekē ki te hanga i ngā iwi whānui nui i te wāhi kotahi, nā te mea he tohunga rātou ki ngā momo pārurenga rerekē, e hopukina ana e rātou mā te whānui o ngā tikanga e whakamahia ana e te pūngāwerewere.
question: He aha ngā beroids takutai kāore i a ētahi atu ctenophora?

question: E hia ngā momo ctenohore rerekē?

context: Ahakoa o rātau tinana ngohengohe, gelatinous, ko ngā fossil e whakaarotia ana e tohu ana i ngā ctenophores, ko te āhua nei kāore he teneti, engari he maha ake ngā haupae heru i ngā puka o nāianei, kua kitea i roto i te lagerstätten tae noa ki te Cambrian tōmua, tata ki te 515 miriona tau ki mua. Kua roa te tautohetohe i te tūnga o ngā ctenophores i roto i te rākau whānau kunenga o ngā kararehe, ā, ko te tirohanga nui i tēnei wā, i runga anō i te phylogenetics rāpoi ngota, he pātata kē atu ngā cnidarians me ngā bilaterians ki a rāua anō i ngā ctenophores. I whakamutua e tētahi tātaritanga phylogenetics rāpoi ngota o nā noa nei ko te tīpuna noa iho o ngā ctenophores katoa o nāianei he rite ki te cydippid, ā, i puta mai ngā rōpū hōu katoa inā noa nei, tērā pea i muri i te takahanga whakangaro o Cretaceous–Paleogene 66 miriona tau ki mua. Ko ngā whakaaturanga e whakaemi ana mai i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā waru e tohu ana ehara ngā "cydippids" i te monophyletic, ki tētahi atu kupu, kāore i roto i te katoa, i ngā uri anake o tētahi tīpuna kotahi, nā te mea ko ērā atu rōpū ctenophore tūturu he uri nō ngā momo cydippids.

context: Nā ō rātou tinana ngohengohe, gelatinous, he tino āhua kore nei ngā ctenophores hei fossil, ā, ko ngā fossil kua whakamāramatia hei ctenophores kua kitea anake i roto i te lagerstätten, ngā wāhi i tino pai ai te taiao ki te tiaki i te kikokiko ngohengohe. Tae noa ki te waenganui o ngā tau 1990 e rua noa iho ngā tauira pai mō te tātaritanga i mōhiotia, ko ngā mema o te rōpū karauna, mai i te wā o mua o Devonian (Emsian). E toru anō ngā momo whakaaro i kitea i roto i te Burgess Shale me ētahi atu toka Kānata e ōrite ana te pakeke, tata ki te 505 miriona tau ki muri i te wā waenganui o Cambrian. Ko te āhua nei kāore he teneti o ngā mea e toru, engari i waenganui i te 24 me te 80 ngā haupae heru, neke atu i te 8 noa iho o ngā momo ora. Te āhua nei hoki he hanganga ā-okana ā-roto tā rātou kāore i rite ki ngā mea katoa e kitea ana i roto i ngā ctenophores ora. Ko tētahi o ngā momo fossil i pūrongotia tuatahitia i te tau 1996 he waha nui, ko te āhua nei e karapotia ana e tētahi tapa kōpaki tērā pea he uaua. Ko ngā whakaaturanga mai i Haina i te tau i muri mai e tohu ana he whānui aua ctenophores i te Cambrian, engari he tino rerekē pea i te momo o nāianei – hei tauira, i whakatūria ngā haupae heru o tētahi fossil ki runga i ngā vanes tūturu. Ka taea e te Ediacaran Eoandromeda te tohu i te tiēre heru.

context: He tino hira te whanaungatanga o ngā ctenophores ki te toenga o Metazoa ki tō tātau mōhiotanga ki te kunenga tōmua o ngā kararehe me te takenga mai o te pūtau maha. He maha nga tau te arotahi o te taupatupatu. Ko ngā Ctenophores te whakapapa tuahine o te Bilateria, te tuahine o te Cnidaria, te tuahine o Cnidaria, te Placozoa me te Bilateria, me te tuahine o ērā atu phyla kararehe katoa. He rangatū o ngā akoranga e titiro ana ki te aroaro me te ngaro o ngā mema o ngā whānau ira me ngā ara tohu (hei tauira, homeoboxes, ngā kaiwhiwhi karihi, te ara tohu Wnt, me ngā hongere konutai) i whakaatu i ngā whakaaturanga e hāngai ana ki ngā tauari e rua whakamutunga, he tuahine rānei ngā ctenophores ki Cnidaria, Placozoa me Bilateria, tuahine rānei ki ērā atu phyla kararehe katoa. He maha ngā akoranga o nā tata nei e whakataurite ana i ngā huinga raupapa katoa o ngā ctenophores ki ētahi atu huinga kararehe raupapa, kua tautokona hoki ngā ctenophores hei whakapapa tuahine ki ērā atu kararehe katoa. Mā tēnei tūnga e huatau kua ngaro ngā momo pūtau neural me ngā uaua i roto i ngā whakapapa kararehe nui (hei tauira, Porifera), ka tipu takitahi rānei i roto i te whakapapa ctenophore. Heoi anō, kua tautohe ētahi atu kairangahau ko te whakanohonga o Ctenophora hei tuahine ki ērā atu kararehe katoa, he āhuatanga tatauranga i takea mai i te nui o te kunenga i roto i ngā huinga ctenophore, ā, ko Porifera (hautai) kē te phylum kararehe kōaro tuatahi. Ko ngā ctenophores me ngā hautai anake te phyla kararehe e mōhiotia ana kāore he ira hox pono.

context: Kei roto i te takiwā ko Kearney Boulevard, i tapaina ki te kaipakihi o te rau tau 20 me te mirionea M. Theo Kearney, e toro atu ana mai i Fresno Street i Southwest Fresno tata ki te 20 mi (32 km) ki te hauauru ki Kerman, California. He huarahi ā-taiwhenua iti, e rua ara mō te nuinga o tōna roanga, ko Kearney Boulevard e rārangi ana i ngā nikau teitei. He huarahi ā-taiwhenua iti, e rua ara mō te nuinga o tōna roanga, ko Kearney Boulevard e rārangi ana i ngā nikau teitei. Ko te hāwhe maero o Kearney Boulevard i waenganui i Fresno Street me Thorne Ave i tētahi wā te wāhi pai mō ngā whānau rangatira o Awherika-Amerika o Fresno. Ko tētahi atu wāhanga, ko Brookhaven, i te taha tonga o te Taha Uru ki te tonga o Jensen me te hauauru o Elm, i tapaina te ingoa e te Kaunihera Taone o Fresno ki te whakaora anō i te whakaahua o te rohe. He maha nga tau e mōhiotia ana te wehenga tūhāhā ko te "Dogg Pound" e pā ana ki tētahi rōpū paetata, ā, i te mutunga o te tau 2008 e mōhiotia tonutia ana mō ngā taumata tiketike o te hara taikaha.
question: I waenganui i ēhea tiriti e rua i Kearney Boulevard i noho ai ngā Āwherika-Amerika rangatira i tētahi wā?

context: E whakaratohia ana a Fresno e te State Route 99, te huarahi nui ki te raki/tonga e tūhono ana i ngā pokapū taupori nui o California Central Valley. Ko te Ara Kāwanatanga 168, te Sierra Freeway, e haere ana ki te rāwhiti ki te taone o Clovis me Huntington Lake. Ka tae mai te Ara Kāwanatanga 41 (Yosemite Freeway/Eisenhower Freeway) ki Fresno mai i Atascadero i te tonga, kātahi ka haere ki te raki ki Yosemite. Ko te Ara Kāwanatanga 180 (Kings Canyon Freeway) e haere mai ana i te hauauru mā Mendota, mai i te rāwhiti i Kings Canyon National Park e haere ana ki te taone o Reedley.

context: Ko Fresno te taone nui rawa o U.S. kāore i te hono hāngai ki tētahi huarahi Interstate. I te waihangatanga o te Pūnaha Huarahi Interstate i ngā tau 1950, ka whakatauria kia hangaia te mea ināianei ko Interstate 5 i te taha ki te hauauru o te Riu Waenganui, ā, mā reira ka karo i te nuinga o ngā pokapū iwi whānui i te rohe, kaua e whakamohoa i te Ara Kāwanatanga 99 ināianei. Nā te tere o te pikinga o te iwi whānui me ngā waka i ngā tāone i te SR 99, tae atu ki te hiahia o te pūtea a te Hau, he nui ngā kōrero kua mahia hei whakapai ake ki ngā paerewa ā-rohe, ā, i te mutunga ka whakaurua ki roto i te pūnaha ā-rohe, tērā pea ko Interstate 9. Kei te haere tonu ngā whakapainga nui ki te waitohu, te whānui o te ara, te wehenga waenganui, te whakawātea poutū, me ētahi atu āwangawanga.
question: Ko tēhea te taone nui rawa kāore i te tūhono ki tētahi huarahi ā-rohe?

context: I roto i te aratau korehononga, kei ia pōkai ko ngā mōhiohio wāhitau katoa. Ka arareretia takitahitia ngā pōkai, i ētahi wā ka rerekē ngā ara me te tukunga kāore i te raupapa. Kua tapaina ia pōkai ki tētahi wāhitau ūnga, wāhitau pūtake, me ngā tau tauranga. Ka taea hoki te tapa ki te tau raupapa o te pōkai. Mā tēnei e aukati te hiahia mō tētahi ara whakaihi hei āwhina i te pōkai ki te kimi i tōna ara ki tōna ūnga, engari ko te tikanga kia nui ake ngā mōhiohio e hiahiatia ana i roto i te pane pōkai, nō reira he nui ake, ā, me kimi ēnei mōhiohio i roto i te pūmahara ihirangi hiakai hiko. Ka tukuna ia pōkai, ā, ka haere mā ngā ara rerekē; Tērā pea, me mahi te pūnaha i te nui o ngā mahi mō ia pōkai pērā ki te pūnaha tūhononga i roto i te tatūnga hononga, engari he iti iho ngā mōhiohio e pā ana ki ngā whakaritenga o te taupānga. I te ūnga, ka huihuia anōtia te karere/raraunga taketake ki te raupapa tika, i runga anō i te tau raupapa pōkai. Nā reira ka tukua tētahi tūhononga mariko, e mōhiotia ana hoki ko te ara iahiko mariko, te roma paita rānei ki te kaiwhakamahi whakamutunga e tētahi kawa apa kawenga, ahakoa ko ngā kōpuku whatunga takawaenga anake e whakarato ana i tētahi ratonga apa whatunga kore hononga.

context: I te tau 1969 ka mahi a ARPANET me SITA HLN. I mua i te whakaurunga o X.25 i te tau 1973, tata ki te rua tekau ngā hangarau whatunga rerekē i hangaia. E rua ngā rerekētanga taketake e pā ana ki te wehenga o ngā taumahi me ngā tūmahi i waenganui i ngā kaihautū i te tapa o te whatunga me te uho whatunga. context: Ko te DECnet he huinga kawa whatunga i hangaia e Digital Equipment Corporation, i whakaputaina tuatahitia i te tau 1975 hei tūhono i ngā rorohiko iti PDP-11 e rua. I huri hei tētahi o ngā hoahoa whatunga hoa-ki-hoa tuatahi, nā reira i huri ai te DEC hei whare whatunga i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. I te tuatahi i hangaia me ngā apa e toru, i muri mai (1982) ka huri hei kawa whatunga e whitu-apa OSI. I hoahoatia katoatia ngā kawa DECnet e te Digital Equipment Corporation. Heoi anō, ko te DECnet Phase II (me muri ake) he paerewa tuwhera me ngā whakaritenga kua whakaputaina, ā, he maha ngā whakatinanatanga i hangaia i waho o DEC, tae atu ki tētahi mō Linux.

context: I hangaia te Merit Network, Inc., he kaporeihana 501(c)(3) kore hua e whakahaeretia ana e ngā whare wānanga tūmatanui o Michigan, i te tau 1966 hei Triad Mōhiohio Rangahau Mātauranga o Michigan hei tūhura i te whatunga rorohiko i waenganui i ngā whare wānanga tūmatanui e toru o Michigan hei āwhina i te whanaketanga mātauranga me te whanaketanga ohaoha o te kāwanatanga. Mā te tautoko tuatahi mai i te Kāwanatanga o Michigan me te National Science Foundation (NSF), i whakaaturia tuatahitia te whatunga whakawhiti pōkai i Tīma 1971 i te wā i hangaia he kaihautū tauwhitiwhiti ki te tūhononga kaihautū i waenganui i ngā pūnaha rorohiko matua IBM i te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wā I Whiringahora 1972 ka oti i ngā tūhononga ki te mainframe CDC i te Whare Wānanga o Michigan State i East Lansing te toru. I roto i ngā tau maha e whai ake nei, i tua atu i te kaihautū ki te kaihautū i ngā tūhononga tauwhitiwhiti, i whakarei ake te whatunga ki te tautoko i ngā tūhononga kāpeka ki te kaihautū, te kaihautū ki te kaihautū i ngā tūhononga rōpu (tāpaetanga mahi mamao, tā mamao, whakawhiti kōnae rōpu), whakawhitinga kōnae tauwhiti, waharoa ki ngā whatunga raraunga tūmatanui Tymnet me Telenet, ngā āpitihanga kaihautū X.25, ngā waharoa ki ngā whatunga raraunga X.25,  Ka hono atu ki te whatunga ngā kaihautū āpiti Ethernet, ā, kātahi anō ka hono te TCP/IP me ētahi atu whare wānanga tūmatanui i Michigan ki te whatunga. Nā ēnei mea katoa i tautuhi te wāhanga mō te mahi a Merit i roto i te kaupapa NSFNET e tīmata ana i te waenganui o ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua.

context: Ko te Internet2 he whakawhāiti whatunga rorohiko o Te Hononga o Amerika e arahina ana e ngā mema mai i ngā hapori rangahau me te mātauranga, te umanga, me te kāwanatanga. I hangaia e te hapori Internet2, i roto i te mahi ngātahi me Qwest, te Whatunga Internet2 tuatahi, e kiia nei ko Abilene, i te tau 1998, ā, he kaiwhakangao matua i roto i te kaupapa National LambdaRail (NLR). I te tau 2006, i pānuitia e Internet2 tētahi mahi ngātahi me te Taumata 3 Whakawhitiwhitinga hei whakarewa i tētahi whatunga hōu puta noa i te motu, e whakarewa ana i tōna kaha mai i te 10 Gbit/s ki te 100 Gbit/s. I Whiringahora, 2007, i whakamutua e Internet2 a Abilene, ā, ināianei e pā ana ki tōna whatunga hōu, teitei ake te kaha hei Whatunga Internet2.

context: I te wā o te Tau o Waenganui, kua whakarākeitanga te mātauranga rongoā. Ko te kōrero tino whai mana i taua wā i ahu mai i te māngai tākuta i Parihi i roto i tētahi pūrongo ki te kīngi o Wīwī e whakapae ana i te rangi, i te āhua o te hononga o ngā aorangi e toru i te tau 1345 i puta ai he "mate uruta nui i te rangi". Ka noho tēnei pūrongo ko te tuatahi, ā, ko te nuinga o ngā pukapuka mate uruta e whai ana ki te hoatu tohutohu ki te hunga mate. Na te hau kino te mate uruta i puta mai ai te ariā tino whakaaetia. I tēnei rā, e mōhiotia ana tēnei ko te ariā Miasma. Kāore he tikanga motuhake o te kupu 'mate uruta' i tēnei wā, ā, ko te hohokitanga anake o ngā tīmatanga i te wā o te Tau Waenganui, i tapaina ai te ingoa kua noho hei kupu rongoā.

Ka noho tēnei pūrongo ko te tuatahi, ā, ko te nuinga o ngā pukapuka mate uruta e whai ana ki te hoatu tohutohu ki te hunga mate. Na te hau kino te mate uruta i puta mai ai te ariā tino whakaaetia. I tēnei rā, e mōhiotia ana tēnei ko te ariā Miasma. Kāore he tikanga motuhake o te kupu 'mate uruta' i tēnei wā, ā, ko te hohokitanga anake o ngā tīmatanga i te wā o te Tau Waenganui, i tapaina ai te ingoa kua noho hei kupu rongoā.
question: He aha te ariā hau kino e mōhiotia ana?

context: I kitea hoki e te mātauranga e rua ngā kōpae kāore i te mōhiotia i mua, engari e pā ana ki ngā peka iranga, o te huinga Y. pestis e pā ana ki ngā urupa maha o te wā o mua. I kitea ēnei kōpae (e whakaarotia ana kua ngaro) he tupuna ki ngā wehenga o nāianei o ngā momo Y. p. pestis o nāianei o Y. p. orientalis me Y. p. medievalis, e hua ana kua tomo pea te mate uruta ki Uropi i roto i ngā ngaru e rua. Ko ngā rangahau o ngā toenga o te poka mate uruta i Wīwī me Ingarangi e tohu ana ko te momo tuatahi i tomo ki Uropi mā te tauranga o Marseille i te wā o Whiringa 1347, ā, ka horapa puta noa i Wīwī i roto i ngā tau e rua e whai ake nei, kātahi anō ka tae ki Ingarangi i te kōanga o te tau 1349, i reira ka horapa puta noa i te whenua i roto i ngā urutā e toru. Ko ngā rangahau o ngā toenga o te poka mate uruta mai i te taone o Tatimana o Bergen op Zoom i whakaatu i te momo ira o Y. pestis e haepapa ana i te mate urutā i horapa puta noa i ngā Whenua Iti mai i te tau 1350 i rerekē i tērā i kitea i Ingarangi me Wīwī, e tohu ana kāore a Bergen op Zoom (me ētahi atu wāhi pea o Hōrana ki te tonga) i pāngia hāngai mai i Ingarangi, i Wīwī rānei i te tau 1349, ā, e hua ana i tētahi ngaru tuarua o te mate uruta,  he rerekē i ērā i Ingarangi me Wīwī, tērā pea i kawea ki ngā Whenua Iti mai i Nōwei, i ngā tāone Hanseatic, i tētahi atu wāhi rānei.
