question: Āhea te y. pestis i tae atu ai ki Ingarangi?

context: He maha ngā whiringa ki te Y. pestis kua whakamuatia. I huatau a Twigg he momo anthrax te take, ā, i whakaaro a Norman Cantor (2001) tērā pea he pahekotanga o te anthrax me ētahi atu taiepa. Kua tautohe a Scott rāua ko Duncan ko te mate urutā he momo mate urutā e whakaahuatia ana he mate uruta hemorrhagic e rite ana ki te Tīpoka. Kua tautohe te kaimātai whenua o Barney Sloane, he iti rawa ngā whakaaturanga o te ngaronga o te nui o ngā kiore i roto i te pūkete whaiwhenua o te taha moana o te wā o mua i Rānana, ā, he tere rawa te hora o te mate uruta ki te tautoko i te whakaaro i horahia te Y. pestis i te puruhi i runga i te kiore; E tautohe ana a ia ko te tikanga ko te tarenga he tangata ki te tangata. Heoi anō, kāore he rongoā whirinoa kotahi i tutuki i te whakaaetanga whānui. He tokomaha ngā tohunga e tautohe ana mō te Y. pestis hei māngai nui o te taiepa, e hua ana ka taea te whakamārama i tōna whānuitanga me ngā āhuatanga e te pahekotanga o te mate urutā me ētahi atu mate, tae atu ki te typhus, te korokoro me ngā mate romahā. I tua atu i te mate uruta, ko ētahi e tohu ana ki ētahi atu momo mate uruta (he momo "paitini toto") me te niumonika (he mate uruta ā-hau e whakaeke ana i ngā pūkahukahu i mua i te toenga o te tinana) o te mate uruta, e whakaroa ana i te roanga o ngā tīmatanga puta noa i ngā tau, ā, ka āwhina ki te pūkete mō tōna nui o te mate mate me ētahi atu āhuatanga kua pūketetia. I te tau 2014, ka pānuitia e ngā kaipūtaiao me te Hauora Tūmatanui o Ingarangi ngā hua o te whakamātautau i ngā tinana e 25 i hunaia mai i te takiwā o Clerkenwell o Rāwāhi, tae atu ki ngā wira i rēhitatia ki Rāwāhi i taua wā, nāna i tautoko te whakaaro niumoni.

question: E hia ngā tinana i whakaputaina e Public Health England?

context: I te tau 1466, e 40,000 pea ngā tāngata i mate i te mate uruta i Parihi. I te rau tau 16 me te 17, tata ki te 30 hēneti o te wā te mate uruta i Parihi. E toru tau i tukitukia ai e te Mate Pango a Uropi i mua i te haere tonu ki Rūhia, i reira te mate i tētahi wāhi o te whenua e 25 ngā wā i waenganui i te 1350 ki te 1490. I te tau 1563, 1593, 1603, 1625, 1636, me te 1665, ka whakahekea tōna taupori mā te 10 ki te 30% i aua tau. Neke atu i te 10% o te taupori o Tūtukupu i mate i te tau 1623–25, ā, i te tau 1635–36, 1655, me te 1664. E 22 ngā wā i puta ai te mate uruta i Venice i waenganui i te 1361 me te 1528. I mate te mate uruta o te tau 1576–77 e 50,000 i Venice, tata ki te tuatoru o te iwi whānui. Ko ngā tīmatanga tōmuri i Ūropi waenganui, ko te Mate Itari o te tau 1629–1631, e pā ana ki ngā nekenekehanga hōia i te Pakanga Toru Tekau Tau, me te Whiu Nui o Vienna i te tau 1679. Neke atu i te 60% o te taupori o Nōwei i mate i te tau 1348–50. I te tau 1654 ka tukitukia a Oslo i te mate uruta whakamutunga.

question: E hia ngā wā i puta ai te mate uruta i Venice?

context: I tūkinotia e te Mate Pango te nuinga o te ao Ingarihi. I ia tau i waenganui i te 1500 me te 1850 te mate uruta i tētahi wāhi i te ao Māori. He rite tonu te pānga o te mate uruta ki ngā tāone o Awherika ki te Raki. I ngaro a Algiers i te 30 ki te 50 mano tangata i te tau 1620–21, ā, i te tau 1654–57, 1665, 1691, me te 1740–42. I noho tonu te mate uruta hei takahanga nui i roto i te iwi o Ottoman tae noa ki te hauwhā tuarua o te rau tau 19. I waenganui i te 1701 me te 1750, e toru tekau mā whitu ngā urutā nui ake, iti iho hoki i tuhia ki Constantinople, ā, e toru tekau mā tahi anō i waenganui i te 1751 me te 1800. Kua tino pāngia a Baghdad i ngā toronga o te mate uruta, ā, i ētahi wā kua horoia te rua tuatoru o tōna iwi whānui.

context: Ko ngā rārangi wā e whā e whai ake nei e whakaatu ana i te tauine wā papawhenua. Ko te tuatahi e whakaatu ana i te wā katoa mai i te hanganga o te Ao ki tēnei wā, engari ka kōpeketia e tēnei te eon o nā noa nei. Nō reira, ko te tauine tuarua e whakaatu ana i te eon hōu rawa me te tauine whakawhānui. Ko te tauine tuarua e kōpeke ana i te wā o mua tata nei, nā reira ka whakawhānuitia te wā hōu rawa ki te tauine tuatoru. I te mea he wā poto rawa te Quaternary me ngā wā poto, ka whakawhānuitia anōtia ki te tauine tuawhā. Nō reira ko ngā rārangi wā tuarua, tuatoru, tuawhā hoki ia wāhanga o tō rātou rārangi wā o mua e whakaaturia ana e ngā whetū. He iti rawa te Holocene (te wā hou rawa) kia mārama ai te whakaatu i te rārangi wā tuatoru i te taha matau, tētahi atu take mō te whakawhānui i te tauine tuawhā. Te wā o Pleistocene (P). Ko te Q e tū ana mō te wā Quaternary.

context: Ko te tikanga o te takahanga kararehe e hāngai ana ki te āhua o ngā fossil i roto i ngā toka parataiao. I te tīariari o ngā rauropi i te wā kotahi puta noa i te ao, ka taea te whakamahi i tō rātou aroaro, i ētahi wā, i te ngaro rānei hei whakarato i tētahi pakeke pātahi o ngā hanganga e kitea ai. I runga anō i ngā mātāpono i whakatakotoria e William Smith tata ki te rau tau i mua i te tānga o te ariā o te kunenga a Charles Darwin, i hangaia takitahi ngā tikanga o te whakakapinga i te whakaaro kunenga. Heoi anō, he tino matatini te kaupapa, nā te rangirua o te fossilization, te whakawāteatanga o ngā momo fossil nā ngā huringa lateral i te wāhi noho (ka rerekē ngā mata i roto i ngā papanga parataiao), ā, kāore e kitea ngā fossil katoa i te ao whānui i te wā kotahi.

context: I roto i te taiwhanga, ka tātaritia e ngā stratigraphers ngā tauira o ngā wāhanga stratigraphic ka taea te whakahoki mai i te āpure, pērā i ērā mai i ngā uho wiri. Ka tātaritia hoki e ngā stratigraphers ngā raraunga mai i ngā rangahau matawhenua e whakaatu ana i ngā tauwāhi o ngā wae stratigraphic i roto i te papa. Ka taea te whakakotahi i ngā raraunga matawhenua me ngā rangitaki poka kia pai ake ai te tirohanga o te mataro, ā, ka whakamahia e ngā stratigraphers ngā papatono rorohiko hei mahi i tēnei i roto i ngā ahu e toru. Kātahi ka taea e ngā kaituhituhi te whakamahi i ēnei raraunga hei hanga anō i ngā tukanga tawhito e puta ana i runga i te mata o te Ao, te whakamārama i ngā taiao o mua, me te kimi i ngā wāhi mō te wai, te waro, me te unuhanga wai.

context: I roto i te taiwhanga, ka tātaritia e ngā stratigraphers ngā tauira o ngā wāhanga stratigraphic ka taea te whakahoki mai i te āpure, pērā i ērā mai i ngā uho wiri. Ka tātaritia hoki e ngā stratigraphers ngā raraunga mai i ngā rangahau matawhenua e whakaatu ana i ngā tauwāhi o ngā wae stratigraphic i roto i te papa. Ka taea te whakakotahi i ngā raraunga matawhenua me ngā rangitaki poka kia pai ake ai te tirohanga o te mataro, ā, ka whakamahia e ngā stratigraphers ngā papatono rorohiko hei mahi i tēnei i roto i ngā ahu e toru. Kātahi ka taea e ngā kaituhituhi te whakamahi i ēnei raraunga hei hanga anō i ngā tukanga tawhito e puta ana i runga i te mata o te Ao, te whakamārama i ngā taiao o mua, me te kimi i ngā wāhi mō te wai, te waro, me te unuhanga wai.

context: Ko ētahi tohunga o nāianei, pērā i a Fielding H. Garrison, e whakaaro ana ka taea te whakataki i te takenga mai o te pūtaiao papawhenua ki Pahia i muri i te mutunga o ngā raupatu a te Mohimana. Ko Apu al-Rayhan al-Biruni (973–1048 CE) tētahi o ngā kaimātai whenua o Pēhia tuatahi, ā, ko ana mahi ko ngā tuhinga tuatahi i runga i te papawhenua o Īnia, e whakaaro ana he moana te whenua ā-roto o Īnia. Ma te huti mai i nga tuhinga pūtaiao Kariki me Inia kaore i whakangaromia e nga raupatu a nga Mahometa, ka whakatakoto te tohunga Pahia a Ibn Sina (Avicenna, 981–1037) i nga whakamaramatanga taipitopito mo te hanganga o nga maunga, te takenga mai o nga ru, me etahi atu kaupapa matua ki te papawhenua o naianei, e whakarato ana i te niu nui mo te whanaketanga o te pūtaiao o muri ake. I Haina, i whakatakotoria e te polymath Shen Kuo (1031–1095) tētahi whakaaro mō te tukanga o te hanganga whenua: i runga anō i tana kitenga i ngā anga kararehe fossil i roto i tētahi papanga papawhenua i tētahi maunga e hia rau maero mai i te moana, ka whakatauria e ia i hangaia te whenua e te horo o ngā maunga me te whakatakotoranga para.

context: I te nuinga o te wā e kitea ana a Hemi Hutton ko te kaimātai whenua tuatahi o nāianei. I te tau 1785 ka whakaaturia e ia tētahi pepa e kīa nei ko Theory of the Earth ki te Royal Society of Edinburgh. I roto i tana pepa, ka whakamāramatia e ia tana ariā me pakeke kē atu te Ao i te mea i whakaarotia i mua kia nui ai te wā kia whakakinotia ai ngā maunga, kia hanga ai ngā parataiao i ngā toka hou i te takere o te moana, ā, ka whakaarahia kia noho hei whenua maroke. I whakaputaina e Hutton tētahi putanga pukapuka rua o ōna whakaaro i te tau 1795 (Vol. 1, Vol. 2).

text: Ko te tikanga he pakeke kē atu te Ao i te mea i whakaarohia i mua

context: Ko te kāinga tuatahi i tuhia i te wāhi e noho nei ko Newcastle ko Pons Aelius, he pā Roma me te piriti whakawhiti i te Awa o Tyne. I tapaina te ingoa whānau o te Emepara Roma o Hadrian, nāna i whakatū i te rau tau 2 AD. E tohu ana tēnei hōnore ātaahua tērā pea i haere a Hadrian ki te pae, a, ka whakatūria te piriti i tana haerenga ki Ingarangi. Ko te taupori o Pons Aelius i tēnei wā i whakaarohia ki te 2,000. Kei te kitea tonutia ngā kongakonga o te Pātū o Hadrian i ētahi wāhi o Newcastle, otirā i te Huarahi ki te Uru. Ka taea te whakataki i te ara o te "Pātū Roma" whaka te rāwhiti ki te pā o Segedunum Roman i Wallsend—te "pito o te pakitara"—me te pā putunga o Arbeia i South Shields. Ko te whānuitanga o te Pātū o Hadrian e 73 maero (117 km), e whānui ana i Ingarangi; i whakaurua e te Pātū te Vallum, he rua nui whakamuri me ngā maunga whakarara, ā, i hangaia tuatahitia hei wawao, hei ārai i ngā nekeneke tē hiahiatia me te whakaekenga mai o ngā iwi Pictish mai i te raki, ehara i te raina whawhai mō tētahi whakaekenga nui.

context: I whakakapia e te Mākete Grainger tētahi mākete tōmua i hangaia tuatahitia i te tau 1808 e kiia nei ko te Butcher Market. I whakatuwheratia te Mākete Grainger i te tau 1835, ā, ko ia te mākete tuatahi o Newcastle. I te wā o tōna whakatuwheratanga i te tau 1835 i kīia ko tētahi o ngā mākete nui rawa, tino ātaahua hoki i Uropi. The opening was celebrated with a grand dinner attended by 2000 guests, and the Laing Art Gallery has a painting of this event. Hāunga te tuanui rākau i whakangaromia e te ahi i te tau 1901, ā, i whakakapia e ngā kopere tīra, ko te nuinga o te Mākete kei tōna āhua taketake. Ko te hoahoa o Grainger Market, pēnei i te nuinga o Grainger Town, he kōeke I, II rānei kua rārangitia, i whakarārangitia te kōeke I i te tau 1954 e English Heritage.

context: E whakaratohia ana te taone e te Tyne and Wear Metro, he pūnaha rerewhenua i te taha o te taha o te whenua, o raro hoki e kapi ana i te nuinga o Tyne me Wear. I whakatuwheratia i roto i ngā wāhanga e rima i waenganui i te 1980 me te 1984, ā, ko te pūnaha whakawhiti taone tuatahi o Ingarangi; E rua ngā toronga i whakatuwheratia i te tau 1991 me te 2002. I hangaia mai i te pahekotanga o ngā riu me ngā teihana tīariari me ngā pou hou i hangaia, me ngā kauhanga taumata hōhonu i hangaia puta noa i te pokapū o te taone o Newcastle. I hangaia he piriti puta noa i te Tyne, i waenganui i Newcastle me Gateshead, ā, i whakatuwheratia e Kuini Elizabeth II i te tau 1981. E whakahaeretia ana te whatunga e DB Regio mō Nexus, ā, neke atu i te 37 miriona ngā pāhihi i te tau, e toro atu ana ki te Taunga Rererangi o Newcastle, Tynemouth, South Shields me South Hylton i Sunderland. I te tau 2004, i hangaia e te kamupene Marconi te pūnaha reo irirangi pūkoro ki te pūnaha Metro o raro. Ko te pūnaha Metro te tuatahi i te UK kia tāutatia ngā pūhihi waea pūkoro ki roto i ngā kauhanga.

context: E rua ngā whare wānanga o te taone — te Whare Wānanga o Newcastle me te Whare Wānanga o Northumbria. Newcastle University has its origins in the School of Medicine and Surgery, established in 1834 and became independent from Durham University on 1 August 1963 to form the University of Newcastle upon Tyne. Ināianei ko te Whare Wānanga o Newcastle tētahi o ngā whare wānanga o te ao whānui o UK. I toa i a ia te whakawhiwhinga o te Whare Wānanga o te Tau o te Rātapu i te tau 2000. Ko te Whare Wānanga o Northumbria tōna takenga mai i te Kuratini o Newcastle, i whakatūria i te tau 1969, ā, ka noho ko te Whare Wānanga o Northumbria i Newcastle i te tau 1992 hei wāhanga o te tukanga whānui o UK i noho ai ngā kuratini hei whare wānanga hou. I pōtitia te Whare Wānanga o Northumbria ko te 'Whare Wānanga Hōu Tino Pai' e te Kaiārahi Whare Wānanga Pai o Te Wā 2005, ā, i toa hoki i tētahi whakawhiwhinga kamupene tino hiahia o te "Rōpū Whakahaere Tino Whakahohe IT" (i te UK), e te pukapuka ahumahi IT Computing.

context: I takea mai te V&A i te Whakaaturanga Nui o te tau 1851, i uru ai a Henry Cole, te kaiwhakahaere tuatahi o te whare taonga, ki te whakarite; i te tuatahi i mōhiotia ko te Museum of Manufactures, i whakatuwheratia tuatahitia i Mei 1852 i Marlborough House, engari i te wā o Mahuru kua whakawhitia ki te Whare o Somerset. I tēnei wāhanga ka kapi ngā kohinga i te toi me te pūtaiao. He maha ngā whakaaturanga o te Whakaaturanga i hokona hei hanga i te karihi o te kohinga. Tae noa ki Pēpuere 1854 ka haere ngā kōrero ki te whakawhiti i te whare taonga ki te wāhi o nāianei, ā, ka whakaingoatia anōtia ko te Whare Taonga o South Kensington. I te tau 1855 ka hangaia e te kaihoahoa Tiamana a Gottfried Semper, i runga i te tono a Cole, he hoahoa mō te whare taonga, engari i whakakāhoretia e te Poari Hokohoko he nui rawa te utu. I nohoia te pae e te Whare o Brompton Park; I whakawhānuitia tēnei tae atu ki ngā rūma tāmata tuatahi i whakatuwheratia i te tau 1857, ko te whare taonga te tuatahi i te ao ki te whakarato i tētahi pūkenga pērā.

question: He aha te ingoa tuatahi o te whare taonga?

text: Te Whare Taonga o nga Hanganga

context: I takea mai te V&A i te Whakaaturanga Nui o te tau 1851, i uru ai a Henry Cole, te kaiwhakahaere tuatahi o te whare taonga, ki te whakarite; i te tuatahi i mōhiotia ko te Museum of Manufactures, i whakatuwheratia tuatahitia i Mei 1852 i Marlborough House, engari i te wā o Mahuru kua whakawhitia ki te Whare o Somerset. I tēnei wāhanga ka kapi ngā kohinga i te toi me te pūtaiao. He maha ngā whakaaturanga o te Whakaaturanga i hokona hei hanga i te karihi o te kohinga. Tae noa ki Pēpuere 1854 ka haere ngā kōrero ki te whakawhiti i te whare taonga ki te wāhi o nāianei, ā, ka whakaingoatia anōtia ko te Whare Taonga o South Kensington. I te tau 1855 ka hangaia e te kaihoahoa Tiamana a Gottfried Semper, i runga i te tono a Cole, he hoahoa mō te whare taonga, engari i whakakāhoretia e te Poari Hokohoko he nui rawa te utu. I nohoia te pae e te Whare o Brompton Park; I whakawhānuitia tēnei tae atu ki ngā rūma tāmata tuatahi i whakatuwheratia i te tau 1857, ko te whare taonga te tuatahi i te ao ki te whakarato i tētahi pūkenga pērā.
question: I whakawhitia te V&A ki hea mai i tōna tauwāhi taketake i te Whare o Marlborough?

question: Ko tēhea kaihoahoa Tiamana i tonoa kia whakaputa i tētahi hoahoa mō te whare taonga?

context: Neke atu i te 70,000 ngā mahi toi mai i ngā whenua o Āhia ki te Rāwhiti: Haina, Hapanihi, me Korea. I whakatuwheratia te Taiwhanga Toi Hainamana o T. T. Tsui i te tau 1991, e whakaatu ana i tētahi kohinga māngai o ngā V&A tata ki te 16,000 ngā ahanoa mai i Haina, mai i te 4 o nga mano tau BC ki tēnei rā. Ahakoa ko te nuinga o ngā mahi toi e whakaaturia ana mai i ngā rangatiratanga o Ming me Qing, he tauira tino pai o ngā ahanoa mai i te rangatiratanga o Tang me ngā wā o mua. Ko tētahi māhunga parahi mita te teitei o te Buddha i te c.750 AD me tētahi o ngā mea tawhito rawa he māhunga hoiho jade 2,000 tau te pakeke mai i te tanumanga, ko ētahi atu whakairo ko ngā kaitiaki urupa rahi. Ka whakaaturia ngā tauira tauhira o te hanganga Hainamana, arā ko te reni, te hiraka, te porcelain, te jade me te enamel cloisonné. E rua ngā whakaahua tīpuna nui o te tāne me te wahine i peitatia ki te peita wai i runga i te hiraka mai i te rau tau 18. He tēpu reni Hainamana ahurei, i hangaia i roto i ngā toa emepaea i te wā o te kingitanga o te Emepara Xuande i te rangatiratanga o Ming. Ka whakaaturia hoki ngā tauira kākahu. Ko tētahi o ngā ahanoa nui rawa he moenga mai i te waenganui o te rau tau 17. E whakaaturia ana hoki ngā mahi a ngā kaihoahoa Hainamana o nāianei.
question: Tata ki te maha o ngā mahi toi kei roto i ngā kohinga o te Rāwhiti Tawhiti?

question: Ko te nuinga o ngā mahi toi Hainamana i roto i ngā kohinga o te Rāwhiti Tawhiti nō tēhea ngā rangatiratanga e rua?

context: Ko te kohinga kākahu te tino whānui i Ingarangi, neke atu i te 14,000 ngā pūeru me ngā apatoko, ko te nuinga o te tau 1600 ki tēnei wā. Ko ngā tātuhi kākahu, ngā pukatuhipoka hoahoa, me ētahi atu mahi i runga pepa e puritia ana e te tari Word and Image. Nā te mea kāore anō kia ora ngā kākahu o ia rā o ngā wā o mua, ka whakanuia te kohinga e ngā kākahu huatau i hangaia mō ngā wā motuhake. Ko tētahi o ngā koha nui tuatahi o ngā kākahu i tae mai i te tau 1913 i te wā i whiwhi ai te V&A i te kohinga Talbot Hughes e pupuri ana i ngā kākahu me ngā tūemi 1,442 hei koha mai i Harrods i muri i tana whakaaturanga i te pātaka tari pātata.

context: I katia te taiwhanga Taonga Puoro i te 25 o Hēpuari 2010, he whakataunga i tino tautohetohe. An online petition of over 5,100 names on the Parliament website led to Chris Smith asking Parliament about the future of the collection. Ko te whakautu, mai i a Bryan Davies, ko te tikanga o te whare taonga ki te tiaki me te tiaki i te kohinga, me te whakawātea i te iwi whānui, me ngā tūemi e tohaina ana ki ngā Taiwhanga o Ingarangi, ki ngā Taiwhanga Medieval & Renaissance, me ngā taiwhanga hou i whakaritea mō Ngā Taonga me Uropi 1600–1800, ā, ko te Whare Taonga o Horniman me ētahi atu whare wānanga he kaitono pea mō ngā moni taurewa kia noho kitea ai ngā taputapu. I haere tonu te Horniman ki te taurima i tētahi whakaaturanga ngātahi me te V&A o ngā taonga puoro, ā, e 35 ngā taonga whakatārewa mai i te whare taonga.
question: Tata ki te maha o ngā ingoa i hainatia i runga i tētahi petihana tuihono i te paetukutuku Paremata hei urupare ki te katinga o te taiwhanga Taonga Puoro?

context: I te tau 1857 ka homai e John Sheepshanks e 233 ngā peita, ko te nuinga o ngā kaiwaiata o Ingarangi o nāianei, me te maha o ngā tātuhi ki te whare taonga me te whakaaro kia hangaia he 'A National Gallery of British Art', he tūranga mai i tangohia e Tate Britain; artists represented are William Blake, James Barry, Henry Fuseli, Sir Edwin Henry Landseer, Sir David Wilkie, William Mulready, William Powell Frith, Millais and Hippolyte Delaroche. Ahakoa i tae mai ētahi o ngā mahi a Kātipa ki te whare taonga me te tuku iho a Sheepshanks, ko te nuinga o ngā mahi a te kaiwaiata i homai e tana tamāhine a Isabel i te tau 1888, tae atu ki te nui o ngā tātuhi hinu, ko te mea tino nui ko te tātuhi hinu rahi katoa o te tau 1821 mō The Hay Wain. Ko ētahi atu kaiwaiata whai mahi i roto i te kohinga ko: Bernardino Fungai, Marcus Gheeraerts the Younger, Domenico di Pace Beccafumi, Fioravante Ferramola, Jan Brueghel the Elder, Anthony van Dyck, Ludovico Carracci, Antonio Verrio, Giovanni Battista Tiepolo, Domenico Tiepolo, Canaletto, Francis Hayman, Pompeo Batoni, Benjamin West, Paul Sandby, Richard Wilson, William Etty, Henry Fuseli, Sir Thomas Lawrence, James Barry,  Francis Danby, Richard Parkes Bonington me Alphonse Legros.
question: I tēhea tau i homai ai e John Sheepshanks he kohinga peita nui?

context: I te tau 1857 ka homai e John Sheepshanks e 233 ngā peita, ko te nuinga o ngā kaiwaiata o Ingarangi o nāianei, me te maha o ngā tātuhi ki te whare taonga me te whakaaro kia hangaia he 'A National Gallery of British Art', he tūranga mai i tangohia e Tate Britain; artists represented are William Blake, James Barry, Henry Fuseli, Sir Edwin Henry Landseer, Sir David Wilkie, William Mulready, William Powell Frith, Millais and Hippolyte Delaroche. Ko ētahi atu kaiwaiata whai mahi i roto i te kohinga ko: Bernardino Fungai, Marcus Gheeraerts the Younger, Domenico di Pace Beccafumi, Fioravante Ferramola, Jan Brueghel the Elder, Anthony van Dyck, Ludovico Carracci, Antonio Verrio, Giovanni Battista Tiepolo, Domenico Tiepolo, Canaletto, Francis Hayman, Pompeo Batoni, Benjamin West, Paul Sandby, Richard Wilson, William Etty, Henry Fuseli, Sir Thomas Lawrence, James Barry,  Francis Danby, Richard Parkes Bonington me Alphonse Legros.

context: I te tau 2000, i whakarewaina e ABC tētahi whakahau whakatairanga ā-tukutuku e arotahi ana ki tōna moko porohita, e kiia ana hoki ko "te ira", i reira te pūāhua pukapuka kōmeke Little Dot i āki ai i ngā manuhiri kia "tikiake i te ira", he papatono e rere ai te moko ABC i te mata me te noho ki te kokonga matau o raro. I utua e te whatunga te Rōpū Hoahoa Troika ki te hoahoa me te whakaputa i tōna tuakiri 2001–02, e haere tonu ana ki te whakamahi i te tae pango me te kōwhai o te moko, ā, ka whakaaturia ngā ira me ngā tāhekeheke i ngā wāhi whakatairanga me te tāutunga.

question: He aha te ingoa kāinga mō te moko a ABC mai i te whakahau 2000?

context: I te tau 1998, ka tīmata te whatunga ki te whakamahi i tētahi tuakiri whakairoiro mōkito, i hoahoatia e Pittard Sullivan, e whakaatu ana i tētahi moko "ABC Circle" pango me te mā iti i runga i tētahi papamuri kōwhai (ko ngā whakatairanga i tēnei wā i whakaatu hoki i tētahi raupapa whakaahua tonu o ngā whetū o ōna papatono i te kāri wā, tae atu ki te raupapa hōtaka i tīmata i te rārangi wā tuatahi o ia pō). I whakaurua tētahi rangi tāhuhu hōu e whā tuhipoka i te taha o te pōkai, i runga anō i te whakahau atahanga "We Love TV" o te whatunga i whakaurua i taua tau, e waihanga ana i tētahi waitohu ororongo e ōrite ana ki ngā tangi o te NBC, ngā momo tohu oro e toru tuhipoka o TE WHK (tae atu ki te putanga o nāianei i whakamahia mai i te tau 2000) me te Fox Fanfare. Kua whakahōutia te waitohu tuhipoka whā ki ia wā pouaka whakaata i muri mai (ahakoa kei te whakamahia tonutia ngā taupēnga mai i te wā 1998–99 i te wā o ngā kāri horihori o te kamupene whakanao e whakaaturia ana i muri i ngā hua whakamutunga o te nuinga o ngā papatono). I te ngahuru o te tau 2015, ka tū a ABC me ōna tangi tuhipoka whā 1998–2002 mō ngā whakatairanga me ngā kāri horihori o te kamupene whakanao i muri i ngā hua whakamutunga o te nuinga o ana papatono i roto i te tekau mā whitu tau, ināianei he pūoro rerekē, momo mātātoa hoki (me ngā pahū o te waitohu tuhipoka whā o te whatunga i te mutunga). Kei te whakamahia tonutia te rangi tāhuhu tawhito e whā tuhipoka e ABC on Demand ki te tīmatanga o te whakaaturanga ABC.

text: ABC i runga i te Tono

context: Heoi anō, i puta mai he raruraru e pā ana ki ngā tohutohu i tangohia e ABC me UPT. I te tau 1950, ka whakatūria e Noble a Robert Kintner hei perehitini o ABC i a ia e mahi ana hei Tumuaki Tumuaki, he tūnga ka puritia e ia tae noa ki tōna matenga i te tau 1958. Ahakoa te kī taurangi o te whakararuraru-kore i waenganui i te ABC me te UPT, me uru atu a Goldenson ki ngā whakataunga a ABC nā ngā raruraru pūtea me te wā roa o te pōhēhētanga o te FCC. I tāpiritia e Goldenson ki te mārō i te wā o Whiringahora 1954, i tonoa e ia he whakakotahitanga i waenganui i te UPT me te Whatunga Pouaka Whakaata DuMont, i roto hoki i te raruraru pūtea. Hei wāhanga o tēnei whakakotahitanga, kua whakaingoatia anōtia te whatunga ko "ABC-DuMont" mō te rima tau, ā, ka whiwhi moni a DuMont i te $5 miriona, he rūma i runga i te hōtaka mō ngā papatono DuMont tīariari, me te wā pānuitanga pūmau mō ngā kaiwhiwhi DuMont Laboratories. Anō hoki, hei whakaū i ngā rāhuitanga rangatiratanga FCC, me hoko te WABC-TV, te teihana whakahaere rānei a DuMont i te mākete o New York City, tae atu ki ētahi atu teihana e rua. Tērā pea ka whai rauemi te ABC-DuMont hanumi ki te whakataetae ki te WHK me te NBC.

question: E hia te moni hei haere ki te Whatunga Pouaka Whakaata o DuMont i raro i te mahere whakakotahitanga a Goldenson?

context: I te tīmatanga o nga tau 1970, ka oti i a ABC tana tauwhiro ki te tae; ko te tekau tau katoa ka tohu i tētahi wāhi huri mō ABC, i te tīmatanga o te putanga o te WHK me te NBC i roto i ngā whakatauranga kia noho ko te whatunga wāhi tuatahi. I tīmata hoki ki te whakamahi i ngā raraunga whanonga me te taupori kia pai ake ai te whakatau he aha ngā momo kaitautoko hei hoko i ngā kāniwha pānuitanga me te whakarato papatono e pai ana ki ētahi kaimātakitaki. I tino āwhinatia ngā whiwhinga o ABC i roto i te tiri a te hunga whakarongo i te mea he maha ngā mākete iti kua nui rawa kia taea ai ngā hāngaitanga wā katoa mai i ngā whatunga e toru.

context: I whakanuia e ABC te whenua pouaka whakaata o Amerika i ngā tau 1970 me ngā tau tōmua o te 1980 (i te tau 1980, ko ngā whatunga matua e toru e tohu ana i te 90% o ngā mātakitaki pouaka whakaata tuatahi katoa i te U.S.). He maha ngā rangatū matua i tīmata i runga i te whatunga i tēnei wā tae atu ki Te Rangatiratanga, he whakaari rangatira mai i a Arona Takikupu i te wā i tīmata ai hei rangatū waenganui i te tau 1981, e rima marama i mua i te mutunga o tērā atu ABC a Spelling. I whakanuia hoki te whatunga i te tōmua o nga tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā waru e ngā angitu haere tonu o Ngā Rā Hari, Te Kamupene a Toru, Laverne & Shirley me Fantasy Island, ā, i whiwhi i ngā taunga hou i roto i te Too Close for Comfort, Soap spinoff Benson me Happy Days spinoff Mork & Mindy. I te tau 1981, i whakarewaina e ABC (mā tōna wehenga Ratonga Ataata ABC) te Alpha Repertory Television Service (ARTS), he hongere taura e whakahaeretia ana hei mahi ngātahi me te Hearst Corporation e tuku ana i ngā papatono ahurea, toi hoki, e rere ana hei ratonga pō i runga i te mokowā hongere o Nickelodeon.

context: E ai ki te whakaritenga a tōna pāpā, ka moe a Temüjin i a Börte o te iwi o Onggirat i a ia e tata ana ki te 16 o ona tau, kia whakaū ai i ngā toa i waenganui i o rātau iwi. I muri noa iho i te mārenatanga o Börte ki a Temüjin, ka kahakina ia e ngā Merkit, ā, i whakaritea hei wahine. I whakaorangia ia e Temüjin mā te āwhina a tōna hoa me tōna tauwhāinga ā muri ake, a Jamukha, me tōna kaitiaki, a Toghrul Kani o te iwi Keraite. E iwa marama i muri mai ka whānau mai he tama, ko Jochi (1185–1226), e whakapouri ana i te take o tōna mātua. Ahakoa te taurangi mo Jochi, ko Börte anake te emepera o Temüjin, ahakoa i whai ia i te tikanga mā te tango i ētahi wahine morganatic.

question: He aha te tau i whānau ai a Börte i a Jochi?

context: I te wehenga o Jamukha rāua ko Temüjin i roto i to rāua hoahoatanga, ka tīmata rāua ki te whakatōpū i te mana, ā, kāore i roa ka noho hei tauwhāinga. I tautokona e Jamukha te rangatiratanga tūturu o Monokōria, i te wā i whai a Temüjin i tētahi tikanga meritocratic, ā, ka kawea mai he whānui ake, ahakoa he iti iho te karaehe o ngā kaiārahi. Nā tōna hinganga tōmua o ngā Merkits, me te pānui a te shaman Kokochu kua waiho e te Rangi Kikorangi Mure Ore te ao mō Temüjin, ka tīmata a Temüjin ki te mana. I te tau 1186, ka pōtitia a Temüjin hei kani o ngā Mongol. Heoi anō, i whakawehi a Jamukha i te tere o te pikinga o Temüjin, ka tere te neke ki te aukati i ngā hiahia o Temüjin. I te tau 1187, ka whakaekea e ia tōna hoa o mua me tētahi ope e toru tekau mano hōia. Ka hohoro te huihuinga a Temüjin i ana kaiārahi ki te tiaki i te whakaeke, engari i tino patua ia i te Pakanga o Dalan Balzhut. I tino wehi a Jamukha i te iwi, a, ka tūkinotia tōna whakaahua mā te kōhua i ngā taitama tāne e whitu tekau e ora ana i roto i ngā kōhua, e whakararuraru ana i te tokomaha o ana kaiārahi tūpono, ā, ka whakararuraru i te aroha ki a Temüjin. I peia a Toghrul, hei kairangi o Temüjin, ki te Qara Khitai. He tino mārama te oranga o Temüjin mō ngā tau tekau e whai ake nei, i te mea ko te nuinga o ngā pūkete hītori e wahangū ana i taua wā.

context: I te tau 1939 ka tangohia e ngā hōia Nationalist Hainamana te mausoleum mai i tōna tūnga i te 'Lord's Enclosure' (Mongolian: Edsen Khoroo) i Mongolia hei pare i ngā hōia Hapanihi. I mauria mā te rohe o te Pākehā i Yan'an, e 900 km i runga i ngā kāta ki te haumaru i tētahi monastery Puta, te Dongshan Dafo Dian, i reira i noho ai mo te tekau tau. I te tau 1949, i te haerenga atu o nga hōia ā Ihupuku, ka nekehia e nga hōia Tōpū tētahi atu 200 km ki te hauauru ki te monastery rongonui o Tīpetiana o Kumbum Monastery, o Ta'er Shi rānei e tata ana ki Xining, ā, kāore i roa ka taka ki raro i te mana ā Ihupuku. I te tīmatanga o te tau 1954, ka whakahokia te bier me ngā taonga a Genghis Kani ki te Pātaka a te Ariki i Monokōria. Tae noa ki te tau 1956 ka whakatūria he temepara hou ki reira hei whakanoho i a rātou. I te tau 1968 i te wā o te Hurihanga Ahurea, i whakangaromia e ngā Pare Whero ngā mea katoa e whai uara. I hangaia anōtia ngā "relics" i ngā tau 1970, ā, i oti tētahi whakapakoko māpere nui o Genghis i te tau 1989.
question: He aha te ingoa Monokōria mō te wāhi taketake o te mausoleum o Genghis Kani?

context: E hāngai ana ki te whakapono rongonui, kāore a Genghis Kani i raupatu i ngā wāhi katoa o te Emepaea o Mongol. I te wā o tōna matenga, ka toro atu te Emepaea Mongol mai i te Moana Caspian ki te Moana o Tiapani. I haere tonu te whakawhānuitanga o te emepaea mō tētahi whakatupuranga, neke atu rānei i muri i te matenga o Genghis i te tau 1227. I raro i te kaiwhakakapi o Genghis, a Ögedei Kani, ka tae te tere o te whakawhānuitanga ki tōna taumata. Ka pana ngā ope Mongol ki Pahia, ka whakamutua te Xia ki te Uru me ngā toenga o ngā Khwarezmids, ā, ka papā ki te rangatiratanga emepaea o Song o Haina, ka tīmata i tētahi pakanga tae noa ki te tau 1279, ā, ka mutu i te whiwhinga o ngā Mongol i te mana o Haina katoa. I pana atu hoki rātau ki Rūhia me Uropi ki te rāwhiti.
question: Ko tēhea te moana e rohe ana ki te emepaea o Genghis Kani ki te rāwhiti i tōna matenga?

context: Na nga whakaekenga o Baghdad, Samarkand, Urgench, Kiev, Vladimir i waenganui i ētahi atu i puta ai ngā kōhuru maha, pērā i te wā i ngaro katoatia ai ngā wāhanga o Khuzestan ki te tonga. I whakangaromia e tōna uri o Hulagu Kani te nuinga o te wāhi ki te raki o Irana, a, ka pahuatia a Baghdad ahakoa i whakatūria ōna ope e ngā Mamluks o Ihipa, engari ka hoki mai te uri o Hulagu o Ghazan Kani ki te patu i ngā Mamluks o Ihipiana i Levant, i Pirihitia, tae atu ki Kaha. E ai ki nga mahi a te kaituhituhi hītori o Pēhia, a Rashid-al-Din Hamadani, neke atu i te 70,000 ngā tāngata i patua e nga Mongol i Merv, neke atu i te 190,000 i Nishapur. I te tau 1237 ka whakarewaina e Batu Kani, he mokopuna a Genghis Kani, he whakaekenga ki Kievan Rus'. I roto i ngā tau e toru, ka whakangaromia e nga Mongol ngā tāone nui katoa o Uropi ki te Rāwhiti, hāunga a Novgorod me Pskov.

I te UK kua tipu te tūranga o te PhT, ā, kua tukuna atu te kawenga ki a rātou ki te whakahaere i te tari rongoā me ngā wāhi motuhake i roto i te mahi rongoā, e āhei ai ngā kaihoko rongoā ki te whakawhāiti i tō rātou āpure tohunga hei kaitohutohu rongoā e whakapau wā ana ki te mahi me ngā tūroro me te rangahau. text: whakahaere i te tari rongoā me ngā wāhi motuhake i roto i te mahi rongoā rongoā

context: Na nga nekehanga i mahia i te Rāwhiti o Waenganui i roto i te kararehe me te matū i ārahi ai te rongoā i roto i te Islam o te wā o mua ki te whakawhanake i te rongoā. Hei tauira, i mahi a Muhammad ibn Zakarīya Rāzi (Rhazes) (865–915), hei whakatairanga i ngā whakamahinga rongoā o ngā pūhui matū. Ko Apu al-Qasim al-Zahrawi (Abulcasis) (936–1013) i tīmata i te whakaritenga rongoā mā te sublimation me te distillation. He tino painga tana Liber servitoris, nā te mea ka whakarato tohutohu ki te kaipānui me te whakamārama me pēhea te whakarite i ngā 'ngāwari' i whakakotahitia ai ngā rongoā matatini i whakamahia nuitia i taua wā. Heoi anō, ko Sabur Ibn Sahl (d 869), te tākuta tuatahi hei tīmata i te pharmacopoedia, e whakaahua ana i ngā momo rongoā me ngā rongoā mō ngā mate. I tuhituhi a Al-Biruni (973–1050) i tētahi o ngā mahi ā-Māori tino nui i runga i te rongoā, e huaina ana ko Kitab al-Saydalah (Te Pukapuka Rongoā), i reira i whakamāramatia ai e ia ngā āhuatanga o ngā rongoā me te whakahuahua i te tūranga o te rongoā rongoā me ngā taumahi me ngā mahi a te kaiwaiata. I whakaahuatia hoki e Avicenna kāore i iti iho i te 700 ngā whakaritenga, ō rātou āhuatanga, ngā aratau mahi, me ō rātou tohu. I tukua e ia he pukapuka katoa ki ngā rongoā ngāwari i roto i te Canon of Medicine. He pānga nui hoki ngā mahi a al-Maridini o Baghdad me Kairo, me Ibn al-Wafid (1008–1074), i tāngia rāua ki te reo Rātini, neke atu i te rima tekau ngā wā, e puta ana ko De Medicinis universalibus et particularibus e 'Mesue' te taitamariki, me te Medicamentis simplicibus na 'Abenguefit'. I whakamāoritia e Pita o Abano (1250–1316) tētahi tāpiritanga ki te mahi a al-Maridini i raro i te taitara De Veneris. He pūkenga hoki ngā mahi a Al-Muwaffaq i te papa tākaro. I a ia e noho ana i te rau tau 10, i tuhituhi ia i ngā tūāpapa o ngā āhuatanga pono o ngā Rongoā, i waenganui i ētahi atu e whakaahua ana i te waikura arsenious, me te mōhio ki te waikawa silicic. I whakamāramatia e ia te rerekētanga i waenganui i te konutai pākawa me te konurehu pākawa, ā, ka aro atu ki te āhua paitini o ngā pūhui kapa, otirā ko te kapa vitriol, me ngā pūhui ārahi hoki. Ka whakaahuatia hoki e ia te whakahekenga o te wai moana hei inu. [manatokonga e hiahiatia ana]

context: He nui ake te arotahi o te mahi rongoā rongoā ki te arotakenga rongoā (i.e. "ratonga hinengaro") i te whakaputa rongoā tūturu. Ko te nuinga o te wā e mahi ana ngā kaiwaiata tohutohu i roto i ngā kāinga nēhi, engari kei te nui haere te peka ki ētahi atu whare wānanga me ngā tautuhinga ā-rōpū. Ko te nuinga o te wā he rangatira pakihi takitahi ngā kaitohutohu kaiwaiata, ahakoa i Te Hononga o Amerika he tokomaha ināianei e mahi ana mō ētahi kamupene whakahaere rongoā nui (ko te nuinga o Omnicare, Kindred Healthcare me PharMerica). Tērā pea ka āta whakahoki tēnei ia i te tīmatanga o ngā kaitohutohu ki te mahi hāngai ki ngā tūroro, i te nuinga o te wā nā te mea he tokomaha ngā pakeke e mau ana i ngā rongoā maha, engari kei te noho tonu i waho o ngā tautuhinga ā-rōpū. Ko ētahi rongoā hapori e whakamahi ana i ngā kairongoā kaitohutohu me te whakarato ratonga tohutohu.

Tērā pea ka āta whakahoki tēnei ia i te tīmatanga o ngā kaitohutohu ki te mahi hāngai ki ngā tūroro, i te nuinga o te wā nā te mea he tokomaha ngā pakeke e mau ana i ngā rongoā maha, engari kei te noho tonu i waho o ngā tautuhinga ā-rōpū. Ko ētahi rongoā hapori e whakamahi ana i ngā kairongoā kaitohutohu me te whakarato ratonga tohutohu.

question: He aha te mahi a ētahi rongoā rongoā?

text: te whakamahi i ngā kairongoā kaitohutohu me te whakarato ratonga tohutohu

context: I te nuinga o ngā mana whakahaere (pērā i Te Hononga o Amerika), ka whakaritea motuhake ngā kairongoā i ngā tākuta. I te nuinga o te wā, ka whakapūtātia e ēnei mana whakahaere anake ka taea e ngā kairongoā te whakarato rongoā kua whakaritea ki te iwi whānui, ā, kāore e taea e ngā kairongoā te hanga mahi pakihi ki ngā tākuta, te hoatu rānei i ngā utu "whanake" ki a rātou. Heoi anō, ko te American Medical Association (AMA) Code of Ethics e whakarato ana ka taea e ngā tākuta te tuku rongoā i roto i ā rātou mahi tari i te wā kāore he taikahatanga tūroro, ā, ka whai mana ngā tūroro ki tētahi rongoā tuhituhi ka taea te whakakī ki tētahi atu wāhi. E 7 ki te 10 ōrau o ngā mahi tākuta o Amerika e tuku rongoā ana i a rātau anō.

context: Ka puta pea ngā mate o te pūnaha ārai i ngā mate autoimmune, ngā mate whakakakā me te mate pukupuku. Ka puta te immunodeficiency ina iti iho te hohe o te pūnaha ārai i te pūnoa, e hua ana i ngā mate auau, whakamate hoki. I roto i te tangata, ko te immunodeficiency pea ko te hua o tētahi mate iranga pēnei i te immunodeficiency paheko, ngā āhuatanga whiwhi pēnei i te HIV/AIDS, te whakamahinga rānei o ngā rongoā ārai mate. Waihoki, ko te hua o te ārai aunoa i te pūnaha ārai pūkenga e whakaeke ana i ngā pūtautau pūnoa me te mea he rauropi kē. Ko ngā mate autoimmune noa ko te thyroiditis a Hashimoto, te kaikōiwi rheumatoid, te mate huka momo 1, me te lupus erythematosus pūnaha. Ko te immunology e kapi ana i te akoranga o ngā āhuatanga katoa o te pūnaha ārai.

question: He aha te āhuatanga i whiwhi ai i te mate ārai mate i roto i te tangata?

context: I te nuinga o te wā ka whakamahia ngā rongoā ārai mumura hei whakahaere i ngā pānga o te mumura. Ko te glucocorticoids te tino kaha o ēnei rongoā; Heoi anō, he maha ngā pānga taha o ēnei rongoā, pēnei i te momona matua, te hyperglycemia, te osteoporosis, ā, me tino āta whakahaere te whakamahinga. Ko ngā rongoā ārai ārai ārai e whakamahia ana me ngā rongoā cytotoxic, immunosuppressive rānei pēnei i te methotrexate, i te azathioprine rānei. Ka tautāwhi ngā rongoā cytotoxic i te urupare ārai mā te patu i ngā pūtau whakawehe pēnei i ngā pūtau T whakahohe. Heoi anō, he noa iho te patunga, ā, ka pāngia ētahi atu pūtau wehe me ō rātou okana, e pā ana ki ngā pānga taha paitini. Ko ngā rongoā ārai ārai pēnei i te cyclosporin e ārai ana i ngā pūtau T kia kore ai e urupare tika ki ngā tohu mā te tautāwhi i ngā ara whakawhiti tohu.

context: I tua atu, i roto i ngā wā whakaoho, ka rerekē ngā pūtau pānga rerekē, pēnei i ngā pūtau kaipatu māori cytotoxic me ngā CTLs (cytotoxic T lymphocytes), kia taea ai te urupare pai ki ngā pathogens urutomo. context: I puta te kunenga o te pūnaha ārai urutau i roto i tētahi tīpuna o ngā kōiwi kauae. Ko te nuinga o ngā rāpoi ngota māori o te pūnaha ārai urutau (hei tauira, ngā immunoglobulins me ngā kaiwhiwhi pūtau T) e tīari ana i roto anake i ngā kōiwi kauae. Heoi anō, kua kitea he rāpoi ngota motuhake i takea mai i te lymphocyte i roto i ngā kōiwi kauae o mua, pēnei i te lamprey me te hagfish. Kei ēnei kararehe he huānga nui o ngā rāpoi ngota e kiia nei ko ngā kaiwhiwhi lymphocyte tāupe (VLRs), pēnei i ngā kaiwhiwhi antigen o ngā kōiwi kauae, i hangaia mai i te iti noa iho (kotahi, e rua rānei) o ngā ira. E whakapono ana ēnei rāpoi ngota ki te here i ngā ārai ārai mate i runga i te āhua ōrite ki ngā ārai ārai, ā, he ōrite te waeine tauwhāiti.

question: Ko te kunenga o tēhea wāhanga o te pūnaha ārai i puta i roto i te tīpuna kunenga o ngā kōiwi kauae?

context: He uaua ake ngā tikanga e whakamahia ana hei karo i te pūnaha ārai urutau. Ko te huarahi māmā rawa ko te huri tere i ngā epitopes kāore i te tino nui (ngā waikawa amino me ngā huka) i runga i te mata o te pathogen, me te pupuri i ngā epitopes tino nui. E kiia ana tēnei ko te rerekētanga antigenic. Ko tētahi tauira ko te HIV, e tere ana te irakē, nā reira kei te huri tonu ngā pūmua i runga i tōna pūhera huaketo e tino hiahiatia ana mō te tāurunga ki tōna pūtau ūnga kaihautū. Ka whakamāramatia pea e ēnei huringa auau o ngā ārai mate ngā rahunga o ngā kano ārai mate e hāngai ana ki tēnei huaketo. Ka whakamahia e te pirinoa Trypanosoma brucei tētahi rautaki ōrite, e whakawhiti tonu ana i tētahi momo pūmua mata mō tētahi atu, e āhei ai kia noho kotahi hipanga i mua i te urupare ārai ārai. Ko te hīpoki i ngā ārai ārai ki ngā rāpoi ngota kaihautū tētahi atu tikanga noa iho mō te karo i te kitenga a te pūnaha ārai. I roto i te HIV, ko te pūhera e taupoki ana i te virion ka hangaia mai i te kiriuhi o waho rawa o te pūtau kaihautū; Mā aua huaketo "kākahu whaiaro" e uaua ai ki te pūnaha ārai te tohu i a rātou hei hanganga "kāore i a ia anō".

context: I muri i te parekura o Peterloo i te tau 1819, ka tuhia e te kaitito a Percy Shelley te oriori tōrangapū The Mask of Anarchy i muri mai i taua tau, ka tīmata ki ngā whakaahua o tāna i whakaaro ai ko ngā momo mana hē o tōna wā—kātahi ka whakaaro i ngā whakaoho o tētahi momo mahi pāpori hou. Koia pea te kōrero tuatahi o te kaupapa o te whakahē kore. I tangohia tētahi putanga e te kaituhi a Henry David Thoreau i roto i tana tuhinga Te Tūkinotanga Tūmatanui, ā, i muri iho e Whakarārangi i roto i tana akoranga o Satyagraha. I whakaawetia tētahi wāhanga, i whakaawetia hoki e te whakahē me te mahi tōrangapū a Shelley. Ko te tikanga, e mōhiotia ana he rite tonu te whakahua a Whakarārangi i te Masque of Anarchy a Shelley ki te hunga nui i te wā o te whakahau mō tētahi Īnia wātea.

question: Ko tēhea Īnia rongonui i mahi i te tūkinotanga ā iwi?

context: Ko te whakarongo ā-iwi kāore i te hurihuri, he whakarongo ngāwari noa iho ki ngā ture i runga i te take e whakawāteatia ana e tētahi hinengaro takitahi, hei wāhanga rānei o tētahi mahi kia kore ai ētahi ture, kia whakakorea rātou, kia pēhi rānei kia whiwhi i ngā hiahia tōrangapū o te tangata ki tētahi atu take. He nui ake te ngana ki te turaki i tētahi kāwanatanga (ki te huri rānei i ngā tikanga ahurea, ngā tikanga pāpori, ngā whakapono whakapono, ērā atu mea... ehara i te mea he tōrangapū te hurihanga, arā, "hurihanga ahurea", e tohu ana i te huringa whānui me te whānui ki tētahi wāhanga o te papanga pāpori). Kua whakaahuatia nga mahi a Whakarārangi he tūkinotanga ā iwi tōkeke. E kiia ana ko nga Hakaria i raro i a Ferenc Deák i whakahaere i te whakarongo ki te kawanatanga o Ahurangi. I tuhituhi anō a Thoreau mō te whakarongo ā-iwi e whakatutuki ana i te "hurihanga rangimārie." Kua kitea e Howard Zinn, Harvey Wheeler, me ētahi atu te mana i tautokona i roto i te Whakapuakitanga o te Rangatiratanga ki te "whakarerekē, ki te whakakore rānei" i tētahi kāwanatanga hē hei tikanga o te whakarongo ā-iwi.

context: Ko ētahi momo tūkinotanga ā-iwi, pēnei i ngā poapoa ture, te whakakore ki te utu tāke, te karo hukihuki, te whakaekenga whakakāhore ratonga, me ngā nohoanga, ka uaua ake te mahi a tētahi pūnaha. question: Me pēhea e taea ai e koe te whakahē ki ngā kamupene nunui i runga i te āhua taikaha?

context: E whakaaro ana ētahi o ngā tūpāpaku tūmatanui e tika ana kia whakaae ki a rātau te whiu nā tō rātou whakapono ki te mana o te kirimana pāpori, e herea ana hei here i te katoa ki te whakarongo ki ngā ture kua whakatūria e te kāwanatanga e tutuki ana i ētahi paerewa tika, ki te whakamamae rānei i ngā whiu i whakatakotoria i roto i te ture. Ko ētahi atu hunga whakarongo tūmatanui e manako ana ki te noho o te kāwanatanga, kāore tonu i te whakapono ki te mana tika o tō rātou kāwanatanga, kāore rānei e whakapono ki te tika o tētahi ture kua whakaritea e ia. A, ko ētahi atu hunga whakarongo ā iwi, he hunga whakarihariha, kaore e whakapono ki te tikanga tika o tētahi kāwanatanga, nō reira kāore e kitea he take kia whakaae ki te whiu mo te tūkinotanga o te ture hara e kore e takahi i ngā mana o ētahi atu.

question: Kaore nga anarchists e hiahia ki te whakaae ki te whiu he aha te take?

text: e takahi ana i ngā mana o ētahi atu

context: I ētahi wā e tono ana te ture i tētahi tono inoi ki te hunga whakarongo ā iwi, pērā i te kēhi o te Camden 28, i reira i tukuna ai ki ngā whakapae he wā hei tautohe i te hara ki tētahi tatau hē, ā, kāore he wā herehere. I ētahi āhuatanga hopu maha, ka whakatau nga kaiwhaiwhai ki te whakamahi i ngā tohutohu pāruru hei whakaū i te tono ōrite mō te katoa. Engari kua kōwhiri ētahi kaiwhaiwhai ki te tāuru i tētahi inoi kāpō, e tautohe ana i te hara me te kore whakaaetanga inoi. Ka tautohe a Mohandas Whakarārangi i te hara, a, ka kī atu ki te kōti, "Kei konei ahau ki . . . Kia koa te tuku ki te whiu tiketike rawa e taea te whiu ki ahau mo te mea i runga i te ture he hara tika, he aha hoki te mea e kitea ana ki ahau ko te mahi teitei rawa a te tangata whenua."

question: Construction takes place on location for who?

context: He pukapuka hokohoko te Engineering News-Record (ENR) mō te umanga hanganga. Ia tau, ka whakahiato, ka pūrongo hoki a ENR i ngā raraunga mō te rahi o ngā kamupene hoahoa me ngā kamupene hanganga. Ka whakaputaina e rātou he rārangi o ngā kamupene nui rawa i Te Hononga o Amerika (Runga-40) me tētahi rārangi hoki i ngā kamupene nui rawa o te ao (Runga-250, mā te nui o ngā mahi e mahia ana e rātou i waho o tō rātou whenua kāinga). I te tau 2014, i whakahiatohia e ENR ngā raraunga i roto i ngā wāhanga mākete e iwa. I wehea hei waka, hinu hinu, whare, hiko, ahumahi, wai, whakanao, paraka/parakore, pūkoro, ururua mōrearea me te kāwai whakatekau mō ētahi atu kaupapa. I roto i tā rātou pūrongo i runga i te Top 400, i whakamahia e rātou ngā raraunga mō te waka, te parakaingaki, te ururua mōrearea me te wai hei whakatau i ngā kamupene hei kaikirimana taumaha.

question: I tēhea tau i whakahiatohia ai e ENR ngā raraunga i roto i ngā wāhanga mākete e iwa?

context: He pukapuka hokohoko te Engineering News-Record (ENR) mō te umanga hanganga. Ia tau, ka whakahiato, ka pūrongo hoki a ENR i ngā raraunga mō te rahi o ngā kamupene hoahoa me ngā kamupene hanganga. Ka whakaputaina e rātou he rārangi o ngā kamupene nui rawa i Te Hononga o Amerika (Runga-40) me tētahi rārangi hoki i ngā kamupene nui rawa o te ao (Runga-250, mā te nui o ngā mahi e mahia ana e rātou i waho o tō rātou whenua kāinga). I te tau 2014, i whakahiatohia e ENR ngā raraunga i roto i ngā wāhanga mākete e iwa. I wehea hei waka, hinu hinu, whare, hiko, ahumahi, wai, whakanao, paraka/parakore, pūkoro, ururua mōrearea me te kāwai whakatekau mō ētahi atu kaupapa. context: He pūnaha taunahatanga tā te Taunahatanga Ahumahi Paerewa me te Pūnaha Taunahatanga Ahumahi o Amerika ki te Raki hōu ake mō ngā kamupene e mahi ana, e mahi ana rānei i te hanganga. context: Ko te ia hou o te hoahoa e hāngai ana ki te whakaurunga o ngā motuhake i wehea i mua, i waenganui i ngā kamupene nunui. I mua, ko ngā kaihoahoa, ngā kaihoahoa o roto, ngā kaipūkaha, ngā kaiwhakawhanake, ngā kaiwhakahaere hanganga, me ngā kaikirimana whānui, he kamupene motuhake katoa, ahakoa i roto i ngā kamupene nui ake. I tēnei wā, ka whai tohunga pea tētahi umanga "hoahoa", "whakahaere hanganga" rānei hei kaimahi, he kamupene pāhono rānei e whakarato ana i ia pūkenga e hiahiatia ana. Nā reira, ka taea e ia umanga te tuku i a ia anō hei "hokohoko kotahi" mō tētahi kaupapa hanganga, mai i te tīmatanga ki te mutunga. Ka tohua tēnei hei kirimana "hanga hoahoa" e hoatu ai ki te kaikirimana he whakapūtātanga mahinga, ā, me whakahaere i te kaupapa mai i te hoahoa ki te hanganga, me te piri ki ngā whakaritenga mahinga.

question: He aha te momo kirimana ka hoatu ina hoatu ki te kaikirimana he whakapūtātanga mahinga, ā, me whakahaere te kaupapa mai i te hoahoa ki te hanganga, me te piri ki ngā whakaritenga mahinga?

context: Me piri te kaupapa ki ngā whakaritenga waehere rohe me te whare. Kāore e whai painga ki te rangatira te hanga i tētahi kaupapa kāore e piri ki ngā waehere. Ko ētahi whakaritenga ā-ture e puta mai ana i ngā whakaaro, i te hiahia rānei ki te ārai i ngā mea kino – ka tiango te piriti, te pahūtanga rānei. Ko ētahi atu whakaritenga ā-ture e puta mai ana i ngā whakaaro rāhui, i ngā mea rānei he take tikanga, tūmanako rānei, pēnei i te wehe i ngā pakihi ki tētahi rohe pakihi me ngā whare noho ki tētahi takiwā noho. Ka taea e te rōia te rapu i ngā huringa, i ngā waihotanga rānei i roto i te ture e whakahaere ana i te whenua e hangaia ai te whare, mā te tautohe kāore tētahi ture e hāngai ana (e kore te hoahoa piriti e hinga), kāore rānei te tikanga i te hiahiatia (kua tipu te whakaaetanga o ngā wāhi mahi ora i roto i te hapori).

question: Tae atu ki ngā tangata tūmataiti me ngā whakahaere, he aha ngā rōpū e whakahaere ana i te ergänzungsschulen?

context: I Īnia, e kiia ana ngā kura tūmataiti ko ngā kura takitahi, engari i te mea ka whiwhi āwhina ētahi kura tūmataiti i te kāwanatanga, tērā pea he kura āwhina, he kura āwhina rānei. Nā reira, i runga i te tikanga pākaha, ko te kura tūmataiti he kura takitahi kāore i te āwhinatia. Mō te take o tēnei whakamahukitanga, ko te rihīti āwhina pūtea anake e whakaarohia ana, ehara i te whenua i hokona mai i te kāwanatanga i te mokatere āwhina. Kei roto i te mana o te kāwanatanga uniana me ngā kāwanatanga kāwanatanga ki te whakahaere i ngā kura mai i te mea ka puta te Mātauranga i te rārangi Concurrent o ngā kaupapa ture i roto i te kaupapa ture. Ko te mahi kia homai e te kāwanatanga uniana ngā tohutohu kaupapahere whānui i te wā e waihanga ana ngā kāwanatanga i ā rātou ake ture me ngā ture mō te whakahaere i te wāhanga. I waenganui i ētahi atu mea, nā tēnei hoki i hua ai e 30 ngā Papa Whakamātautau, ngā mana mātauranga rānei e whakahaere ana i ngā whakamātautau mō ngā tiwhikete wehe kura. Ko ngā Papa Whakamātautau Tūturu kei roto i ngā tūnga maha ko te CSE me te CISCE, NENBSE

Ka pai ake ngā hua mātauranga o ēnei kura i ngā kura kāwanatanga i rāhuitia i mua mō ētahi atu rōpū iwi. Ehara ngā kura "Tauira C" o mua i ngā kura tūmataiti, i te mea e whakahaeretia ana e te kāwanatanga. context: I ngā wāhi maha o Te Hononga o Amerika, i muri i te whakataunga o te tau 1954 i roto i te kēhi kōti o Brown v. context: I te wā o te whakawāteatanga mai i te nekeneke o Awherika ki te Tonga i te mutunga o nga tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, ka whakatūria e ngā kaiwhaiwhai ākonga tētahi "tāone" tohu ki Harvard Yard, ā, ka āraia tētahi whaikōrero i hoatu e te Tuakana o Awherika ki te Tonga, a Duke Kent-Brown. I auau tonu te whakakāhore a te Kamupene Whakahaere o Harvard ki te whakawātea, e kī ana "me kaua ngā utu whakahaere e herea ki ngā herenga ā-pūtea, ki te mahi rānei a te hunga kāore i te mōhiotia, i ngā rōpū huamoni motuhake rānei." Heoi anō, i te mutunga ka whakahekea e te whare wānanga ōna puringa o Awherika ki te Tonga mā te $230 miriona (mai i te $400 miriona) hei urupare ki te pēhanga.

context: Ko Jacksonville te taone nui rawa atu i te rohe o Amerika o Florida, me te taone nui rawa atu i te United States. Ko te tūru o te rohe o Duval County, i whakatōpū ai te kāwanatanga o te taone i te tau 1968. Na te whakatōpūtanga i hoatu ai a Jacksonville tōna rahi nui, ā, ka whakatakotoria te nuinga o tōna taupori taone nui ki roto i ngā rohe o te taone; me te taupori e 853,382 i te tau 2014, koia te taone nui rawa atu i Florida me te Tonga-rāwhiti, me te 12 o te nuinga o te iwi i Te Hononga o Amerika. context: Kei te rohe o Te Tairāwhiti Tuatahi o Te Tai Tokerau o Pārera, ā, kei waenganui i ngā tahataha o te Awa o Hato Hoani, tata ki te 25 maero (40 km) ki te tonga o te raina kāwanatanga o Hōria, ā, tata ki te 340 maero (550 km) ki te raki o Miami. Ko ngā hapori o Jacksonville Beaches kei te taha o te takutai o Atarangi pātata. I nohoia tuatahitia te rohe e te iwi o Timucua, ā, i te tau 1564 ko te wāhi o te koroni Wīwī o Fort Caroline, tētahi o ngā kāinga Pākehā tuatahi i te whenua o Amerika i tēnei wā. I raro i te ture o Ingarangi, ka tipu te kāinga i te wāhi whāiti o te awa i whakawhiti ai ngā kau, e mōhiotia ana ko Wacca Pilatka ki te Seminole me te Cow Ford ki te Ingarangi. I whakatūria he taone pārekareka ki reira i te tau 1822, kotahi tau i muri i te whiwhinga o Te Hononga o Amerika i a Pāniora; i tapaina ki a Andrew Jackson, te kāwana hōia tuatahi o te Rohe o Florida me te Perehitini tuawhitu o Te Hononga o Amerika.

I raro i te ture o Ingarangi, ka tipu te kāinga i te wāhi whāiti o te awa i whakawhiti ai ngā kau, e mōhiotia ana ko Wacca Pilatka ki te Seminole me te Cow Ford ki te Ingarangi. I whakatūria he taone pārekareka ki reira i te tau 1822, kotahi tau i muri i te whiwhinga o Te Hononga o Amerika i a Pāniora; i tapaina ki a Andrew Jackson, te kāwana hōia tuatahi o te Rohe o Florida me te Perehitini tuawhitu o Te Hononga o Amerika.
question: He aha te tangata hītori i tapaina ai a Jacksonville?

context: I te tau 1562, i whakamaheretia e te kaihōpara Huguenot Wīwī a Jean Ribault te Awa o Hato Hoani i te tau 1562, e kīia ana ko te Awa o Mei nā te mea i kitea e ia i Mei. I whakatūria e Ribault tētahi pou pōhatu tata ki Jacksonville i tēnei rā, e tono ana i te whenua hou i kitea mō Wīwī. I te tau 1564, ka whakatūria e René Goulaine de Laudonnière te kāinga Pākehā tuatahi, ko Fort Caroline, i St. Johns e tata ana ki te kāinga matua o Saturiwa. I whakahaua e Piripi II o Paniora a Pedro Menéndez de Avilés kia tiaki i te painga o Paniora mā te whakaeke i te aroaro o Wīwī i Fort Caroline. I te 20 o Hepetema 1565, ka whakaekea e tētahi ope Pāniora mai i te kāinga Pāniora pātata o Hato Akuhata a Pā Caroline, ā, tata tonu ki ngā hōia Wīwī katoa e tiaki ana. I whakaingoatia anō e te Pāniora te pā o San Mateo, ā, i muri i te pananga o te Wīwī, ka whakapūmautia te tūnga o Hato Akuhata hei kāinga tino nui i Pārera. He taupatupatu te tauwāhi o Fort Caroline, engari i whakatūria he hanganga anō o te pā ki te Awa o Hato Hoani i te tau 1964.

context: Ko Jacksonville, pēnei i te nuinga o ngā tāone nunui i Te Hononga o Amerika, i pāngia e ngā pānga kino o te tere o te taone nui i muri i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao. Na te hanganga o ngā huarahi i neke ai ngā tangata ki ngā whare hou ake i waho ake. I muri i te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao, ka tīmata te kāwanatanga o te taone o Jacksonville ki te whakanui i te whakapau moni hei pūtea i ngā kaupapa hanga tūmatanui hou i muri i te pakanga. Nā Te Pūrākau o Jacksonville a Mayor W. Haydon Burns i hua ai te hanganga o tētahi hōro taone hou, whare wānanga tūmatanui, whare pukapuka tūmatanui me ētahi atu kaupapa i waihanga i te āhua hihiri o te whakapehapeha tūmatanui. Heoi anō, na te whanaketanga o ngā wahi o waho ake me te ngaru o te "rere mā" o waenganui i mahue ai a Jacksonville me te iwi whānui rawakore i mua. Ko te rōpū iwi tino nui rawa o te taone, ko te mā ehara i te Pākehā, i whakapeka mai i te 75.8% i te tau 1970 ki te 55.1% i te tau 2010.

text: Te Pakanga Tuarua o te Ao

context: He iti iho te tūkinotanga o Jacksonville i te āwhā i te nuinga o ētahi atu tāone o te tai rāwhiti, ahakoa kei te tīari te tuma mō tētahi āwhā nui. Kotahi anake te pānga hāngai o te taone mai i te āwhā mai i te tau 1871; heoi anō, neke atu i te kotahi tekau ngā wā i pā ki a Jacksonville te āwhā, i te āwhā rānei e whakawhiti ana i te kāwanatanga mai i te Kōwhiti o Mehiko ki te Moana Atarangi, ka haere rānei ki te raki, ki te tonga rānei i te Atamira me te paraihe i te rohe. Ko te pānga tino kaha ki Jacksonville i te Hurricane Dora i te tau 1964, ko te āwhā anake i tuhia ki te Tairāwhiti Tuatahi me ngā hau āwhā tautoko. I whakawhiti te whatu i a Hato Akuhata me ngā hau kāore anō kia iti iho ki te 110 mph (180 km/h), nā reira he Kāwai kaha 2 i runga i te Tauine Saffir-Simpson. I pāngia hoki e Jacksonville te tūkinotanga mai i te Āwhā Tropical Fay o te tau 2008 i whakawhiti i te kāwanatanga, ka mauria mai ētahi wāhanga o Jacksonville i raro i te pouri mo te whā rā. Waihoki, e whā tau i mua i tēnei, i waipuketia a Jacksonville e te Hurricane Frances me te Hurricane Jeanne, nāna i tau ki te tonga o te rohe. Ko ēnei huripari pātata te utu nui rawa atu ki Jacksonville. I te tau 1999 i tūkinotia ai te nuinga o te Hurricane Floyd ki Jacksonville Beach. I te wā o Floyd, i tino pakaru te pier o Jacksonville Beach, ā, i muri iho ka whakawāteatia. I muri iho ka pakaru te pier i hangaia anōtia e Fay, engari kāore i ngaro. I te tau 2004, ka puta he āwhiowhio iti i roto i te tukanga. I te 28 o Me 2012, i pā a Jacksonville ki te Āwhā Tropical Beryl, e pōkai ana i ngā hau tae atu ki te 70 maire ia haora (113 km/h) i tau tata ki Jacksonville Beach.
question: He aha te āwhā i tino pā ki Jacksonville?

I pāngia hoki e Jacksonville te tūkinotanga mai i te Āwhā Tropical Fay o te tau 2008 i whakawhiti i te kāwanatanga, ka mauria mai ētahi wāhanga o Jacksonville i raro i te pouri mo te whā rā. Waihoki, e whā tau i mua i tēnei, i waipuketia a Jacksonville e te Hurricane Frances me te Hurricane Jeanne, nāna i tau ki te tonga o te rohe. Ko ēnei huripari pātata te utu nui rawa atu ki Jacksonville. I te tau 1999 i tūkinotia ai te nuinga o te Hurricane Floyd ki Jacksonville Beach. I te wā o Floyd, i tino pakaru te pier o Jacksonville Beach, ā, i muri iho ka whakawāteatia. I muri iho ka pakaru te pier i hangaia anōtia e Fay, engari kāore i ngaro. I te tau 2004, ka puta he āwhiowhio iti i roto i te tukanga. I te 28 o Me 2012, i pā a Jacksonville ki te Āwhā Tropical Beryl, e pōkai ana i ngā hau tae atu ki te 70 maire ia haora (113 km/h) i tau tata ki Jacksonville Beach.
question: I tēhea tau i ngaro ai te hiko ki Jacksonville i te āwhā āwhā?

context: I te tau 2009, i whakaaturia e te kaitohutohu o Hohepa Stiglitz he whakaaturanga i te tau 2009 e ārai ana te ōritetanga o te ao me te ōritetanga i roto i ngā whenua i te tupu mā te whakawhāiti i te tono rōpū. I te tau 2001, i tuhituhi ai te kaitohutohu o Branko Milanovic, "Ko te tirohanga e tūkino ana te ōritetanga o te moni whiwhinga ki te tupu – ka taea rānei e te pai ake te ōritetanga te āwhina ki te tautoko i te tupu – kua nui ake te pupuri i roto i ngā tau tata nei. ... Ko te take matua o tēnei neke ko te nui haere o te hiranga o te pūmatua tangata i roto i te whanaketanga. I te wā e tino nui ana te pūtea ā-tinana, he kī te penapena me te pūtea penapena. Kātahi he mea nui kia nui te rōpū rangatira e āhei ana ki te penapena i tētahi wāhanga nui ake o a rātau moni whiwhinga i te rawakore me te haumi ki te pūtea ā-tinana. Engari ināianei he iti ake te pūmatua tangata i ngā mīhini, kua noho te mātauranga whānui hei muna ki te tupu."

context: I te tau 1993, i whakaaturia e Galor rāua ko Zeira ko te ōritetanga i te aroaro o ngā hēnga o te mākete nama, he pānga whakararuraru roa ki te hanganga pūmatua tangata me te whanaketanga ohaoha. I tirohia e tētahi mātauranga o te tau 1996 a Perotti ngā hongere e pā ai te ōritetanga ki te tupu o te ohaoha. I whakaaturia e ia, e ai ki te āhua o te mākete nama, e pāhono ana te ōritetanga ki te taumata iti iho o te hanganga pūmatua tangata (mātauranga, wheako, me te akoranga) me te taumata teitei ake o te kōkā, ā, nā reira ka whakahekea ngā taumata tupu. I kitea e ia e pāhono ana te ōritetanga ki ngā taumata tiketike ake o te tāke whakaraupapa, e pāhono ana ki ngā taumata iti iho o te tupu mai i ngā whakaititanga o ngā penapena tūmataiti me te pūtea penapena. I whakamutua e Perotti, "he iti iho ngā pāpātanga kōkā o ngā rōpū ōrite me ngā pāpātanga nui ake o te pūtea penapena i roto i te mātauranga. E kitea ana rāua tahi i roto i ngā mokatere tiketike ake o te tipu. Waihoki, ko ngā rōpū tino taurite, he tūkino tōrangapū, ā-pāpori hoki, e kitea ana i roto i ngā mokatere iti iho o te pūtea penapena, nō reira ka tupu."
question: I te wā i whakaaturia ai e Galor rāua ko Zeria ngā mōhiohio hōu mō te ōritetanga?

context: I ētahi wā ka kitea e ngā akoranga mō te ōritetanga o te moni whiwhinga me te tupunga he whakaaturanga e whakaū ana i te ariā ānau Kuznets, e kī ana mā te whanaketanga o te ohaoha, ka nui ake te ōritetanga i te tuatahi, kātahi ka heke. E wero ana te kaitohutohu o Thomas Piketty i tēnei ariā, e kī ana mai i te 1914 ki te 1945 ngā pakanga me ngā "tumeke ohaoha me ngā tōrangapū" i whakaheke i te ōritetanga. Waihoki, e tautohe ana a Piketty ko te ariā ānau Kuznets "mīharo", me tōna whakakaha i te whakatautika o te tupu o te ohaoha i te wā roa, kāore e taea te pūkete i te nui o te ōritetanga o te ohaoha puta noa i te ao tipua mai i ngā tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua.

question: He aha te whakaaro o Piketty ko ngā take nui rawa i te whakaiti i te ōritetanga i waenganui i te 1914 ki te 1945?

text: ngā pakanga me ngā "tumeke ohaoha me ngā mahi tōrangapū"

context: Ko ētahi ariā i hangaia i ngā tau kotahi rau e whitu tekau mā iwa rau, i whakatū i ngā huarahi e whai pānga pai ai te ōritetanga ki te whanaketanga o te ohaoha. E ai ki tētahi arotakenga o te tau 1955, ko ngā penapena a te hunga whai rawa, mēnā ka nui ake ēnei i te ōritetanga, i whakaarotia hei whakawātea i te whakahekenga o te tono kiritaki. E hua ana tētahi pūrongo 2013 mō Naria kua piki ake te tupu me te nui ake o te ōritetanga o te moni whiwhinga. Ko ētahi ariā e paingia ana mai i ngā tau 1950 ki te 2011 i hē te kī he pānga tōrunga te ōritetanga ki te whanaketanga o te ohaoha. Ko ngā tātaritanga i runga anō i te whakataurite i ngā whika ōritetanga ā-tau ki ngā mokatere whakatupu ā-tau i māminga nā te mea he maha ngā tau e puta ai ngā pānga hei huringa ki te tupu o te ohaoha. I kitea e ngā kaitohutohu o TE WHK he pāhonotanga kaha i waenganui i ngā taumata iti iho o te ōritetanga i ngā whenua e tipu ana me ngā wā tautoko o te tupu o te ohaoha. Ko ngā whenua e tipu ana me te ōritetanga tiketike kua "tutuki i te tīmata i te tupu i ngā mokatere tiketike mō ētahi tau" engari "he kaha te pāhono o ngā takikupu tupu roa ake ki te ōritetanga nui ake i te tuari moni whiwhinga."
question: I te wā i hangaia ai ngā ariā e hua ana he pānga tōrunga pea te ōritetanga ki te whanaketanga ohaoha?

context: Ko ētahi ariā i hangaia i ngā tau kotahi rau e whitu tekau mā iwa rau, i whakatū i ngā huarahi e whai pānga pai ai te ōritetanga ki te whanaketanga o te ohaoha. E ai ki tētahi arotakenga o te tau 1955, ko ngā penapena a te hunga whai rawa, mēnā ka nui ake ēnei i te ōritetanga, i whakaarotia hei whakawātea i te whakahekenga o te tono kiritaki. E hua ana tētahi pūrongo 2013 mō Naria kua piki ake te tupu me te nui ake o te ōritetanga o te moni whiwhinga. Ko ētahi ariā e paingia ana mai i ngā tau 1950 ki te 2011 i hē te kī he pānga tōrunga te ōritetanga ki te whanaketanga o te ohaoha. Ko ngā tātaritanga i runga anō i te whakataurite i ngā whika ōritetanga ā-tau ki ngā mokatere whakatupu ā-tau i māminga nā te mea he maha ngā tau e puta ai ngā pānga hei huringa ki te tupu o te ohaoha. I kitea e ngā kaitohutohu o TE WHK he pāhonotanga kaha i waenganui i ngā taumata iti iho o te ōritetanga i ngā whenua e tipu ana me ngā wā tautoko o te tupu o te ohaoha. Ko ngā whenua e tipu ana me te ōritetanga tiketike kua "tutuki i te tīmata i te tupu i ngā mokatere tiketike mō ētahi tau" engari "he kaha te pāhono o ngā takikupu tupu roa ake ki te ōritetanga nui ake i te tuari moni whiwhinga."
question: E ai ki tētahi arotakenga o te tau 1955, he aha ngā penapena a te hunga whai rawa i whakaaro ai ki te wāhikē?

question: He aha ngā takikupu tipu roa e pā ana ki a ia?

text: nui ake te ōritetanga i roto i te tuari moni whiwhinga

context: Ahakoa e mōhio ana ki te tūnga matua o te tupu o te ohaoha ka taea pea te tākaro i roto i te whanaketanga tangata, te whakaiti rawakore me te whakatutukitanga o ngā Whāinga Whanaketanga o te Arikiwi, kua mōhiotia whānuitia i waenganui i te iwi whanaketanga me mahi ngā mahi motuhake kia āhei ai ngā wāhanga rawakore o te iwi ki te whai wāhi ki te tupu o te ohaoha. Ko te pānga o te tupu o te ohaoha ki te whakaiti i te rawakore – ka whakawhirinaki pea ki te taumata ōritetanga tīariari. Hei tauira, mā te ōritetanga iti o tētahi whenua e 2% mō ia upoko me te 40% o tōna iwi whānui e noho ana i roto i te rawakore, ka taea te haurua i te rawakore i roto i te tekau tau, engari ko tētahi whenua whai ōritetanga tiketike e tata ana ki te 60 tau kia taea ai te whakaiti ōrite. I roto i ngā kupu a te Hēkeretari Tianara o nga Iwi o te Hononga o te Ao, o Ban Ki-Moon: "Ahakoa e hiahiatia ana te tupu o te ohaoha, kāore i te tika mō te haere whakamua ki te whakaiti i te rawakore."
question: He aha te mea e hiahiatia ana kia āhei ai ngā mema rawakore o te iwi ki te whai wāhi ki te tupu o te ohaoha?

context: Āhua kore nei te Tākuta e haere ko ia anake, ā, i te nuinga o te wā ka mauria mai e ia tētahi, neke atu rānei o ngā hoa ki te tiritiri i ēnei mahi. Ko te nuinga o ōna hoa he tangata, i te mea kua kitea e ia he mīharo ki te aorangi Whenua. I ētahi wā ka kitea e ia ngā takahanga e whakaoho ana i tōna hiahia i a ia e ngana ana ki te ārai i ngā tōpana kino kia kaua e tūkino i ngā tāngata harakore, i te huri hītori rānei, mā te whakamahi anake i tōna mātauranga me ngā rauemi iti, pēnei i tana tīwiri oro pūkenga. Hei Ariki Wā, ka taea e te Tākuta te whakatupu anō ina pakaru tōna tinana, ka whai āhua me te tuakiri hou. He maha ngā hoariri auau kua riro i te Tākuta i roto i ana haerenga, tae atu ki ngā Daleks, ngā Cybermen, me te Matua, tētahi atu Ariki Wā whakakeke.
question: E hia ngā wā e haere ana a Doctor Who ko ia anake?

question: He aha te momo Ariki ko Doctor Who?

context: Ko te rangatū tuatahi o te hōtaka, An Unearthly Child, e whakaatu ana he mokopuna tā te Tākuta, ko Susan Foreman. I roto i te rangatū o te tau 1967, Tomb of the Cybermen, i te wā e rangirua ana a Victoria Waterfield ka maumahara te Tākuta ki tōna whānau nā te, "he tino tawhito", e kī ana te Tākuta ka taea e ia ina tino hiahia ia—"Ko te toenga o te wā e moe ana rātau i roto i tōku hinengaro". E whakaatu ana te rangatū o te tau 2005 i whakaaro te Tākuta Iwa ko ia te Ariki Wā whakamutunga e ora ana, ā, kua ngaro tōna aorangi kāinga; i roto i "The Empty Child" (2005), e kī ana a Dr. Constantine, "I mua i te tīmatanga o te pakanga, he pāpā ahau, he tipuna matua. Ināianei ehara ahau." Ka kōrero te Tākuta hei whakautu, "Āe, e mōhio ana ahau ki te whakaaro." I roto i "Smith and Jones" (2007), i te pātaitanga mehemea he tuakana tōna, ka whakautua e ia, "Kāo, kāore anō." I roto i te "Wehi i a Ia" (2006) me te "The Doctor's Daughter" (2008), e kī ana a ia he matua a ia, i mua.
question: Ko wai te ingoa o te rangatū tuatahi o Doctor Who?

E whakaatu ana te rangatū o te tau 2005 i whakaaro te Tākuta Iwa ko ia te Ariki Wā whakamutunga e ora ana, ā, kua ngaro tōna aorangi kāinga; i roto i "The Empty Child" (2005), e kī ana a Dr. Constantine, "I mua i te tīmatanga o te pakanga, he pāpā ahau, he tipuna matua. Ināianei ehara ahau." Ka kōrero te Tākuta hei whakautu, "Āe, e mōhio ana ahau ki te whakaaro." I roto i "Smith and Jones" (2007), i te pātaitanga mehemea he tuakana tōna, ka whakautua e ia, "Kāo, kāore anō." I roto i te "Wehi i a Ia" (2006) me te "The Doctor's Daughter" (2008), e kī ana a ia he matua a ia, i mua.

question: I tēhea wāhanga i whakaae ai a Tākuta Who he tuakana tōna?

context: Mai i te whakaoranga anō o te tau 2005, ko te nuinga o te wā e haere ana te Tākuta me tētahi hoa wahine tuatahi, e noho ana i tētahi tūranga kōrero nui ake. I whakaahuatia e Steven Moffat te hoa hei pūāhua matua o te whakaaturanga, i te tīmatanga anō o te pūrākau ki ia hoa, ā, he nui ake tana huringa i te Tākuta. Ko ngā hoa matua o ngā Tākuta Iwa me te Tekau ko Rose Tyler (Billie Piper), Martha Jones (Freema Agyeman), me Donna Noble (Catherine Tate) me Mickey Smith (Noel Clarke) me Jack Harkness (John Barrowman) e auau ana hei whika hoa tuarua. Ko te Tākuta Tekau mā tahi te tuatahi ki te haere tahi me tētahi tokorua mārena, a Amy Pond (Karen Gillan) me Rory Williams (Arthur Darvill), i te wā i homai e ngā hui tukutahi me River Song (Alex Kingston) me Clara Oswald (Jenna Coleman) ngā pūrākau pūrākau. Ka whakamōhiotia e te rangatū tekau a Pearl Mackie hei Pire, te hoa haere hou o te Tākuta.

context: Ko te kaitāpae pūoro tino auau i roto i ngā tau tuatahi e 15 ko Dudley Simpson, e mōhiotia ana hoki mō tana tāhuhu me ngā pūoro tūpono mō te 7 o Blake, me tana pūoro tāhuhu me te tapeke mō te putanga taketake o te 1970s o The Tomorrow People. Ko te tapeke tuatahi o Doctor Who a Simpson ko Planet of Giants (1964) ā, i haere tonu ia ki te tuhi pūoro mō ngā mahinga maha o ngā tau 1960 me 1970, tae atu ki te nuinga o ngā pūrākau o ngā wā o Jon Pertwee/Tom Baker, ka mutu ki The Horns of Nimon (1979). context: He maha nga wā i puta mai ai a Tākuta Who i runga i te atamira. I te tīmatanga o nga tau kotahi rau e whitu tekau mā rua, i tākaro a Trevor Martin i te tūranga i roto i Doctor Who me ngā Daleks i roto i ngā Kī e Whitu ki te Rā Whakamutunga. I te mutunga o nga tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua, i tākaro tahi a Jon Pertwee rāua ko Hōne Baker i te Tākuta i ngā wā rerekē i te wā o te whakahaeretanga o tētahi tākaro i huaina ko Doctor Who – The Ultimate Adventure. Mō ngā mahinga e rua, i te wā e mate ana a Pertwee, ka tākaro a David Banks (e mōhiotia ana mō te tākaro i ngā Cybermen) i te Tākuta. Ko ētahi atu whakatangi taketake kua whakatūria hei whakanaotanga māori, me ētahi atu kaitapere e tākaro ana i te Tākuta, i te wā i tuhia e Terry Nation te Kanga o ngā Daleks, he whakatangi atamira i whakatūria i te mutunga o nga tau kotahi rau e ono tekau mā rua, engari kāore he Tākuta.

question: I hoahoatia a Hutchinson Hall kia rite ki te hōro o Oxford?

text: Te Hōro o te Hāhi Karaiti

context: I muri i ngā tau 1940, ka tīmata te kāhua Gothic i te whare wānanga ki ngā kāhua o nāianei. I te tau 1955, i kirimana a Eero Saarinen ki te whakawhanake i tētahi mahere matua tuarua, nāna i hanga ngā whare ki te raki me te tonga o te Midway, tae atu ki te Laird Bell Law Quadrangle (he matatini i hangaia e Saarinen); he rangatū o ngā whare toi; a building designed by Ludwig Mies van der Rohe for the university's School of Social Service Administration;, a building which is to become the home of the Harris School of Public Policy Studies by Edward Durrell Stone, and the Regenstein Library, the largest building on campus, a brutalist structure designed by Walter Netsch of the Chicago firm Skidmore,  Owings & Merrill. Ko tētahi atu mahere matua, i hangaia i te tau 1999 me te whakahoutia i te tau 2004, i hangaia ai te Gerald Ratner Athletics Center (2003), te Max Palevsky Residential Commons (2001), South Campus Residence Hall and dining commons (2009), he hōhipera tamariki hou, me ētahi atu hanganga, whakawhānuitanga, me ngā whakaoratanga. I te tau 2011, i oti i te whare wānanga te Whare Pukapuka o Joe rāua ko Rika Mansueto, e whakarato ana i tētahi rūma pānui nui mō te whare pukapuka o te whare wānanga, ā, ka āraia te hiahia mō tētahi whare putunga pukapuka i waho o te whare wānanga.
question: I roto i te tekau tau i tīmata ai te whare wānanga ki te āhua hou ake?

context: Ka whakahaere te whare wānanga i te maha o ngā whare wānanga me ngā papatono i tua atu i ōna kura paetahi, mātauranga hoki. E whakahaere ana i ngā Kura Taiwhanga o te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Te Whare T Anō hoki, ko te Kura Rā o Hyde Park, he kura mō ngā ākonga hauā, e pupuri ana i tētahi tauwāhi i te whare wānanga o Te Whare Wānanga o Haikaika. Mai i te tau 1983, kua pupuri te Whare Wānanga o Chicago i te Kaupapa Pāngarau o te Kura o Te Whare Wānanga o Chicago, he papatono pāngarau e whakamahia ana i ngā kura tuatahi me ngā kura tuarua o te taone. Ka whakahaere te whare wānanga i tētahi papatono e kiia nei ko te Kaunihera mō ngā Akoranga Arā Atu Anō i roto i ngā Pūtaiao Pāpori me ngā Mātauranga Tangata, e whakahaere ana i ngā toamahi ā-ture hei whakarato i tētahi wānanga mō ngā ākonga paetahi, ngā kaiako, me ngā pūkenga torotoro ki te whakaatu i ngā mahi mātauranga e haere ana. Ka whakahaere hoki te whare wānanga i te Whare Wānanga o Chicago Press, te pēhi whare wānanga nui rawa atu i Te Hononga o Amerika.

context: I muri i te tau 1279, ka tūtaki te kāwanatanga o Kublai ki ngā uauatanga pūtea. Nā ngā pakanga me ngā kaupapa hanganga i pau ai te pūtea o Mongol. Ko ngā mahi ki te kohi me te kohikohi moni tāke i pāngia e te hāmate me ngā heitara tōrangapū. I muri mai i nga raruraru pūtea, ka whai mai ngā haerenga hōia hē. I rahua te whakaekenga tuarua a Kublai ki Tiapanī i te tau 1281 nā te āwhā kino. I whakararurarutia e Kublai ana whakahau ki a Annam, Champa, me Java, engari i toa i te wikitōria Pyrrhic ki Burma. I whakararurarutia ngā haerenga e te mate, te āhuarangi hākinakina, me te whenua pātata kāore e tika ana mō te pakanga eke a ngā Mongols. Ko te rangatiratanga o Tran i whakahaere i a Annam (Dai Viet) i kuru, i hinga i nga Mongol i te Pakanga o Bạch Đằng (1288). Ko te rohe Hainamana o Fujian te kāinga taketake o te hapu Hainamana Tran (Chen) i mua i to rātau hekenga i raro i a Trần Kinh (陳京, Chén Jīng) ki Dai Viet, ā, nā ōna uri i whakatū te rangatiratanga o Trần i whakahaere i Vietnam Đại Việt, ā, ka taea tonu e ētahi mema o te hapu te kōrero Hainamana pērā i te hui a te karere o te rangatiratanga o Yuan ki te rangatira Trần kōrero Hainamana ko Trần Quốc Tuấn (i muri mai ko Kingi Trần Hưng Đạo) i te tau 1282. I kī a Ahorangi Liam Kelley ko ngā tāngata o te rangatiratanga o Waiata, o Haina, pēnei i a Zhao Zhong rāua ko Xu Zongdao, i rere ki te rangatiratanga o Tran, i whakahaere i Vietnam i muri i te whakaekenga a Mongol i te Waiata, ā, i āwhina rātau i te Tran ki te whawhai ki te whakaekenga a Mongol. I takea mai te rangatiratanga o Tran i te rohe o Fujian o Haina, pērā ki te minita Daoist Xu Zongdao, nāna i hopu te whakaekenga a Mongol, ā, i kīia rātau ko "ngā tāhae ki te Raki". I mōhio a Annam, Burma, me Champa ki te mana o Mongol, ā, ka whakatū i ngā pānga takoha ki te rangatiratanga o Yuan.

context: E rua tau noa iho i whakahaere ai a Emepara Gegeen Kani, te tama me te whakakapi a Ayurbarwada, mai i te tau 1321 ki te 1323. I haere tonu a ia ki ngā kaupapa here a tōna pāpā ki te whakahou i te kāwanatanga i runga anō i ngā mātāpono o Confucian, me te āwhina a tana tumuaki matua hou ko Baiju. I te wā o tōna kingitanga, i whakapuakina tikatia te Da Yuan Tong Zhi (Hainamana: 大元通制, "ngā rōpū whānui o te Yuan Nui"), he kohinga nui o ngā waehere me ngā ture o te rangatiratanga o Yuan i tīmataria e tōna pāpā. I kōhurutia a Gegeen i roto i tētahi kupenga e rima nga rangatira o tētahi wehenga tauwhāinga, tērā pea ka ātete te rangatira o te tīmatanga ki ngā whakahōutanga a Confucian. I whakanohoia e rātau a Yesün Temür (Taidingdi rānei) ki runga i te torona, ā, i muri i tētahi ngana kāore i tutuki ki te whakamarie i ngā rangatira, ka tukua hoki ia ki te rangatiratanga.

question: E hia nga rangatira tauwhāinga i uru ki te kōhuru i a Gegeen?

context: Ko te pūnaha tikanga here i hangaia e Kublai Kani e whakaata ana i ngā ahurea maha i roto i te emepaea, tae atu ki tērā o ngā Hainamana Han, Khitans, Jurchens, Mongols, me ngā Puta o Tīpetiana. Ahakoa e tohu ana te kupu whaimana o ngā rōpū i te hanganga kāwanatanga o ngā rangatiratanga Hainamana taketake, ko te tikanga here o Yuan he ranunga o ngā huānga mai i ngā ahurea rerekē. Ko te nuinga o nga huānga kāhua Hainamana o te tikanga here i ahu mai i te iwi taketake o Tang, Waiata, tae atu ki nga rangatiratanga o Khitan Liao me Jurchen Jin. Ko nga kaitohutohu Hainamana pērā i a Liu Bingzhong rāua ko Yao Shu i kaha te mana ki te kōti o mua o Kublai, ā, i whakatūria te whakahaere kāwanatanga matua i roto i te tekau tau tuatahi o te kingitanga o Kublai. I whāngaia e tēnei kāwanatanga te wehenga mana o Hainamana tūturu i waenganui i ngā tari ā-iwi, hōia, me ngā tari whakatau, tae atu ki te Mēkeretari Matua (Zhongshu Sheng) hei whakahaere i ngā take tūmatanui, te Kaunihera Tūmataiti (Hainamana: 樞密院) hei whakahaere i ngā take hōia, me te Whakatau hei whakahaere i te tirotiro ā-roto me te tirotiro. Heoi anō, ko ngā taumahi tūturu o ngā rōpū kāwanatanga matua me ngā rōpū kāwanatanga ā-rohe, i whakaatu i tētahi īnaki nui i waenganui i ngā mana ā-iwi me ngā mana hōia, nā te whakawhirinakitanga tūturu o Mongol ki ngā rōpū hōia me ngā tari hei uho o te whakahaere. Ahakoa rā, i waihangatia tētahi tikanga here ā-iwi, me te Mēkeretari Matua hei rōpū matua mō te nuinga o ētahi atu umanga kāwanatanga (pēnei i ngā Manatu Ono kāhua Hainamana tūturu), i Haina. I ētahi wā ka whakatūria tētahi atu rōpū kāwanatanga matua e kiia nei ko te Tari Take Kāwanatanga (Shangshu Sheng) e mahi ana i te pūtea (pērā i te wā o te kingitanga o Külüg Kani, o Emepara Wuzong rānei), engari i te nuinga o te wā ka whakarērea i muri tata mai.
question: He aha ngā ahurea i wāhanga o te whakahaeretanga a Kublai?

I whāngaia e tēnei kāwanatanga te wehenga mana o Hainamana tūturu i waenganui i ngā tari ā-iwi, hōia, me ngā tari whakatau, tae atu ki te Mēkeretari Matua (Zhongshu Sheng) hei whakahaere i ngā take tūmatanui, te Kaunihera Tūmataiti (Hainamana: 樞密院) hei whakahaere i ngā take hōia, me te Whakatau hei whakahaere i te tirotiro ā-roto me te tirotiro. Heoi anō, ko ngā taumahi tūturu o ngā rōpū kāwanatanga matua me ngā rōpū kāwanatanga ā-rohe, i whakaatu i tētahi īnaki nui i waenganui i ngā mana ā-iwi me ngā mana hōia, nā te whakawhirinakitanga tūturu o Mongol ki ngā rōpū hōia me ngā tari hei uho o te whakahaere. Ahakoa rā, i waihangatia tētahi tikanga here ā-iwi, me te Mēkeretari Matua hei rōpū matua mō te nuinga o ētahi atu umanga kāwanatanga (pēnei i ngā Manatu Ono kāhua Hainamana tūturu), i Haina. I ētahi wā ka whakatūria tētahi atu rōpū kāwanatanga matua e kiia nei ko te Tari Take Kāwanatanga (Shangshu Sheng) e mahi ana i te pūtea (pērā i te wā o te kingitanga o Külüg Kani, o Emepara Wuzong rānei), engari i te nuinga o te wā ka whakarērea i muri tata mai.

context: I whakamahia hoki te rongoā ki te Uru i Haina e nga Karaitiana Nestorian o te kōti o Yuan, i reira i tapaina ai i ētahi wā he huihui, he rongoā Mohimana rānei. I te tau 1263 i te wā o te kingitanga o Kublai, i whakatūria e te tākuta Nestorian, a Ihu te Kaiwhakamāori, te Tari Rongoā ki te Uru. Ko ngā tākuta o Huihui i ngā hōhipera emepaea e rua te kawenga mō te tiaki i te whānau emepaea me ngā mema o te kōti. I ātete ngā tākuta Hainamana i te rongoā ki te Uru nā te mea i whakahē tōna pūnaha whakakatakata i te whakaaro yin-yang me te wuxing i raro i te rongoā Hainamana tūturu. Kāore he whakamāoritanga Hainamana o ngā mahi rongoā ki te Uru e mōhiotia ana, engari tērā pea i uru te Hainamana ki te Canon of Medicine a Avicenna.

Mote ko te whakamahinga o te kupu "karaehe pāpori" mō tēnei pūnaha he māminga, ā, ehara te tūnga o te tangata i roto i te pūnaha karaehe whā i te tohu o tō rātou mana pāpori me tō rātou rawa, engari he "waeine hōnore" e tika ana ki a rātou i runga i te ā-ture, nā reira ehara te tūnga o te tangata i roto i ngā karaehe i te whakapūmautanga o tō rātou tūnga,  i te mea he Hainamana whai taonga, he pai hoki te tūnga pāpori, i te mea he iti iho te rangatira o Mongol me Semu i a Mongol me Semu e noho rawakore ana, e tūkinotia ana.

context: He iti iho te tūnga o Kenya i runga i te Taupū Whakaaro Hāmate (CPI) a Transparency International, he ngahuru e ngana ana ki te ine i te whānuitanga o te hāmate o te wāhanga tūmatanui i ngā whenua maha. context: I te 28 o Hēpuari 2008, ka hainatia e Kibaki rāua ko Odinga tētahi whakaaetanga mo te whakatūnga o tētahi kāwanatanga tauwhāinga e noho ai a Odinga hei Pirimia tuarua o Kēnia. I raro i te whakaritenga, ka whakatūria e te perehitini nga minita kāpata mai i ngā puni PNU me ODM i runga anō i te kaha o ia rōpū i te Pāremata. Na te whakaaetanga i whakarite kia whakaurua e te kāpata he tuakana perehitini me nga tuarua Pirimia tokorua. I muri i nga tautohetohe, ka puta te Pāremata, ka mau te tauwhāinga tae noa ki te mutunga o te Pāremata o nāianei, mēnā rānei ka wehe atu tētahi o ngā rōpū i te mahi i mua i taua wā.

context: He mea noa iho te mahi tamariki i Kēnia. Ko te nuinga o nga tamariki mahi e hohe ana i te ahuwhenua. I te tau 2006, i whakaarohia e HĒPA tae atu ki te 30% o ngā kōtiro i ngā wāhi takutai o Malindi, Mombasa, Kilifi, me Diani i raro i te kairautanga. Ko te nuinga o nga kairau i Kenya e 9–18 te pakeke. I te tau 2009, e 400 ngā āpiha parenga tamariki i whakamahia e te Manatu Ira Tangata me ngā Take Tamariki. Ko nga take o te mahi tamariki ko te rawakore, te kore āheitanga ki te mātauranga me nga rōpū kāwanatanga ngoikore. Kua whakapūtātia e Kenya te Hui Kāo. 81 mō te arotakenga mahi i roto i ngā umanga me te Hui Kāo. 129 mō te arotakenga mahi i roto i te ahuwhenua.

context: He maha ngā hākinakina e hohe ana a Kenya, i waenganui i te kirikiti, te huihuinga, te whutupōro, te uniana whutupōro me te mekemeke. E mōhiotia nuitia ana te whenua mō tōna mana i roto i ngā tākaro tawhiti me ngā tākaro tawhiti, i rite tonu te whakaputa i ngā toa o ngā Tākaro Orimipia me ngā Tākaro Kotahitanga i roto i ngā takahanga tawhiti, i te 800 m, 1,500 m, 3,000 m steeplechase, 5,000 m, 10,000 m me te omaoma. Kei te whakahaere tonu ngā kaitākaro o Kenya (otirā ko Kalenjin) i te ao oma tawhiti, ahakoa kua whakahekea tēnei mana e te whakataetae mai i Moroko me Etiopia. Ko ngā kaitākaro tino rongonui o Kenya ko te toa o te Marathon o Boston me te toa o te ao e rua wā, ko Catherine Ndereba, ko te kaipupuri pūkete o te ao 800m, ko David Rudisha, ko Paul Tergat, me John Ngugi.
