context: E kī ana te whakarāpopototanga nui o te WG I Whakarāpopototanga mō te pūrongo Kaihanga Kaupapahere e tino whakanui ana te kohu i hua mai i ngā ngohe tangata i ngā whakamōhiotanga hauora o ngā korohū kati kati, e hua ana i te wawaenga o te whakamahanatanga tāpiri o te mata o te Ao. Ka tatauria e rātau i runga i te maia ko CO2 te kawenga mō neke atu i te hawhe o te rākeitanga kati kati whakarei. E matapae ana rātau i raro i tētahi tauari "pakihi pūnoa" (BAU), ka piki ake te pāmahana toharite o te ao tata ki te 0.3 °C ia tekau tau i te rau tau [21]. E whakatau ana rātau kua piki ake te pāmahana o te hau mata o te ao whānui i te 0.3 ki te 0.6 °C i roto i ngā tau e 100 kua taha, e hāngai ana ki te matapae o ngā tauira āhuarangi, engari he ōrite hoki te nui ki te tāupetanga o te āhuarangi māori. Kāore pea te kitenga mārama o te rākeitanga kati kati whakarei mō te tekau tau, neke atu rānei.

context: Kāore tēnei matapae i whakaurua ki te whakarāpopototanga whakamutunga mō ngā kaihanga kaupapahere. Mai i tērā wā ka whakaae te IPCC kei te hē te rā, me te whakaū anō he pakari te whakamutunga i roto i te whakarāpopototanga whakamutunga. I whakapuakina e rātau te ātetetanga mo "te taupānga kino o ngā hātepe IPCC i tēnei tauira". Kua tika te whakahua o te rā o te 2035 e te IPCC mai i te pūrongo WWF, nāna i hē te whakahua i tōna ake pūtake, he pūrongo ICSI "Ngā Rerekētanga o te Hukarere me te Hukapapa i mua, i tēnei wā hoki i runga i tētahi Tauine Huri noa, ā-Rohe hoki".
question: He aha te pūtake o te hē?

context: Kāore tēnei matapae i whakaurua ki te whakarāpopototanga whakamutunga mō ngā kaihanga kaupapahere. question: He aha te pūrongo i tika te rā?

text: "Ngā Rerekētanga o te Hukarere me te Hukapapa i mua, i tēnei wā i runga i te Tauine Ao Whānui, ā-Rohe hoki"

context: Ko te pūrongo aromatawai tuatoru (TAR) i whakaatu i tētahi kauwhata i tapaina ko "Millennial Northern Hemisphere temperature reconstruction" i runga anō i tētahi pepa 1999 nā Michael E. Mann, Raymond S. Bradley me Malcolm K. Hughes (MBH99), kua kīia ko te "kauwhata rākau hōkī". I whakawhānuitia e tēnei kauwhata te kauwhata ōrite i te Whakaahua 3.20 mai i te Pūrongo Aromatawai Tuarua o te 1995, ā, he rerekē i tētahi aronuinga i roto i te pūrongo aromatawai tuatahi kāore he wae pāmahana, engari i te āhua nei e whakaatu ana i ngā rerekētanga pāmahana nui ake o te ao i roto i ngā tau 1000 kua hipa atu, me ngā pāmahana teitei ake i te wā o te Wā Mahana o Waenganui i te waenganui o te rau tau 20. Ehara te aronuinga i te tānga raraunga tūturu, ā, i takea mai i tētahi hoahoa pāmahana i waenganui o Ingarangi, me te pāmahana i runga anō i ngā whakaaturanga pakipūmeka o ngā mara waina o Waenganui i Ingarangi. Ahakoa tēnei pikinga, kāore te mōrahi i whakaaturia mō te Wā Mahana o Waenganui i tae ki ngā pāmahana i tuhia ki waenganui o Ingarangi i te tau 2007. I tautokona te kitenga MBH99 e ngā hanganga anō i kōrerotia e Jones et al. 1998, Pollack, Huang & Shen 1998, Crowley & Lowery 2000 me Briffa 2000, mā te whakamahi i ngā raraunga me ngā aratuka rerekē. I whakakikoruatia ngā hanganga anō a Jones et al. me Briffa ki te hanganga hou MBH99 i te Whakaahua 2.21 o te pūrongo IPCC.

context: Kua whakaritea te tukanga IPCC mō te huringa āhuarangi me tōna tōtika me te angitu ki ngā mahi ki ētahi atu uauatanga taiao (whakataurite i te whakapau hāora me te whakamahana o te ao). Ki te angitu te whakapau hāora i runga anō i te Kawa Montreal, ki te Huringa Āhuarangi, i rahua te Kawa o Parakiheto. I whakamahia te kēhi Hāora hei aromatawai i te tōtika o te tukanga IPCC. Ko te āhuatanga maukati o te IPCC kua hangaia he whakaaro pūtaiao whānui i te wā e whai tonu ana ngā kāwanatanga me ngā kāwanatanga i ngā whāinga rerekē, mēnā kāore i te ātete. Ko te tauira paerangi taketake o te hanga kaupapa here o ētahi atu mātauranga kei a tātau, ko te pai ake o te urupare tōrangapū e rangiruatia ana.

question: Ko wai ngā whāinga e ātete tonu ana i te IPCC?

context: I tētahi wāhi tata ki te kotahi miriona tau ki mua, ka tomo tētahi cyanobacterium ora wātea ki tētahi pūtau eukaryotic tōmua, hei kai, hei pirinoa ā-roto rānei, engari i taea e ia te mawhiti i te vacuole phagocytic i roto. Ko ngā kiriuhi lipid-bilayer e rua e karapoti ana i ngā chloroplasts katoa e ōrite ana ki ngā kiriuhi o waho, o roto hoki o te pakitara pūtau tōraro o te cyanobacterium, ehara i te kiriuhi phagosomal mai i te kaihautū, tērā pea i ngaro. Tere tonu te noho pūkoro hou hei painga, e whakarato kai ana mā te kaihautū eukaryotic, nāna i āhei ki te noho i roto. I te roanga o te wā, ka whakawaimeha te cyanobacterium, ā, he maha ōna tīra i ngaro, i whakawhitia rānei ki te karihi o te kaihautū. Kātahi ka whakahiatotia ētahi o ōna pūmua i roto i te cytoplasm o te pūtau kaihautū, ā, ka kawea mai ki roto i te chloroplast (i mua ko te cyanobacterium).

context: Ko ēnei chloroplasts, ka taea te whakahoki hāngai ki tētahi tīpuna cyanobacterial, e mōhiotia ana ko ngā plastids matua ("plastid" i roto i tēnei horopaki ko te tikanga o te chloroplast). Ko ngā chloroplasts matua katoa nō tētahi o ngā whakapapa chloroplast e toru—ko te whakapapa glaucophyte chloroplast, te rhodophyte, te whakapapa chloroplast whero rānei, te chloroplastidan, te whakapapa chloroplast kākāriki rānei. Ko te tuarua e rua te mea nui rawa, ā, ko te whakapapa kākāriki chloroplast te mea kei roto ngā tipu whenua.

question: Ko tēhea whakapapa kei roto ko ngā tipu whenua?

context: Kei ngā chloroplasts tō rātou ake DNA, i te nuinga o te wā e whakapototia ana hei ctDNA, cpDNA rānei. E mōhiotia ana hoki ko te plastome. I kitea tuatahitia tōna nohonga i te tau 1962, ā, i te tau 1986—i te wā i raupapatia ai e ngā tīma rangahau Tiapanī e rua te DNA chloroplast o te ate me te tupeka. Mai i taua wā, e hia rau ngā DNA chloroplast mai i ngā momo maha kua whakaraupapatia, engari ko te nuinga o ngā tipu whenua me ngā algae kākāriki—ko ngā glaucophytes, ngā algae whero, me ētahi atu rōpū algal e tino mōhiotia ana, tērā pea ka whakamōhiotia ētahi tītaha ki ngā tirohanga o te hanganga me te ihirangi DNA chloroplast "pūnoa".

context: Ko te āhuatanga o te pirimia (kāore rānei) e kiia ana ko te tuatahi. Ko tētahi tikanga māmā, pōturi hoki o te manatoko i te tuatahi o tētahi tau n e mōhiotia ana ko te wehenga whakamātautau. Kei roto ko te whakamātau mēnā he taurea te n o tētahi tau tōpū i waenga i te 2 me te . He pai ake ngā hātepe hātepe i te wehenga whakamātautau hei whakamātau i te tuatahi o ngā tau nui. Kei roto i ēnei ko te whakamātautau tuatahi o Miller–Rabin, he tere engari he iti noa iho te tūponotanga o te hapa, me te whakamātautau tuatahi AKS, e whakaputa tonu ana i te whakautu tika i te wā maha engari he pōturi rawa ki te māia. E wātea ana ngā tikanga tino tere mō ngā tau o ngā puka motuhake, pēnei i ngā tau Mersenne. Tae atu ki Hānuere 2016, ko te tau tuatahi nui rawa e mōhiotia ana e 22,338,618 ngā mati ā-ira.

context: Ko te momo tuatoru o ngā whakaaro e pā ana ki ngā āhuatanga o te tuaritanga o ngā pirimia. E whakaarohia ana he maha rawa ngā māhanga māhanga, ngā takirua o ngā māhanga me te rerekētanga 2 (whakaaro māhanga). Ko te whakaaro a Polignac he whakakaha i taua whakaaro, e kī ana mō ia tau tōpū tōrunga n, he maha rawa ngā takirua o ngā tauwhāinga whai muri e rerekē ana i te 2n. E whakaarohia ana he maha rawa ngā pūmatua o te puka n2 + 1. Ko ēnei whakaaro he take motuhake o te whakaaro whānui a Schinzel e kī ana te whakaaro a H. Brocard e whā neke atu rānei ngā pirimia i waenganui i ngā tapawhā o ngā pirimia whai muri e nui ake ana i te 2. E kī ana te whakaaro a Legendre he tau tuatahi i waenganui i te n2 me te (n + 1)2 mō ia tau tōpū tōrunga n. E whakahuatia ana e te whakaaro kaha ake a Cramér.

E whakaarohia ana he maha rawa ngā māhanga māhanga, ngā takirua o ngā māhanga me te rerekētanga 2 (whakaaro māhanga). Ko te whakaaro a Polignac he whakakaha i taua whakaaro, e kī ana mō ia tau tōpū tōrunga n, he maha rawa ngā takirua o ngā tauwhāinga whai muri e rerekē ana i te 2n. E whakaarohia ana he maha rawa ngā pūmatua o te puka n2 + 1. Ko ēnei whakaaro he take motuhake o te whakaaro whānui a Schinzel e kī ana te whakaaro a H. Brocard e whā neke atu rānei ngā pirimia i waenganui i ngā tapawhā o ngā pirimia whai muri e nui ake ana i te 2. E kī ana te whakaaro a Legendre he tau tuatahi i waenganui i te n2 me te (n + 1)2 mō ia tau tōpū tōrunga n. E whakahuatia ana e te whakaaro kaha ake a Cramér.

context: He tino hira te ariā o te tau tuatahi, nā reira kua whakawhānuitia i roto i ngā momo peka pāngarau. I te nuinga o te wā, ko te "matua" e tohu ana i te mōkito, i te kore rānei e taea te kōhua, i runga i te tikanga tika. Hei tauira, ko te āpure matua te āpureroto iti rawa o tētahi āpure F e pupuri ana i te 0 me te 1. Ko te Q, ko te āpure mutunga rānei me ngā huānga p, nō reira te ingoa. I te nuinga o te wā ko te tikanga tuarua, tāpiri e hiahiatia ana mā te whakamahi i te kupu matua, arā, ka taea tētahi ahanoa, ahurei, te pirau ki ōna wae matua. Hei tauira, i roto i te ariā kono, ko te kono matua he kono e kore e taea te tuhi hei tapeke kono o ngā kono e rua. Ka taea te whakapuaki ahurei i tētahi kono hei tapeke tūhono o ngā kono matua. Ko ngā tauira matua me ngā manifolds matua 3 ētahi atu tauira o tēnei momo.

context: Ko te tikanga, ka iti iho tēnei tikanga ina whakareatia tētahi tau ki te p, he tino taumira ki te uara pūmau pūnoa (e kīia ana hoki ko te pirimia mutunga kore). I te whakaotinga o te Q (ā-ringa, te whakakī i ngā āputa) e pā ana ki te uara pūmau ka puta mai te āpure o ngā tau tūturu, mā te whakaoti i te tikanga p-adic |−|p ka puta te āpure o ngā tau p-adic. Ko ēnei ngā huarahi katoa e taea ana ki te whakaoti i te Q, e te whakatakotoranga a Ostrowski. Ka taea te whakawhiti whakamuri i ētahi pātai tauhanga e pā ana ki ngā āpure ā-ao whānui ake rānei ki ngā āpure kua oti (paetata rānei). Ka tāraro anō tēnei mātāpono paetata-huri noa i te hiranga o ngā matua ki te ariā tau.

question: He aha te mātāpono e whakamiramira ana i te tikanga o ngā matua i roto i te ariā tau

context: I waenganui i Bingen me Bonn, ka rere te Rhine Waenganui i roto i te Rhine Gorge, he hanganga i hangaia e te horo. I ōrite te tere o te horo ki te pikinga ake o te rohe, nā reira ka mahue te awa ki tōna taumata taketake i te wā e piki ake ana ngā whenua karapoti. He tino hōhonu te āpitihanga, a, ko te whārōrō o te awa e mōhiotia ana mō ōna whare nui me ngā mara waina. He Pae Tuku iho o te Ao UNESCO (2002) e mohiotia ana ko "te Romantic Rhine", neke atu i te 40 nga whare me nga pa mai i nga Tau Waenganui, me te maha o nga kainga whenua ataahua, ataahua hoki.

question: He aha te ingoa o te wāhanga o te Rhine Gorge e mōhiotia ana e UNESCO?

context: Ko te Rhine-Meuse Delta, te rohe māori tino hira o Hōrana e tīmata ana i te taha o Millingen aan de Rijn, e tata ana ki te rohe o Tatimana-Tiamana me te wehenga o te Rhine ki Waal me Nederrijn. I te mea ko te Rhine e āwhina ana i te nuinga o te wai, ka whakamahia nuitia te wā poto ake o Rhine Delta. Heoi anō, ka whakamahia hoki tēnei ingoa mō te delta awa e rere ai te Rhine ki te Roto o Constance, nā reira he mārama ake te karanga i te delta nui ake o Rhine-Meuse, ko Rhine–Meuse–Scheldt delta rānei, i te mea ka mutu te Scheldt i te delta kotahi.

context: Ko te hukapapa whakamutunga i rere mai i ~74,000 (BP = I mua i tēnei wā), tae noa ki te mutunga o te Pleistocene (~11,600 BP). I te raki o Uropi, e rua ngā wāhanga tino mātao, e tata ana ki te 70,000 BP me te 29,000–24,000 BP. Ko te wāhanga whakamutunga he iti noa iho te mōrahi o te tau hukapapa whakamutunga o te ao (Mōrahi Glacial Whakamutunga). I roto i tēnei wā, ka rere te Rhine o raro ki te hauauru puta noa i Hōrana, ā, ka toro atu ki te tonga-māuru, mā te Hongere Ingarihi, ā, i te mutunga, ki te Moana Atarangi. He whenua maroke te Hongere Ingarihi, te Hongere o Airani me te nuinga o te Moana ki te Raki, i te nuinga o te mea tata ki te 120 m (390 ft) te teitei o te moana i raro iho i tēnei rā.
question: Āhea te tīmatanga o te hukapapa whakamutunga?

context: Ko te hukapapa whakamutunga i rere mai i ~74,000 (BP = I mua i tēnei wā), tae noa ki te mutunga o te Pleistocene (~11,600 BP). I te raki o Uropi, e rua ngā wāhanga tino mātao, e tata ana ki te 70,000 BP me te 29,000–24,000 BP. Ko te wāhanga whakamutunga he iti noa iho te mōrahi o te tau hukapapa whakamutunga o te ao (Mōrahi Glacial Whakamutunga). I roto i tēnei wā, ka rere te Rhine o raro ki te hauauru puta noa i Hōrana, ā, ka toro atu ki te tonga-māuru, mā te Hongere Ingarihi, ā, i te mutunga, ki te Moana Atarangi. He whenua maroke te Hongere Ingarihi, te Hongere o Airani me te nuinga o te Moana ki te Raki, i te nuinga o te mea tata ki te 120 m (390 ft) te teitei o te moana i raro iho i tēnei rā.

context: I te tīmatanga pōturi o Uropi ki te raki mai i te 22,000 tau ki mua, ka tīmata te rewa o te oneone whakatotoka me ngā hukarere alpine whakawhānui, ā, ka rewa te hukarere o te hōtoke i te kōanga. Ko te nuinga o te tukunga i arareretia ki te Rhine me tōna toronga whakararo. Ko te tere o te whakamahana me ngā huringa o te otaota, ki te whakatuwhera i te ngahere, i tīmata tata ki te 13,000 BP. Tae noa ki te 9000 BP, kua tino ngahere a Uropi. Na te tīngongo o te hukapapa huri noa, ka piki ngā taumata wai moana, ā, ka waipuketia anōtia te Hongere Ingarihi me te Moana ki te Raki. Na te wai rewa, i tāpiri atu ki te moana me te totohu whenua, i toromi ai ngā takutai o mua o Uropi.

context: I te mutunga o te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao, i raro te Rhineland i te Tiriti o Versailles. I whakataua e tēnei ka nohoia e nga pirihitini, tae noa ki te tau 1935, ā, i muri iho i tērā, ka rāhuitia te ope Tiamana kia tomo. Ko te Tiriti o Versailles me tēnei whakarato, i te nuinga o te wā, i nui ai te hīkaka i Tiamana, ā, i te nuinga o te wā e kīia ana hei āwhina i te pikinga o Adolf Hitler ki te mana. I mahue i nga pirihitini te Rhineland, i te tau 1930, ā, i te tau 1936, i tino paingia e te ope taua o Tiamana. Ahakoa tērā pea ka āraia e nga pirihitini te mahi anō, kāore a Ingarangi rāua ko Wīwī i hiahia ki te mahi pēnā, he āhuatanga o ta rātau kaupapa whakangāwari ki a Hītara.
question: I te wā i herea ai a Rhineland ki te Tiriti o Versailles?

context: I raro i ngā ture o te Ture Pākehā 1978, ka whakatūria he huihuinga i pōtitia ki Etinitini mēnā i pōti te nuinga o te pōti o Pirihitini i roto i tētahi taupānga kia tū i te 1 o Mati 1979 e tohu ana i te 40% neke atu rānei o te katoa o te pōti. I rahua te taupānga mana whakahaere o Pirihitini o te tau 1979 ki te whakatū i tētahi Whakaminenga o Pirihitini. Ahakoa e 51.6% te pōti e manakohia ana e tētahi Whakaminenga o Pirihitini, kāore tēnei whika i ōrite ki te 40% o te paepae pōti katoa e hiahiatia ana kia puta i te mehua, i te mea kāore i taea e te 32.9% o te iwi pōti e tika ana, kāore rānei i taea te pōti.

context: Ko te nuinga o nga mahi a te Pāremata o Pirihitini e mahia ana i roto i te komiti. He kaha ake te tūranga o nga komiti i te Pāremata o Pirihitini i ētahi atu pūnaha paremata, ko tētahi wāhanga hei whakakaha i te tūranga o nga kaihoko i roto i ta rātau tirotiro i te kāwanatanga, ā, ko tētahi wāhanga hei utu i te mea kāore he ruma whakahōu. Ko te tūranga matua o ngā komiti i te Pāremata o Pirihitini ko te tango whakaaturanga mai i ngā kaiwhakaatu, te whakahaere uiui me te tirotiro i ngā ture. Ka tū ngā hui a te komiti i te Tūrei, i te ata o te Wenerei me te Rāitema i te wā e noho ana te Pāremata. Ka taea hoki e ngā komiti te hui ki ētahi atu tauwāhi puta noa i Pākehā.

Ko te tūranga matua o ngā komiti i te Pāremata o Pirihitini ko te tango whakaaturanga mai i ngā kaiwhakaatu, te whakahaere uiui me te tirotiro i ngā ture. Ka tū ngā hui a te komiti i te Tūrei, i te ata o te Wenerei me te Rāitema i te wā e noho ana te Pāremata. Ka taea hoki e ngā komiti te hui ki ētahi atu tauwāhi puta noa i Pākehā.
question: Ki hea e tūtaki ai ngā komiti i waho o te Pāremata?

text: ētahi atu tauwāhi puta noa i Scotland

context: Ko te tikanga ka whakatūria tētahi atu momo komiti hei tirotiro i ngā pire tūmataiti i tukuna ki te Pāremata o Pākehā e tētahi rōpū o waho, kaiwhakahaere rānei ehara i te mema o te Pāremata o Pākehā, o te Kāwanatanga rānei o Pākehā. Ko te tikanga e pā ana ngā pire tūmataiti ki ngā kaupapa whanaketanga tauine nui pēnei i ngā kaupapa hanganga e hiahia ana ki te whakamahi whenua, rawa rānei. context: Pērā ki te Whare o Ngātahi, he maha ngā tohu e pā ana ki te noho hei MSP. I whakaurua aua tohu i raro i te Ture Whakawāteatanga o te Whare o Ngātahi 1975 me te Ture Iwi o Ingarangi 1981. Ko te tikanga, me neke atu i te 18 tau ngā mema, ā, me noho hei tangata whenua o Te Hononga o Ingarangi, te Whenua o Airangi, tētahi o ngā whenua i te Kotahitanga o ngā Iwi, he tangata whenua o tētahi rohe o Ingarangi o rāwāhi, he tangata whenua rānei o Ūropi e noho ana i te UK. Kua whakanoatia ngā mema o ngā pirihimana me ngā ope taua kia kaua e noho i te Pāremata o Pirihitini hei MSP i pōtitia, ā, waihoki, ka whakakorea ngā pononga tūmatanui me ngā mema o ngā rōpū whakahaere kē. Kāore e taea e tētahi tangata te noho i te Pāremata o Pākehā mēnā ka whakawāteatia he pōrangi ia i raro i ngā ture o te Ture Hauora Hinengaro (Tiaki me te Rongoā) (Pākehā) 2003.

He tino pai te whakataurite o ēnei mea katoa ki ngā kāwanatanga haumaru, haumaru, whakawātea, e whakawhāiti ana ki te tika pāpori ki te kupu whakapuaki.
question: He aha te whakaaetanga a te kāwanatanga ki te tika pāpori e whāiti ana?

context: Ko ngā nekeneke Māori pēnei i te Tuakana Mohimana, "e mōhiotia ana mō te whakarato whakarurutanga, āwhina akoranga, whare hauora koreutu, utu iti rānei, āwhina whare ki ngā ākonga mai i waho o te taone, ngā rōpū tohutohu ākonga, te whakangāwari i ngā hākari mārena maha hei karo i ngā tono utu nui, te āwhina ā-ture, ngā pūkenga hākinakina, me ngā rōpū wāhine." text: karo i ngā tono wānanga utu nui

context: I a ia e ako ana i te ture me te whakaaro whakaaro i Ingarangi me Tiamana, ka noho a Hēnara hei mema o te peka o Rāwāhi o te Rōpū Mohimana o Īnia Katoa. I hoki mai a ia ki Aotearoa i te tau kotahi mano e waru tekau mā rua. I a ia e wehe ana i tōna wā i waenganui i te mahi ture me ngā whiti whakaaro, ka noho hohe tonu a Hānara i roto i te Rōpū Mohimana. Kaore a ia i tautoko i te whakaurutanga o Īnia i te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao, ā, ka noho tata tonu ki ngā kaiārahi tōrangapū Mohimana pērā i a Mātāmua Ali Johar rāua ko Mātāmua Ali Jinnah. He kaiwhakawāwā a ia mo te rōpū ā iwi o Īnia. I whakaputaina ngā kauhau Ingarihi e whitu a Hēnara e te pēhi o te Whare Wānanga o Oxford i te tau 1934 i roto i tētahi pukapuka e huaina ana ko te Hanganga Anō o te Whakaaro Whakapono i roto i te Islam. E noho ana ēnei kauhau ki te tūranga o te Islam hei hāhi, he whakaaro tōrangapū, ā-ture hoki i te wā o nāianei.

text: Te Whare Wānanga me te Whare Wānanga Hōia

context: Ko "Te Kāwanatanga Ingarihi", e mōhiotia ana i mua ko te "Kāwanatanga Āmāri o Iraki me te Levant" ā, i mua i tērā ko te "Kāwanatanga Āmāri o Iraki", (ā, i karangatia ko te tauwhāiti o Te Kāwanatanga o Iraki", he rōpū tinihanga pūhāhā Wahhabi/Salafi e ārahina ana, ā, ko te nuinga o ngā Arapi Hihi mai i Iraki me Hiria. I te tau 2014, ka karangatia e te rōpū he kōtiro, he mana whakapono, tōrangapū, hōia hoki i runga i ngā Pirihitini katoa puta noa i te ao. Tae atu ki Mati 2015, he mana tōna ki te rohe e nohoia ana e te tekau miriona tāngata i Iraki me Hiria, ā, he mana ingoa tōna ki ngā wāhi iti o Ripia, o Naria me Awhekenetāna. (Ahakoa he āhua whakaahua i a ia anō, kāore i te āhukahuka o te ao whānui.) Ka mahi hoki te rōpū, he pānga rānei ki ētahi atu wāhi o te ao, tae atu ki Āwherika ki te Raki me Āhia ki te Tonga.
question: He aha te momo rōpū o te Kāwanatanga Ingarihi?

context: He nui te mana o te Royal Geographical Society of London me ētahi atu rōpū matawhenua i Uropi, ā, i taea e rātou te pūtea i ngā kaihaere ka hoki mai me ngā kōrero o ā rātou kitenga. I noho hoki ēnei rōpū hei wāhi mō ngā kaihaere ki te tiritiri i ēnei pūrākau. I tautokona hoki e ngā kaitātai whenua tōrangapū pērā i a Friedrich Ratzel o Tiamana me Halford Mackinder o Ingarangi te emepaea. I whakapono a Ratzel e hiahiatia ana te whakawhānuitanga mo te oranga o tētahi kāwanatanga, i te wā e tautoko ana a Mackinder i te whakawhānuitanga o te emepaea o Ingarangi; Ko ēnei tohenga e rua i whakanui i te whakatakotoranga mo te nuinga o nga tau.
question: I whānau mai a Friedrich Ratzel i hea?

context: Ko te Orientalism, e ai ki te whakaaro a Edward Said, e pā ana ki te āhua o te whakawhanake a te Uru i tētahi papawhenua whakaaro o te Rāwhiti. E whakawhirinaki ana tēnei papawhenua pohewa ki tētahi kōrero tino nui e kore e tohu i te rerenga kētanga, i te ao pāpori rānei o te Rāwhiti. Engari, mā te whakanui i te Rāwhiti, ka whakamahia e tēnei kōrero te ariā o ngā tuakiri ā-wāhi hei waihanga i te rerekētanga me te tawhiti i waenganui i "mātou" te Uru me "rātou" ki te Rāwhiti, "i konei" rānei i te Uru me "reira" i te Rāwhiti. I tino kitea tēnei rerekētanga i roto i ngā mahi kuputuhi me ngā mahi arokite o ngā akoranga Pākehā o mua o te Rāwhiti i whakatū ai te Rāwhiti hei mea haumaru, he whakamuri hoki ki te ātete ki te Uru haumaru. Ko te tautuhi i te Rāwhiti hei kitenga tōraro ki a ia anō, ehara i te mea ko tōna iti iho, ehara i te mea ko te whakanui ake i te āhua o te Uru, engari he tikanga hoki ki te whakaraupapa i te Rāwhiti me te whakamōhio ki te Uru kia taea ai te whakahaere, te whakahaere. Nō reira i noho ai te kōrero o te Orientalism hei whakatikatika ariā o te emepaea o mua o te Uru, i te mea i hangaia he tinana mātauranga me ngā whakaaro e whakahau ana i te mana pāpori, ahurea, tōrangapū, ohaoha hoki o ētahi atu rohe.
question: Ko te Orientalism e pā ana ki te āhua o te whakawhanaketanga o te Uru i te aha o te Rāwhiti?

question: I kite te Uru i a rātau anō he aha i whakaritea ki te rāwhiti?

context: Ko te emepaea ahurea ina puta te mana o tētahi whenua i roto i ngā porowhita pāpori me te ahurea, i.e. tōna mana ngohengohe, kia huri ai i te tirohanga whanonga, ahurea, pāpori hoki o tētahi atu. He nui ake tēnei i te pūoro "kē", te pouaka whakaata, te pikitia rānei e paingia ana e te rangatahi, engari ko taua ahurea kaingākau e huri ana i ō rātou ake tūmanako ki te ora me tō rātou hiahia kia rite tō rātou ake whenua ki te whenua kē e whakaahuatia ana. Hei tauira, ko ngā whakaahuatanga o ngā āhua noho rangatira o Amerika i roto i te hopi hopi o Dallas i te wā o te Pakanga Makariri i whakarerekē i ngā tūmanako a ngā Romaniana; ko tētahi tauira hou ake ko te mana o ngā rangatū whakaari Kōria ki te Tonga i Kōrea ki te Raki. Kāore i ngaro te hiranga o te hiko ngohengohe i runga i ngā kāwanatanga whakawhanake, e whawhai ana i taua āhuatanga ki ngā rāhuitanga i runga i te ahurea kaingākau kē, te mana o te ipurangi me ngā rīhi aorangi kāore i te manakore, ērā atu mea. Ehara hoki i te mea he wāhanga o te emepaea o Roma, ka kitea ngā rangatira paetata ki ngā painga me ngā taonga o te ahurea me te āhua noho o Roma, me te whāinga kia noho rātou hei kaiuru hiahia.
question: Ina pā te emepaea ki ngā tikanga pāpori o tētahi kāwanatanga, he aha te ingoa?

question: He pēhea te whawhai a ngā kāwanatanga ki te emepaea ahurea?

context: Kua roa te whanaungatanga i waenganui i te pūmatuatanga, te rangatiratanga, me te emepaea i waenganui i ngā kōrero hītori me ngā kaitohutohu tōrangapū. Ko te nuinga o ngā taupatupatu i tīmataria e ngā kaitohutohu pērā i a J. A. Hobson (1858–1940), Joseph Schumpeter (1883–1950), Thorstein Veblen (1857–1929), me Norman Angell (1872–1967). Ahakoa i tino whai hua ēnei kaituhi ehara i te Māori i mua i te Pakanga Tuatahi o te Ao, ka noho hohe tonu rātau i ngā tau o te pakanga. Na a rātau mahi paheko i whakamōhio te akoranga o te emepaea me tōna pānga ki Uropi, ā, i āwhina hoki ki ngā whakaata i te pikinga o te matatini tōrangapū hōia i Te Hononga o Amerika mai i ngā tau kotahi mano e rima tekau mā rua. I tautohe a Hobson ka taea e ngā whakahōu pāpori ā-kāinga te rongoā i te mate o te ao whānui o te emepaea mā te tango i tōna tūāpapa ohaoha. I whakaaro a Hobson ka taea e te raweke a te kāwanatanga mā te tāke te whakapiki i te whakapaunga whānui ake, te waihanga rawa, me te whakahauhau i tētahi raupapa rangimārie, manawanui, maha o te ao.

I tautohe a Hobson ka taea e ngā whakahōu pāpori ā-kāinga te rongoā i te mate o te ao whānui o te emepaea mā te tango i tōna tūāpapa ohaoha. I whakaaro a Hobson ka taea e te raweke a te kāwanatanga mā te tāke te whakapiki i te whakapaunga whānui ake, te waihanga rawa, me te whakahauhau i tētahi raupapa rangimārie, manawanui, maha o te ao.

context: I tīmata te nekeneke ka noho ko te Hāhi Methodist United i te waenganui o te rau tau 18 i roto i te Hāhi o Ingarangi. I tūtaki tētahi rōpū iti o ngā ākonga, tae atu ki a John Wesley, Charles Wesley me George Whitefield, i te whare wānanga o Oxford. I arotahi rātau ki te ako i te Paipera, ki te ako tikanga o te karaipiture me te noho i tētahi oranga tapu. Ka tawai ētahi atu ākonga ki a rātou, e kī ana ko rātou te "Karapu Tapu" me "ngā Methodist", he tikanga me te tino taipitopito i roto i ā rātou akoranga Paipera, ngā whakaaro me te āhua noho whakatinana. I te mutunga, ka tīmata ngā Methodist i ngā rōpū takitahi, i ngā akomanga rānei mō ngā mema o te Hāhi o Ingarangi e hiahia ana ki te noho i tētahi oranga whakapono ake.

context: Kua whakaritea e ngā mema o te Hāhi Methodist o te United Methodist e tohu ana ki te tūnga pro-life ki roto i te Taskforce of United Methodists on Abortion and Sexuality (TUMAS) ki te whakanui ake i tō rātou tūnga i roto i te hāhi. Tērā tētahi ngana ki te unu i te mema o te Hāhi Methodist United i roto i te Religious Coalition for Reproductive Choice i tā rātou Hui Nui, i tū i Me 2012, me tētahi petihana i puta i roto i te komiti iti ture me ngā pōti komiti, engari kāore i hoatu he pōti papa. context: I roto i te hītori, kua tautokona e te Hāhi Methodist te nekeneke whakangāwari. I whakatūpato a John Wesley ki ngā mōrearea o te inu i roto i tana kauhau rongonui, "The Use of Money," me tana reta ki tētahi waipiro. I tētahi wā, me oati ngā minita Methodist kia kaua e inu, ā, ka whakahauhau i a rātau whakaminenga kia pērā anō. I teie mahana, te parau ra te Ekalesia Methodist Amui e "te haapapu ra te reira i ta tatou turu roa i te haapaeraa i te ava ei ite haapao maitai i te here faaora e te faaora o te Atua i te taata." Ko te mea, ka whakamahia e te Hāhi Methodist Kotahitanga te wai karepe kāore i te mohukihuki i roto i te hakarameta o te Kotahitanga Tapu, nā reira "e whakapuaki ana i te āwangawanga pastoral mō te whakaora i te waipiro, e āhei ai te whai wāhitanga o ngā tamariki me te taiohi, me te tautoko i te whakaaturanga a te hāhi mo te papare i te waipiro." Waihoki, i te tau 2011 me te 2012, ka karangatia e te Poari Nui o te Hāhi me te Rōpū Nui o te Hāhi Methodist ki ngā Methodist katoa kia papare i te waipiro mō te Lent.

context: E whakahē ana te Hāhi Methodist United i te whakatakotoranga i te hotokore ki te whakaakoranga o te Karaipiture. Nō reira, e tautoko ana, e whakawhānui ana te Hāhi i tana mahi minita ki ngā tangata e ātete ana i ngā pakanga katoa, i tētahi pakanga rānei, nō reira kāore e pai ana ki te mahi i roto i ngā ope taua, ki te mahi tahi rānei ki ngā pūnaha o te mahi hōia. Heoi anō, e tautoko ana, e whakawhānui ana hoki te Hāhi Methodist United i tana mahi ki aua tangata e kōwhiri ana ki te mahi i roto i ngā ope taua, ki te whakaae rānei ki ētahi atu mahi. E kī ana hoki te hāhi "he Karaitiana rātau e mōhio ana kāore te huarahi o te mahi hōia, te huarahi rānei o te kore mahi i te tika i ngā wā katoa i mua i te Atua."

context: Ko nga minita Methodist tuatahi i whakawahia e John Wesley, he tohunga o te Hahi o Ingarangi, na te raruraru i puta mai i te American Revolution i wehe ai nga Methodist i Amerika i te Hahi o Ingarangi me ona karakia. I tēnei rā, kei roto i ngā minita ngā tāne me ngā wāhine kua whakaritea e ngā pīhopa hei kaumātua me ngā rikono, ā, ka whakatūria ki ngā mahi maha. Ko ngā kaumātua i roto i te Hāhi Methodist o te Hononga o Te Hononga o te Wānanga o Te Hononga o Te T Ko te nuinga o te wā e mahi ana rātau hei hepara i roto i ngā whakaminenga o te rohe. Kei roto ngā diakono i te mahi taviniraa, ā, ka taea te mahi hei kaiwhakatangitangi, hei kaiako, hei kaiwhakahaere pakihi, me ētahi atu wāhi. E hiahiatia ana ngā kaumātua me ngā rikona kia whiwhi i tētahi tohu matua (ko te nuinga o te wā he M.Div.), tētahi atu tohu ōrite rānei, i mua i te kōmihanatanga, kātahi ka whakatoroa. Ko ngā kaumātua e tino tūhono ana, he mema ia o tā rātou Raupapa Kaumātua o te Hui ā-Tau. Waihoki, ko ia rikona e tino tūhono ana, he mema ia o tā rātou Rūnanga Rūnanga ā-Tau.

context: Ahakoa i mua i te hokinga mai o Washington, i tonoa e Dinwiddie he ope e 40 tāngata i raro i a William Trent ki taua wāhi, i reira i ngā marama tuatahi o te tau 1754 ka tīmata rātau ki te hanga i tētahi pā iti kua whakanohoia. I tonoa e Kāwana Duquesne ētahi atu ope Wīwī i raro i a Claude-Pierre Pecaudy de Contrecœur ki te whakaora i a Saint-Pierre i taua wā anō, ā, e 500 ngā tāngata i ārahi a Contrecœur ki te tonga mai i Pā Venango i te 5 o Āperira 1754. I te taenga atu o ēnei ope ki te pā i te 16 o Āperira, ka whakaaetia e Contrecœur te ope iti a Trente kia mahue. I hokona e ia a rātau taputapu hanga kia haere tonu te hanga i te mea i noho ko Fort Duquesne.

question: He aha te pā e hangaia ana kia whakaingoatia?

context: I muri i te hokinga mai o Washington ki Williamsburg, ka whakahaua ia e Dinwiddie kia ārahi i tētahi ope nui ake hei āwhina i a Trent i tana mahi. I a ia e haere ana, ka mōhio a Washington ki te hokinga mai o Trent. I te mea i kī taurangi a Tanaghrisson i te tautoko ki te Ingarangi, ka haere tonu a Washington ki Fort Duquesne, ka tūtaki ki te kaiārahi Mingo. I te mōhiotanga ki tētahi ope matakite Wīwī i taua rohe, i Washington, me Tanaghrisson me tana ope, ka mīharo ngā Kānata i te 28 o Me i te mea i mōhiotia ko te Pakanga o Jumonville Glen. He tokomaha nga Kānata i patua e rātau, tae atu ki to rātau āpiha rangatira, a Hohepa Coulon de Jumonville, i whakaritea e Tanaghrisson tōna māhunga ki te tomahawk. E kī ana te kaituhituhi hītori o Fred Anderson e mahi ana a Tanaghrisson kia whiwhi ai i te tautoko a te Ingarangi me te whai mana anō ki tōna ake iwi. I hiahia rātau ki te tautoko i te Wīwī, he roa ō rātau pānga tauhokohoko. I kī atu tētahi o ngā tāngata a Tanaghrisson ki a Contrecoeur kua patua a Jumonville e te ahi pū o Ingarangi.

context: I whakakapia ia e Newcastle i Hānuere 1756 ki a Lord Loudoun, me Meiha Tianara James Abercrombie hei tuarua i te whakahau. Kāore tētahi o ēnei tāngata i tino mōhio ki te tokotoru o ngā āpiha i tonoa e Wīwī ki Amerika ki te Raki. I tae mai ngā ope taua auau o Wīwī ki Aotearoa i Me 1756, i arahina e Major General Louis-Joseph de Montcalm, ā, i tuaruatia e te Chevalier de Lévis me Kānara François-Charles de Bourlamaque, he hōia pūkenga katoa mai i te Pakanga o te Whakawhitiwhitinga o Aotearoa. context: I homai e Aristotle he matapakinga whakaaro mo te ariā o te tōpana hei wāhanga tau tōpu o te cosmology Aristotelian. I te tirohanga a Aristotle, e whā ngā huānga o te ao teretere e okioki ana i ngā "wāhi māori" rerekē i roto. I whakapono a Aristotle ko ngā ahanoa nekeneke i runga i te Ao, ko te nuinga o ngā huānga whenua me te wai, kei tō rātou wāhi tūturu i runga i te whenua, ā, ka noho pērā tonu mēnā ka waiho ko rātou anake. I wehewehea e ia te āhua taketake o ngā ahanoa ki te kimi i tō rātou "wāhi tūturu" (hei tauira, kia hinga ngā tinana taumaha), nāna i ahu mai ki te "nekeneke māori", me te nekeneke māori, ā-kaha rānei, e hiahiatia ana kia haere tonu te whakamahi i tētahi tōpana. Ko tēnei ariā, i runga anō i te wheako o ia rā o te nekehanga o ngā ahanoa, pēnei i te whakamahinga auau o tētahi tōpana e hiahiatia ana hei neke tonu i te kāta, he raruraru ariā mō te whanonga o ngā pūwhiti, pēnei i te rere o ngā pere. Ko te wāhi e nekehia ai e te kaikopere te pūwhiti i te tīmatanga o te rerenga, ā, i te wā e rere ana te pūwhiti i te hau, kāore he take māia e kitea ana e mahi ana. I mōhio a Aristotle ki tēnei raruraru, ā, i tono kia kawea e te hau i te ara o te pūwhiti te pūwhiti ki tōna ūnga. E tono ana tēnei whakamāramatanga i tētahi haere tonu pēnei i te hau mō te huringa o te wāhi i te ahuwhānui.
question: Na wai i homai he kōrero whakaaro mo te kaha?

context: I homai e Aristotle he matapakinga whakaaro mo te ariā o te tōpana hei wāhanga tau tōpu o te cosmology Aristotelian. I te tirohanga a Aristotle, e whā ngā huānga o te ao teretere e okioki ana i ngā "wāhi māori" rerekē i roto. I whakapono a Aristotle ko ngā ahanoa nekeneke i runga i te Ao, ko te nuinga o ngā huānga whenua me te wai, kei tō rātou wāhi tūturu i runga i te whenua, ā, ka noho pērā tonu mēnā ka waiho ko rātou anake. I wehewehea e ia te āhua taketake o ngā ahanoa ki te kimi i tō rātou "wāhi tūturu" (hei tauira, kia hinga ngā tinana taumaha), nāna i ahu mai ki te "nekeneke māori", me te nekeneke māori, ā-kaha rānei, e hiahiatia ana kia haere tonu te whakamahi i tētahi tōpana. Ko tēnei ariā, i runga anō i te wheako o ia rā o te nekehanga o ngā ahanoa, pēnei i te whakamahinga auau o tētahi tōpana e hiahiatia ana hei neke tonu i te kāta, he raruraru ariā mō te whanonga o ngā pūwhiti, pēnei i te rere o ngā pere. Ko te wāhi e nekehia ai e te kaikopere te pūwhiti i te tīmatanga o te rerenga, ā, i te wā e rere ana te pūwhiti i te hau, kāore he take māia e kitea ana e mahi ana. I mōhio a Aristotle ki tēnei raruraru, ā, i tono kia kawea e te hau i te ara o te pūwhiti te pūwhiti ki tōna ūnga. E tono ana tēnei whakamāramatanga i tētahi haere tonu pēnei i te hau mō te huringa o te wāhi i te ahuwhānui.

question: He aha te kōrero a Aristotle ki te nekeneke whakahau?

context: Ko te whanaketanga o ngā ariā taketake mō ngā tōpana i haere tonu i runga i ngā rārangi o te whakakotahitanga o ngā whakaaro rerekē. Hei tauira, i whakakotahitia e Isaac Newton te tōpana e haepapa ana ki ngā ahanoa e taka ana ki te mata o te Ao me te tōpana e haepapa ana ki ngā āwhiotanga o ngā mīhini tiretiera i roto i tana ariā tō ā-papa whānui. I whakaaturia e Michael Faraday rāua ko James Clerk Maxwell i whakakotahitia ngā tōpana hiko me ngā tōpana autō mā tētahi ariā ōrite o te ā-hiko. I te rau tau 20, na te whanaketanga o ngā mīhini quantum i ahu mai ki tētahi mōhiotanga hōu ko ngā tōpana taketake tuatahi e toru (hāunga te tō ā-papa) he whakaaturanga o te take (fermions) e tauwhiti ana mā te whakawhiti i ngā korakora mariko e kiia nei ko ngā boson ine. Ko tēnei tauira paerewa o te ahupūngao korakora e whakatakoto ana i tētahi ōritetanga i waenganui i ngā tōpana me ngā kaipūtaiao ki te matapae i te whakakotahitanga o ngā tōpana ngoikore me ngā tōpana ā-hiko i roto i te ariā ā-hiko i muri iho i whakaūngia e te kitenga. Ko te tātaitanga katoa o te tauira paerewa e matapae ana i tētahi tikanga Higgs kāore anō kia kitea, engari ko ngā kitenga pēnei i ngā kōpiupiu neutrino e tohu ana kāore anō kia oti te tauira paerewa. Ko tētahi Ariā Whakakotahi Matua e āhei ana ki te pahekotanga o te tauwhitinga ā-hiko ki te tōpana kaha, ka taea te whakanoho i ētahi o ngā raruraru kāore anō kia whakaotia i roto i te ahupūngao. Kei te ngana tonu ngā kaiahupūngao ki te whakawhanake i ngā tauira whakakotahitanga ōrite e whakakotahi ana i ngā tauwhitinga taketake e whā ki tētahi ariā o ngā mea katoa. I whakamātauria e Einstein, ā, i rahua i tēnei mahi, engari i tēnei wā ko te huarahi tino pai ki te whakautu i tēnei pātai ko te ariā aho.:212–219

question: He aha te momo tauira ahupūngao i rahua e Einstein te hanga?

context: Mai i taua wā, ā, i tēnei wā, kua whakaaetia te whanaungatanga ahuwhānui hei ariā e tino whakamārama ana i te tō ā-papa. I GR, kāore te tō-ā-papa i te tirohia hei tōpana, engari, ko ngā ahanoa e neke noa ana i roto i ngā āpure tō-ā-papa e haere ana i raro i tō rātou ake inertia i roto i ngā raina tōtika mā te mokowā-wā kōpiko – kua tautuhia hei ara mokowā-wā poto rawa i waenganui i ngā takahanga mokowā-wā e rua. Mai i te tirohanga o te ahanoa, ka puta katoa te nekeneke me te mea kāore he tō ā-papa. Ina mātakitaki anake i te nekeneke i roto i tētahi āhuatanga huri noa ka taea te mātakitaki i te kōpikopiko o te wā-mokowā, ā, ka whakatauria te tōpana mai i te ara kōpiko o te ahanoa. Nā reira, ko te ara raina tōtika i te wā-mokowā e kitea ana he raina kōpiko i te mokowā, ā, e kiia ana ko te arawhiti whakawhitiwhiti o te ahanoa. Hei tauira, ko te poitūkohu i makaia mai i te whenua e neke ana i roto i te parabola, pērā i roto i tētahi papa tō-ā-papa ōrite. Ko tōna arawhiti wā-mokowā (ina tāpirihia te ahu ct tāpiri) he tata tonu ki te raina hāngai, he iti noa iho te kōpiko (me te pūtoro o te kōpikopiko o te raupapa o ngā tau mārama ruarua). Ko te pārōnaki wā o te huringa o te ahanoa ko tā mātou e tapa ana ko te "tō-ā-papa".

context: Mā te paheko i te whakamāramatanga o te hiko o nāianei hei mokatere wā o te huringa o te utu hiko, ka whakaahuatia e tētahi ture whakareatanga vector e kiia nei ko te Ture a Lorentz te tōpana i runga i te hiko e neke ana i roto i tētahi papa autō. Mā te tūhononga i waenganui i te hiko me te autō e āhei ai te whakaahuatanga o tētahi tōpana autōhiko whakakotahi e mahi ana i runga i te utu. Ka taea te tuhi i tēnei tōpana hei tapeke o te tōpana ā-hiko (nā te āpure hiko) me te tōpana autō (nā te papa autō). Kua tino kīia, ko te ture tēnei:
question: He aha te mokatere o te huringa o te utu hiko?

context: Mā te paheko i te whakamāramatanga o te hiko o nāianei hei mokatere wā o te huringa o te utu hiko, ka whakaahuatia e tētahi ture whakareatanga vector e kiia nei ko te Ture a Lorentz te tōpana i runga i te hiko e neke ana i roto i tētahi papa autō. Mā te tūhononga i waenganui i te hiko me te autō e āhei ai te whakaahuatanga o tētahi tōpana autōhiko whakakotahi e mahi ana i runga i te utu.
